Candy Corn Martini.name: Candy Corn Martini
Candy Corn Martini.recipeInstructions: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine the candy corn vodka, pineapple juice and ginger beer.. Shake until chilled, then pour into chilled martini glasses.. Top with tonic water.. Garnish with cotton candy, which will melt into the drink, and enjoy immediately!

Tito's Handmade Vodka.description: Tito's Handmade Vodka is designed to be savored by spirit connoisseurs.  It is micro-distilled in an old-fashioned pot still, just like fine single malt scotches and high-end French cognacs.  This time-honored method of distillation requires more skill and effort than modern column stills, but it's well worth it. Our handcrafted technique offers more  control over the distillation process, resulting in a spectacularly clean product of incomparable excellence.  Only the heart of the run, "the nectar" is taken, leaving behind residual higher and lower alcohols.  The vodka is cleansed of phenols, esters, congenersand organic acids by filtering it through the finest activated carbon available.  Critics call Tito's "a homegrown symphonic spirit to applaud!" and say "it can go head to head with any of the worlds' greats and not break a sweat.

Cannon Blast Shot.description: This intense shot of citrus is the perfect way to kick your night up a notch.
Cannon Blast Shot.name: Cannon Blast Shot
Cannon Blast Shot.recipeInstructions: Add Cannon Blast into a shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a shot glass

Captain Morgan Cannon Blast.description: Citrus and spark, Captain Morgan Cannon Blast is a sweet blend that finishes with a warming sensation. Best enjoyed as a shot, Cannon Blast is the surefire way to kick the party up a notch, Captain.

Cape Codder.description: The Cape Codder is a classic drink enjoyed throughout the year by many cable knit sweater-loving prepsters and beyond. Very easy to make and almost too easy to drink. For a slightly less sugary version, add soda water in place of the full amount of juice.
Cape Codder.name: Cape Codder
Cape Codder.recipeInstructions: In a rocks glass over ice, combine vodka and juice. Stir and serve with a fresh wedge of lime

Ocean Spray Cranberry Juice Cocktail.description: Enjoy the crisp, clean taste of real cranberries straight from the bog. It’s a delicious way to get your daily dose of vitamin C and unique cranberry health benefits.

Capone.description: Two of Al Capone's major imports were whiskey and balsamic vinegar, legend has it he asked his people make him a drink that included both. We went the extra step and included some garden fresh tomatoes. A sweet reminder of the home country.... This recipe was adapted from the Bufala Negra Cocktail.
Capone.name: Capone
Capone.recipeInstructions: In a shaker muddle simple syrup, whiskey, balsamic, 2 leaves fresh basil (slice basil first), and 3 cherry tomatoes chopped. Add ice and shake vigorously for 10 seconds then strain into rocks glass. Fill glass with fresh ice and top with ginger beer. Garnish with large basil leave and one slice tomato

Stirrings Simple Syrup.description: Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is a starting point for many great cocktails. Set the foundation of your delicious drink with this kosher syrup, 12 oz, and take the guesswork out of making a tasty cocktail. This simple tonic, pack of 6, contains pure cane sugar and purified water in just the right proportion. This Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is the original inspiration for Stirrings "simple mixers" and is the critical first step for a yummy cocktail.

Reed's Extra Ginger Brew Ginger Beer.description: Reed’s Extra Ginger Brew is the same recipe as Original Ginger Brew, but has 26 grams of fresh ginger root for a stronger bite.

Captain Morgan Mojito.description: This classic Cuban cocktail contains only a few simple ingredients, but is sure to pack a fresh and flavorful punch. The smooth white rum combined with fragrant mint, tangy lime and hint of sweet simple syrup makes this drink light, bubbly and perfectly refreshing for summertime.
Captain Morgan Mojito.name: Captain Morgan Mojito
Captain Morgan Mojito.recipeInstructions: Muddle the lime, mint leaves and simple syrup in a shaker. Add Captain Morgan White Rum and fill with ice. Shake well. Pour into a glass and top with club soda. Add mint sprig for garnish

Canada Dry Club Soda.description: Since 1904, Canada Dry has been known for producing quality beverages and mixers. Canada Dry Club Soda offers a clean, sparkling taste, and it's the perfect addition to your favorite cocktail. It can also be enjoyed on its own for a unique, refreshing carbonated beverage alternative that contains zero calories and is caffeine free. Enjoy a refreshing taste of bubbly effervescence with Canada Dry Club Soda.

Captain Morgan White Rum.description: Five times distilled means five times the fun. Captain Morgan White Rum is as smooth as the Captain himself, and it definitely tastes better. Try this blend mixed into a tropical shot or as a substitute in any of your favorite cocktails.

Stirrings Simple Syrup.description: Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is a starting point for many great cocktails. Set the foundation of your delicious drink with this kosher syrup, 12 oz, and take the guesswork out of making a tasty cocktail. This simple tonic, pack of 6, contains pure cane sugar and purified water in just the right proportion. This Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is the original inspiration for Stirrings "simple mixers" and is the critical first step for a yummy cocktail.

Captain Morgan Pina Colada.description: You don’t have to be caught in the rain to enjoy this delicious Piña Colada made with Captain Morgan White Rum. But you could.
Captain Morgan Pina Colada.name: Captain Morgan Pina Colada
Captain Morgan Pina Colada.recipeInstructions: Combine all ingredients including Captain Morgan White Rum with ice in a blender and blend

Dole Pineapple Juice.description: Dole Pineapple Juice - Beat the summer heat    Dole Pineapple Juice contains essential vitamins that help boost your metabolism and keep you nutrition even in the scorching heat. Available in pack of 8, these are the ideal potion for enjoying summers to the fullest.        Flavor: Pineapple      Servings: 8 fl Oz      Ingredients: Pineapple Juice, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Vitamin E, and Vitamin A

ReaLime Lime Juice.description: ReaLime Lime Juice From Concentrate is 100 percent natural-strength juice made from fresh, quality limes. ReaLime adds a perfect citrusy zing to beverages, marinades, meats, seafood and salads.

Captain Morgan White Rum.description: Five times distilled means five times the fun. Captain Morgan White Rum is as smooth as the Captain himself, and it definitely tastes better. Try this blend mixed into a tropical shot or as a substitute in any of your favorite cocktails.

Coco Lopez Cream Of Coconut.description: Is the original and reigning champ of Cream of Coconut, a delicious cream made from the tender meat of sun ripened Caribbean coconuts and blended with the exact portion of natural cane sugar. This product is ideal for tropical drinks and desserts!

Captain Morgan's Cuba Libre.description: This cocktail became popular around the end of the Spanish American war, the name Cuba Libre translates to "Free Cuba".  It's basically a rum and coke with the addition of fresh lime juice. Easy and refreshing.
Captain Morgan's Cuba Libre.name: Captain Morgan's Cuba Libre
Captain Morgan's Cuba Libre.recipeInstructions: In a rocks glass filled with ice add rum and cola, top with lime juice and stir

Coca-Cola.description: Bring home the refreshing taste of Coca-Cola. Serve ice cold for maximum refreshment.

Rose's Lime Juice.description: Rose's lime juice, often known simply as Rose's, is a concentrated fruit juice patented in 1867. This makes it the world's first concentrated bottled fruit juice drink.

Captain Morgan White Rum.description: Five times distilled means five times the fun. Captain Morgan White Rum is as smooth as the Captain himself, and it definitely tastes better. Try this blend mixed into a tropical shot or as a substitute in any of your favorite cocktails.

Caramel Apple Moscow Mule.description: The ginger beer imparts the classic spicy flavors of a Moscow Mule, while apple cider and caramel vodka sweeten things up a bit.  Last, a squeeze of lime juice cuts the sweetness just a bit, resulting in a delicious Fall sipper that tastes just like a caramel apple!
recipeIngredient: thin slice of apple, for garnish
Caramel Apple Moscow Mule.name: Caramel Apple Moscow Mule
Caramel Apple Moscow Mule.recipeInstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice and stir to combine. . Garnish with a slice of apple.

Barritts Ginger Beer.description: Barritt's Ginger beer is distributed in Bermuda by John Barritt & Son Ltd. a family owned and operated soft drink firm that has been going for 5 generations.    While Barritt's Ginger Beer can be enjoyed alone it is a versatile mixer adding spice to rum, vodka, beer or exotic liqueurs. Barritt's Ginger Beer also features in a number of island recipes for cakes, jams marmalades, sauces and festive fruit punch.

Smirnoff Kissed Caramel.description:
Whether you sip it on the rocks or with soda and a twist, Smirnoff Kissed Caramel is the perfect addition to a cocktail party. Our 60 proof vodka is infused with the confectionery taste of salted caramel for a sweet finish. 

Triple distilled and 10 times filtered, our caramel specialty spirit is smooth enough to be taken alone or to add a delicious kick to your favorite mixed drink. Simply mix with apple cider and pour over ice for a sweet and aromatic cocktail. 

Founded in 1864, the Smirnoff brand traveled from Russia to the rest of the world due to our award-winning quality and smooth liquid. We pride ourselves on bringing our famous beverage to connoisseurs and newcomers alike, assuring the consistently great taste and quality expected from our traditionally distilled vodka. Please drink responsibly.

Caramel Apple Pie Cocktail.description: Now you can have your pie and drink it too. Caramel apple vodka, smooth rum cream and apple cider combine to make the perfect fall dessert - no culinary skills necessary!
recipeIngredient:
1 oz Caramel Apple Vodka
1 oz Rumchata
8 oz Apple Cider
Caramel Apple Pie Cocktail.name: Caramel Apple Pie Cocktail
Caramel Apple Pie Cocktail.recipeInstructions: Combine cider, vodka and Rumchata with a few ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously for about 30 seconds and strain into a glass. Garnish with caramel and  vanilla marshmallows, or rim the glass with caramel and cinnamon sugar!

Ice.description: Premium Packaged Ice. Ideal for large gatherings, events or for the business that needs large quantities of quality, sanitary ice.

RumChata Horchata Con Ron Cream Liqueur.description:
When you want to get the party started, make RumChata your go-to. A little bit rum, a little bit horchata, RumChata is a unique cream liqueur that highlights the best of these two fun-focused beverages. It's made with Caribbean rum, fresh cream and plenty of authentic horchata spices.

Take a sip, and you'll notice cinnamon, vanilla and plenty of sweet notes. Thanks to its smooth taste, RumChata is incredibly easy to drink. Sip it on the rocks to enjoy every bit of the spiked horchata flavors. Cool down by mixing RumChata with root beer, or heat things up by mixing it with coffee or hot chocolate. Got the munchies? RumChata even adds spice to cake, pancakes and bread pudding recipes.

Buy RumChata online at a great price through Drizly and have it delivered directly to your door or pick it up in store.

Caribou Lou.description: Attributed to the rapper TECH N9NE, the Caribou Lou is a somewhat fruity drink with a strong kick from the 151 proof rum. The song goes as far as to call out how "numb" this drink might make you, enjoy responsibly friends.
Caribou Lou.name: Caribou Lou
Caribou Lou.recipeInstructions: In a cocktail shaker with ice, combine all ingredients and shake until cold. Serve in a rocks glass with fresh ice

Dole Pineapple Juice.description: Dole Pineapple Juice - Beat the summer heat    Dole Pineapple Juice contains essential vitamins that help boost your metabolism and keep you nutrition even in the scorching heat. Available in pack of 8, these are the ideal potion for enjoying summers to the fullest.        Flavor: Pineapple      Servings: 8 fl Oz      Ingredients: Pineapple Juice, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Vitamin E, and Vitamin A

Malibu Rum - Original Coconut.description: Nothing beats an original, and Malibu Rum is not only an original, it is the world’s best-selling Caribbean rum with natural coconut flavor. The taste of MALIBU is sunshine in a bottle - smooth, fresh coconut flavor with a sweet finish - perfect for bringing the sun-kissed island to anytime.

Bacardi 151.description:
Next time you’re pouring rum cocktails for your cohorts, serve up this nugget of rum trivia: Bacardi 151 gets its name for its proof level of 151. At 75.5%
alcohol by volume, that’s nearly double the level of typical rum. Wowza. All that alcohol means it’s highly flammable, so be responsible friends. Balance Bacardi 151’s punch by using it sparingly in sweet, fruity drinks, such as Hurricanes or Rum Punches.

Carrotini.description: Want to try a funky alternative to the brunch bloody? Give this vegetable juice and infused vodka cocktail a taste. The bright orange color and refreshing vodka flavors make for a drink that's a definite departure from your typical Sunday brunch order.
Carrotini.name: Carrotini
Carrotini.recipeInstructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake until cold and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with carrot and cucumber

Cazadores 1862 Margarita.description:
Cinco de Mayo celebrates Mexico's unlikely victory over the French army in 1862 at the Battle of Puebla. More of an emotional victory than a military one, to Mexicans Cinco de Mayo represents Mexican pride, resolve and bravery in the face of overwhelming odds.

 

This year, celebrate Cinco de Mayo with a delicious Cazadores 1862 Margarita. Featuring Tequila Cazadores Blanco from Mexico & St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur from France, the 1862 Margarita brings the two countries together again to create the perfect cocktail for the holiday. Salud!
Cazadores 1862 Margarita.name: Cazadores 1862 Margarita
Cazadores 1862 Margarita.recipeInstructions:
Combine all the ingredients with ice. Shake and

serve over the rocks in a 12 oz. glass. Garnish with lime wheel

St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur.description:
Creating spirits is a labor of love, but few other liqueurs have such a laborious process. To gather the elderflowers needed to distill St. Germain Elderflower Liqueur, a team of 40 to 50 workers head to the French countryside and pick the blossoms of the beautiful flower. The window for picking the flowers is short, lasting only a few weeks in the spring. The rush to pick the blossoms resembles a last-minute rush by boyfriends or husbands to grab a fresh bouquet on Valentine's Day, but St. Germain Elderflower Liqueur boasts more satisfied recipients. Once picked, a race starts to begin the distillation process as the delicate flavors begin to dissipate only a short time after harvest.
The elderflowers undergo a maceration process that accentuates and perpetuates their delicate flavor and aroma. The process has taken over 100 years to perfect, which makes mastery of video games look far less impressive. Workers mix the elderflower blossoms with a small amount of citrus fruits and cane sugar to heighten the subtle flavor, but the result is nothing short of spectacular. It is a delicate, balanced liqueur that delivers hints of pear, apricot, lychee and grapefruit zest. Despite the fruit presence, it has a bit of tartness to balance it out. It's not exactly like a liquid Sweet Tart, and only an actual taste gives you the sense of its true flavor. Mix it with champagne or other cocktails for some added sweetness, or enjoy it on its own for a mind-blowing after dinner cocktail.

Cazadores Tequila Blanco.description: Awarded a 93-point rating & Top 100 Spirits of 2017 designation from Wine Enthusiast, CAZADORES Blanco is tequila in its purest form. Bottled after distillation to preserve its clean taste, CAZADORES Blanco has intense blue agave flavor, natural sweetness and notes of citrus and herbs.

Cazadores Jalape\u00f1o Margarita.description: For those who enjoy a bit of a kick, the Cazadores Jalapeño Margarita is a journey through the Mexican highlands, where the blue agave grows tall and the jalapeño adds an extra layer of flavor to foods and drinks alike.
Cazadores Jalape\u00f1o Margarita.name: Cazadores Jalapeño Margarita
Cazadores Jalape\u00f1o Margarita.recipeInstructions: In a cocktail shaker, combine all the ingredients with ice. Shake well. Serve over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a jalapeño wheel

Cazadores Tequila Blanco.description: Awarded a 93-point rating & Top 100 Spirits of 2017 designation from Wine Enthusiast, CAZADORES Blanco is tequila in its purest form. Bottled after distillation to preserve its clean taste, CAZADORES Blanco has intense blue agave flavor, natural sweetness and notes of citrus and herbs.

Rose's Lime Juice.description: Rose's lime juice, often known simply as Rose's, is a concentrated fruit juice patented in 1867. This makes it the world's first concentrated bottled fruit juice drink.

Tres Agaves Agave Nectar.description: Our organic cocktail-ready agave nectar, made with organic agaves, is the original and only organic agave sweetener on the market created specifically for Margaritas and other mixed drinks.  We've balanced it with just enough purified water so it measures, pours, and dissolves easily, with a consistent sweetness level, making it the finest simple syrup available.  Just add TRES AGAVES 100% Agave Tequila and unsweetened lime juice for the ultimate fresh Margarita!

Cazadores Paloma.description: A Pacific coast sunset that's as refreshing as it is tasty. The Cazadores Paloma, with its light fruity flavors and fizzy finish, is the perfect pairing to any late afternoon.
Cazadores Paloma.name: Cazadores Paloma
Cazadores Paloma.recipeInstructions: Fill a Collins glass with ice. Pour in the tequila and top with grapefruit soda. Stir. Garnish with grapefruit and lime

Cazadores Tequila Blanco.description: Awarded a 93-point rating & Top 100 Spirits of 2017 designation from Wine Enthusiast, CAZADORES Blanco is tequila in its purest form. Bottled after distillation to preserve its clean taste, CAZADORES Blanco has intense blue agave flavor, natural sweetness and notes of citrus and herbs.

Century Rum Punch.description: Century Rum Punch was based on a recipe from the legendary "Professor" Jerry Thomas and is as good now as it was in 1862.
Century Rum Punch.name: Century Rum Punch
Century Rum Punch.recipeInstructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Add ice and shake vigorously. Fine strain the mixture into a highball glass full of shaved or crushed ice. Garnish with 4 pineapple slices cut into triangles

Bacardi Superior Rum.description:
Bacardi Superior is Bacardi's flagship rum and the one that started it all way back in 1862. In this year, founder Don Facundo Bacardi purchased the land in Cuba that would become the distillery that changed the way the world drank rum. By pioneering charcoal filtration and purposeful aging, Bacardi created Bacardi white rum, which set the standard for flavor and balance. However, it wasn't without hardship. The Cuban Revolution forced Bacardi from Cuba, and today, the Cathedral of Rum is in Puerto Rico. It still imparts all the distillation processes that make it the world's top-selling rum brand, and the stuff that every rapper and pop icon seems to consider the ultimate party accompaniment.

With its unique balance and light taste, Bacardi Superior pairs beautifully with mint and lime without being overly dominant in the cocktail. This means that it's perfect for a mojito or a Cuba Libre, but without the overwhelming taste of alcohol. The reason for this wonderful marriage lies in the undertones of the rum, which imparts flavors such as citrus, coriander and ginger. Each batch of Bacardi White Rum gets these flavors thanks to the highest-quality ingredients, including sugar cane and yeasts that are only found in the Caribbean. Thanks to these ingredients, the flavor profile evokes visions of white sand beaches, palm trees and crystal-clear ocean waters. Even if you can only fill a kiddie pool to sit in, Bacardi Superior Rum takes you away from it all.

Bacardi Gold.description: Bacardi Gold Rum is golden amber in color from oak aging. Hints of caramel and vanilla are present in the nose. The finish is nicely balanced.

Cerveza Preparada.description: Cerveza Preparada, (meaning 'prepared beer') is a term used in Mexico when referring to a beer mixed, or prepared to include ingredients like hot sauce or tomato juice. For our version we've chosen to use Clamato juice because of the distinct briny flavor it brings. This combination of beer and clamato juice may seem odd at first, but this distinctly tangy and refreshing drink will hook you from the first sip.
Cerveza Preparada.name: Cerveza Preparada
Cerveza Preparada.recipeInstructions: Pour spice mixture onto a small plate wide enough for the rim of a pint glass or beer mug to fit.. Wet the edge of your glass with a lime wedge and roll the edge into the spice mixture until evenly coated.. Fill glass with ice and pour in clamato juice, and the juice of both your lemon and lime.. Fill the remainder of the glass full with beer. Add hot sauce and additional lemon juice to taste.. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

Corona Extra.description:
A staple at everything from summer beach parties to everyday occasions, Corona Extra is a pilsner-type Mexican beer with a slightly sweet taste and a dash of citrus. Hints of lemon and ginger round out the flavor for a crisp and firm taste. Corona Extra was first introduced in the U.S. in 1981, and became the fastest growing imported beer in U.S. history. Corona Extra has been brewed and bottled in Mexico since 1925, and is the #1 selling imported beer in the U.S. 
For serving, try adding a fresh wedge of lime to bring out the citrus flavors. We recommend enjoying this simple brew from the bottle (or can), and if possible on a beach somewhere.

Morton Kosher Salt.description: Morton Coarse Kosher Salt is a versatile salt loved by chefs for its texture, ease of use and its ability to bring out the natural flavors of food. The coarse flake crystals of Morton Coarse Kosher Salt are much bigger than regular table salt crystals, making it easy to pinch for measuring and sprinkling. Also, the larger flakes adhere well to food and dissolve slowly, providing a well-rounded flavor. While Morton Coarse Kosher Salt can be used in many ways, it's ideal for brining and rimming margarita glasses as well as roasting, marinades and rubs.

Tabasco Original.description: Why has TABASCO® Sauce become so popular the world over? It’s simple: put it on any food you like, and it’ll make you like it even more! Because TABASCO® Sauce brings out a food’s flavor while adding a peppery punch of its own. Splash it on everything from Mexican food to Italian, seafood to sandwich spreads, Eggs Benedict to Bloody Marys!

Chai White Russian with a Twist (non-dai.description:

<!--StartFragment-->The Chai White
Russian with a Twist: This take on the White Russian will replace the heavy cream with
coconut milk to make it vegan. This will make the drink accessible to those who
previously wouldn't be able to enjoy it.
recipeIngredient: 3-4 parts Almond Milk (I like Almond Breeze)
4 parts Oregon Chai The Original (Sugar free)
Chai White Russian with a Twist (non-dai.name: Chai White Russian with a Twist (non-dairy)
Chai White Russian with a Twist (non-dai.recipeInstructions: Fill glass half full with ice cubes. Pour over the ice 2 parts Kahlúa. Then pour in 2 parts of Absolut Vodka. Next up pour in 4 parts Chai. Finish with 3-4 parts Almond Milk. Stir with spoon and top off with 2 cinnamon sticks

Absolut Vodka.description: Absolut Vodka was first launched in New York in 1979. It soon became the talk of the town, in the US and eventually of the world. But the recipe behind the clean and natural taste of Absolut is actually older than 30 years. So is the 18th century medicine bottle found in an antique store in Stockholm, Sweden that gave inspiration to the iconic Absolut Vodka bottle.

Kahlua.description:
Kahlua coffee-flavored liqueur is made with the finest 100% Arabica coffee beans from Veracruz, Mexico. The climate in this region of the country produce well-rounded, light-bodied coffee. These quality beans  are then mixed with sugar cane rum, vanilla bean, and notes of caramel.  They combine perfectly to make an easy-sipping liqueur enjoyed by millions. Known for its deep brown color and smooth finish, Kahlua is the number one selling coffee liqueur in the world.

Kahlua is also the primary ingredient in a number of famous (or perhaps infamous) cocktails. The Espresso Martini, The Mind Eraser, and personal favorite of  “The Dude” The White Russian.

Chambord Margarita.description: For an twist on the classic margarita, try adding Chambord Black Raspberry Liqueur.
Chambord Margarita.name: Chambord Margarita
Chambord Margarita.recipeInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a salt-rimmed, ice-filled martini or margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wedge

El Jimador Silver Tequila.description: El Jimador silver is made with 100% hand-harvested blue Weber agave and double distilled with sparkling clarity as it is bottled immediately after we create it. It has a smooth and distinct agave taste with hints of citrusy sweetness.

Chambord Black Raspberry Liqueur.description: Chambord® is a premium liqueur produced in the Loire Valley of France. An infusion of raspberries, blackberries and the exotic flavors of black raspberries, black currant, Madagascar vanilla and XO cognac, Chambord creates a more extraordinary cocktail.

Chambord Royale.description: A bright and flavorful cocktail great for brunch, sipping with friends, or toasting to family.
Chambord Royale.name: Chambord Royale
Chambord Royale.recipeInstructions: Pour Kobel into a champagne flute. Top with Chambord. Garnish with a raspberry

Korbel Extra Dry California Champagne.description: Korbel Extra Dry is a fresh, off-dry California champagne that is light, luscious, and always a crowd favorite. It features delightful flavors of bright citrus, vanilla and spice.

Chambord Black Raspberry Liqueur.description: Chambord® is a premium liqueur produced in the Loire Valley of France. An infusion of raspberries, blackberries and the exotic flavors of black raspberries, black currant, Madagascar vanilla and XO cognac, Chambord creates a more extraordinary cocktail.

Chambord Spritz.description: A light, bubbly, and fresh drink with a burst of flavor.
Chambord Spritz.name: Chambord Spritz
Chambord Spritz.recipeInstructions: Take a large wine glass and fill it with ice. Add Chambord, white wine and soda

Canada Dry Club Soda.description: Since 1904, Canada Dry has been known for producing quality beverages and mixers. Canada Dry Club Soda offers a clean, sparkling taste, and it's the perfect addition to your favorite cocktail. It can also be enjoyed on its own for a unique, refreshing carbonated beverage alternative that contains zero calories and is caffeine free. Enjoy a refreshing taste of bubbly effervescence with Canada Dry Club Soda.

Starborough Sauvignon Blanc.description: Starborough Sauvignon Blanc has refreshing flavors of citrus and tropical fruits with notes of fresh-cut grass, passion fruit, guava and kiwi that creates a crisp, approachable palate. This refreshing wine comes from Marlborough, New Zealand.

Chambord Black Raspberry Liqueur.description: Chambord® is a premium liqueur produced in the Loire Valley of France. An infusion of raspberries, blackberries and the exotic flavors of black raspberries, black currant, Madagascar vanilla and XO cognac, Chambord creates a more extraordinary cocktail.

Charred Pineapple Punch.description: A party-pleasing twist on your typical rum punch.  The bitterness of the Campari is tastefully balanced with fresh pineapple, lime and simple syrup.  The charred pineapple garnish will surely impress your guests!
recipeIngredient:
.5 oz Fresh Lime Juice
1 oz Simple Syrup
.75 oz Campari
 1.5 oz Pineapple Juice
1.5 oz Dark Rum
Charred Pineapple Punch.name: Charred Pineapple Punch
Charred Pineapple Punch.recipeInstructions: Fill a tall collins glass with ice. Muddle charred pineapple in a shaker with your simple syrup, lime juice, pineapple juice, Campari and dark rum. Shake to combine. Pour over ice. Add a slice of charred pineapple on the rim for a garnish

Campari.description:
For over 150 years, Campari has been a favorite liqueur for drinkers with different tastes. The liquid is a dark red color and is often mixed with other alcohols and non-alcoholic drinks for cocktails. The drink was created in 1860.
 
Depending on where the Campari is sold, the alcohol content ranges from 20.5 percent to 28 percent. When you smell Campari, you'll be reminded of pomegranate, strawberry, spicy herbs, bitter orange and cherry. The flavor starts off sweet and is followed by an herbal, spicy taste. After that, the bitterness of the drink starts to build. This is a wholly unique drink.

The recipe and creation process of Campari is still a secret to this day. Depending on your source, even the number of ingredients changes (ranging from 20 to 80). However, there are a few ingredients that are known. Campari includes fruits in water and alcohol as well as an infusion of herbs.

The most common ways to drink Campari are in cocktails, with prosecco or with soda water. While you can drink it neat, many have trouble with the bitter taste. Because of this, many of the mixed drinks that use Campari are strong flavored as well.

The most well-known drink using Campari is a Negroni. A Negroni can be served either straight up or on the rocks. All you need for this classic mixed drink is one ounce of dry gin, one ounce of Campari and one ounce of sweet vermouth. Mix these three together either in a mixing glass with ice or mix them right in the glass with some ice.

Another great Campari-based mixed drink is the Jasmine. In a cocktail shaker, combine one-and-a-half ounces of gin, three-quarters of an ounce of fresh-squeezed lemon juice, a quarter ounce of Campari and a quarter ounce of Cointreau. Fill the shaker with ice and shake for about 10 seconds. Strain your drink into a cocktail glass. Don't forget to add a lemon twist garnish for the perfect bold drink.

Buy Campari online through Drizly and have it delivered directly to your door or pick it up in store.

Cheerleader Champagne Cocktail.description: A sparkling cocktail that mixes berry goodness with your favorite bubbly. What completes this sweet sipper is the fun and easy pom pom topper on the end of the popsicle stick.
recipeIngredient:
Brut Sparkling Wine
1/4 oz. Creme de Cassis Liqueur
1 Raspberry Frozen Popsicle
Cheerleader Champagne Cocktail.name: Cheerleader Champagne Cocktail
Cheerleader Champagne Cocktail.recipeInstructions: Pour Creme de Cassis into a champagne flute. Put popsicle into glass. Fill glass with chilled sparkling wine. Serve immediately

Scharffenberger Brut Sparkling Wine.description: Scharffenberger Brut Excellence is made by the traditional méthode champenoise process – whereby the wines are individually bottle-fermented before being riddled and disgorged. The wine is approximately two-thirds Pinot Noir and one-third Chardonnay and undergoes 100% malolactic fermentation. Scharffenberger Brut is made from its own 120-acre vineyards in the Anderson Valley. In addition, Scharffenberger Cellars has long-term contracts with select vineyards in the greater Mendocino County. This type of vineyard selection allows us to choose from the best vineyards in the area which enables us to produce our trademark cuvée.    The wine is two-thirds Pinot Noir which produces a red fruit (cherry and plum) forward nose combined with one-third Chardonnay which adds the tropical expression of litchi nut and mango. The 100% malolactic fermentation adds a vanilla cream character producing a round and full-bodied wine. After approximately two years on the yeast lees, there are notes of freshly baked bread and pastry that enhances the more fruit forward style of the wine. Finally, after several months on the cork the wine develops caramel and hazel complexors.

Hiram Walker Creme de Cassis.description: Crème de Cassis is a sweet, fruity liqueur made from black currants, dating back to the 16th century as a tonic. Created from a unique blend of luscious currant berries and spirits, Hiram Walker Crème de Cassis is deep red and delicious. This liqueur is typically featured in cocktails alongside vermouth, white wine, or soda water; it's also used in a popular French cocktail called the Kir Royale, an aperitif made with Crème de Cassis and champagne. Hiram Walker started producing spirits in 1858, and pioneered numerous distillation and manufacturing processes that are now industry standards. For example, Hiram Walker was one of the first alcohol producers to begin placing labels on bottles. Crème de Cassis is a great choice to round out your bar essentials. For a dash of color and sweetness, we recommend serving it with white wine or champagne.

Cherry Bourbon Smash.description: What's not to love about a refreshing soda paired with a delicious spirit? The muddled maraschinos up the strong cherry flavors in the soda and pairs perfectly with a smooth, oaky bourbon.
Cherry Bourbon Smash.name: Cherry Bourbon Smash
Cherry Bourbon Smash.recipeInstructions: In the base of a cocktail shaker, muddle 2-3 maraschino cherries, lemon juice and bourbon. Add ice and shake until cold. Strain into a rocks glass. Top with ice and Dr Pepper

Dr. Pepper.description: Dr Pepper is a carbonated soft drink marketed as having a unique flavor. The drink was created in the 1880s by Charles Alderton in Waco, Texas and first served around 1885. Dr Pepper was first nationally marketed in the United States in 1904, and is now also sold in Europe, Asia, Canada, Mexico, Australia, New Zealand (as an imported drink), South Africa (also as an imported drink), and South America. Variants include a version without high fructose corn syrup, Diet Dr Pepper, as well as a line of additional flavors, first introduced in the 2000s.

ReaLemon Lemon Juice.description: ReaLemon is 100% real lemon juice made from concentrate, and it's a great alternative to the hassle of fresh lemons. ReaLemon is a space-saving kitchen sidekick, ideal for adding a delicious twist of lemon to your favorite seafood and poultry recipes, plus it's great in marinades and it brightens up both hot and cold beverages. Since 1934, ReaLemon has been a trusted brand to deliver quality lemon juice.

Maraschino Cherries.description: Maraschino cherries are an ingredient in many cocktails, giving them the nickname: "Cocktail cherries." As a garnish, they often are used to decorate frozen yogurt, baked ham, cakes, pastry, parfaits, milkshakes, ice cream sundaes, and ice cream sodas.

Cherry Mind Eraser.description: The cherry-coffee pairing isn't seen very often, but the rich, dark fruit along with the vanilla and caramel notes in the Kahlúa® were meant for each other.
Cherry Mind Eraser.name: Cherry Mind Eraser
Cherry Mind Eraser.recipeInstructions: Fill rocks glass with ice. Add Kahlua and vodka. Add cherry syrup. Top with soda water

Canada Dry Club Soda.description: Since 1904, Canada Dry has been known for producing quality beverages and mixers. Canada Dry Club Soda offers a clean, sparkling taste, and it's the perfect addition to your favorite cocktail. It can also be enjoyed on its own for a unique, refreshing carbonated beverage alternative that contains zero calories and is caffeine free. Enjoy a refreshing taste of bubbly effervescence with Canada Dry Club Soda.

Absolut Vodka.description: Absolut Vodka was first launched in New York in 1979. It soon became the talk of the town, in the US and eventually of the world. But the recipe behind the clean and natural taste of Absolut is actually older than 30 years. So is the 18th century medicine bottle found in an antique store in Stockholm, Sweden that gave inspiration to the iconic Absolut Vodka bottle.

Kahlua.description:
Kahlua coffee-flavored liqueur is made with the finest 100% Arabica coffee beans from Veracruz, Mexico. The climate in this region of the country produce well-rounded, light-bodied coffee. These quality beans  are then mixed with sugar cane rum, vanilla bean, and notes of caramel.  They combine perfectly to make an easy-sipping liqueur enjoyed by millions. Known for its deep brown color and smooth finish, Kahlua is the number one selling coffee liqueur in the world.

Kahlua is also the primary ingredient in a number of famous (or perhaps infamous) cocktails. The Espresso Martini, The Mind Eraser, and personal favorite of  “The Dude” The White Russian.

Chocolate Martini.description: Dessert in a glass. The Chocolate Martini is a decadent cocktail that's an ideal night cap. Vodka and chocolate combine for perfection in this drink. Some may call it girly but we say chocolate is for everyone.
Chocolate Martini.name: Chocolate Martini
Chocolate Martini.recipeInstructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice, shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds until ice cold. Strain into a martini glass and serve

Godiva Chocolate Liqueur.description:
The makers of fine Belgium chocolate bring you their latest masterpiece: Godiva Chocolate Liqueur. This elegant spirit is a 30 proof liqueur filled with the sweet, velvety flavor of liquid chocolate ending in a rich, silky finish. Perfect for mixed drinks or as a gift, our chocolate liqueur is sure to please and thrill. Mix with vodka and pour into a chilled martini glass for a signature Godiva Grand Chocolate Martini.

Godiva Liqueurs embodies the commitment to quality and artistry derived from the Godiva Chocolatier. A global premium brand over the past 90 years, we strive to continue the story of an exceptional Belgium family and their passion for chocolate in every bottle and box we make. Please drink responsibly.

Leroux Cordial Flavored Cr\u00e8me de Ca.description: A liqueur that has chocolate as its main ingredient. Goes well with popular drinks such as the Chocolate Martini and Napoleon Alexander.

Christmas Cookie Shot.description: Give this Santa-approved twist on a classic holiday treat a try this year. The sweet mix of cointreau, irish cream, coffee liqueur and smooth butterscotch schnapps come together to create a festive cookie flavor, no baking required.
recipeIngredient:
4 oz Baileys Irish Cream
2 oz Butterscotch Schnapps Liqueur
1 oz Cointreau
.5 oz Kahlua
Christmas Cookie Shot.name: Christmas Cookie Shot
Christmas Cookie Shot.recipeInstructions: Measure out all ingredients into a cocktail shaker full of ice. Shake vigorously until chilled thoroughly. Strain liquid equally into 5 shot glasses. Enjoy

Baileys Irish Cream Original.description:
What kind of cows make your liquor? This is an important question for the makers of Bailey's Irish Cream. Nearly 40,000 top-bred Irish dairy cows contribute cream to make the world's most popular liqueur. It's blended with pure Irish whiskey and a proprietary cocoa extract to make one of the best-selling alcoholic beverages on the planet. 

What can you mix it with? Nothing and practically anything. All by itself, perhaps on the rocks, it makes a smooth sipper. It's very friendly with coffee, hot cocoa and other liqueurs. Amaretto, peppermint schnapps, cinnamon liqueur or whiskey all get along nicely with Bailey's in a hot drink.

Because of its weight and viscosity, Bailey's performs well with layered drinks. Building a multilayer shot takes some practice and touch, but it's an old-school skill that will wow your guests. Consider the classic B-52 coffee with Kahlua and Grand Marnier. While nice on the rocks or with coffee, the B-52 was originally intended to be a layered shot.

To craft one, you must add ingredients in the proper order. It's Kahlua, Bailey's then Grand Marnier. You need a tool to gently add the ingredients without stirring things up. Some use the back of a spoon or a classic twisted swizzle stick. Bailey's is an infinitely usable bar pantry ingredient you should always have around. Don’t wait, buy Bailey’s Original Irish Cream through Drizly at a great price and have it delivered directly to your door or pick it up in store.

Kahlua.description:
Kahlua coffee-flavored liqueur is made with the finest 100% Arabica coffee beans from Veracruz, Mexico. The climate in this region of the country produce well-rounded, light-bodied coffee. These quality beans  are then mixed with sugar cane rum, vanilla bean, and notes of caramel.  They combine perfectly to make an easy-sipping liqueur enjoyed by millions. Known for its deep brown color and smooth finish, Kahlua is the number one selling coffee liqueur in the world.

Kahlua is also the primary ingredient in a number of famous (or perhaps infamous) cocktails. The Espresso Martini, The Mind Eraser, and personal favorite of  “The Dude” The White Russian.

Cointreau.description:
Cointreau, the crystal clear Orange Liqueur, founded in Angers, France, remains one of the world's most distinguished spirits with over 160 years of history. 


Renowned for its perfect balance of sweet and bitter orange peels and made with only the finest all-natural ingredients, Cointreau has a uniquely refreshing and complex taste. A versatile, 80 proof spirit, Cointreau can be enjoyed as the base spirit in many cocktails, such as the Cointreau Rickey, but is also an essential ingredient in the most popular cocktails including the Margarita, the Cosmopolitan, and the Sidecar.

Chronic Iced Tea.description: Tasting much more like iced tea than the infamous Long Island Iced Tea, this concoction is the ideal blend of smoky and sweet. Born out of the B-Side Lounge in Cambridge (R.I.P.), it's a specialty drink that will elevate your bartending game.
Chronic Iced Tea.name: Chronic Iced Tea
Chronic Iced Tea.recipeInstructions: Add all ingredients, except tea, to a pint glass filled with ice. Fill pint glass with tea and garnish with lemon wedge

ReaLemon Lemon Juice.description: ReaLemon is 100% real lemon juice made from concentrate, and it's a great alternative to the hassle of fresh lemons. ReaLemon is a space-saving kitchen sidekick, ideal for adding a delicious twist of lemon to your favorite seafood and poultry recipes, plus it's great in marinades and it brightens up both hot and cold beverages. Since 1934, ReaLemon has been a trusted brand to deliver quality lemon juice.

Barenjager Honey Liqueur.description: Barenjager is a delicious honey based liqueur produced in Germany.

Cilantro & Jalapeno Infused Tequila.description:
Tequila is totally trending right now, not only because it is a great spirit for summer, but some say it's main ingredient, Blue Agave has some major health benefits. We love sipping on a smooth silver tequila in a spicy margarita so we decided to take some of those flavors and infuse them directly into the spirit. We enjoy serving it on the rocks topped with a grapefruit spiked seltzer, or just plain club soda with a wedge of citrus

Check out our Infusions 101 Page for even more home infusion flavor ideas!
recipeIngredient: 3/4 Cup (half a bushel) of Cilantro Leaves
Cilantro & Jalapeno Infused Tequila.name: Cilantro & Jalapeno Infused Tequila
Cilantro & Jalapeno Infused Tequila.recipeInstructions: Place sliced jalapeno and cilantro leaves into the bottom of a 1.5 Pint Mason Jar.. Fill the rest of the jar with a silver tequila of your choice (we used Espolon Blanco )and seal with lid. .  Give the mixture a good shake to distribute ingredients, and let sit in a cool dark place for up to 3 days, shaking occasionally. . After 3 days, strain ingredients out through a fine mesh strainer, and place your infused tequila into a sealed jar.

Espol\u00f2n Blanco.description: Espolòn Blanco, our signature tequila, is the purest expression of our passion for Mexico’s legendary spirit. Made only with 100% Blue Weber agave it carries delicate  floral and tropical fruit notes and a clean finish. Espolòn Blanco can be enjoyed neat or as the perfect accompaniment to a classic tequila cocktail. Our label, featuring the brand’s iconic rooster Ramón, is inspired by the famous Mexican artist José Guadalupe Posada and references the charge in the fight for Mexico’s independence.

Cilantro Jalapeno Margarita.description: All it takes are some hot jalapeno slices and a few crisp sprigs of cilantro in your classic margarita to create the ultimate party time pitcher.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 parts Sauza® Signature Blue Silver Tequila
Cilantro Jalapeno Margarita.name: Cilantro Jalapeno Margarita
Cilantro Jalapeno Margarita.recipeInstructions:
Combine Sauza®
Signature Blue Silver, simple syrup, fresh lime juice, and jalapeno slices in a
shaker with ice. Shake and strain over ice. Garnish with fresh cilantro

Sauza Signature Blue Silver Tequila.description:
According to legend, when the Spanish conquistadors ran out of the brandy they brought from Europe, they began to distill a local agave drink, which became North America’s first indigenous distilled spirit. In 1873, this golden beverage was dubbed “tequila” by Don Cenobio Sauza, who founded La Perseverancia Distillery in Tequila, Mexico. He became the first to export tequila to the rest of the world, and today, Sauza offers a full line of tequila. Sauza® Signature Blue Silver Tequila is a 100% agave tequila complemented by an added herbal dimension for a consistently smooth flavor. Bright silver with crystal hints, the aroma of this tequila offers a balance of agave and herbal notes with hints of spice while agave and citrus flavors can be tasted on the palate. The short finish also has a warm, balanced body. Ideal for margaritas.

Winner of Gold Medal at the 2017 SIP Awards

Cinnamon Spice Sangria.description: Cinnamon Spice makes everything nice! This spiced sangria is the perfect sweater-weather refreshment and easy-as-pie to prepare. Plus, it's super pretty to look at. In summation: this one's a winner.
Cinnamon Spice Sangria.name: Cinnamon Spice Sangria
Cinnamon Spice Sangria.recipeInstructions: In a punch bowl, pour in Barefoot Pinot Noir. Add in apple cider. Add in the cut up fruit, cinnamon sticks, and star anise. Pour in lemon juice. Stir and pour into serving cups. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cinnamon stick

Barefoot Pinot Noir.description: Perfectly balanced, the pretty and bright-fruited Barefoot Pinot Noir offers seductive, red fruit flavors on the palate; smooth in the finish.

Cinnamon Toast Crunch Shot.description: A blast from the past, the Cinnamon Toast Crunch shot tastes just like a bowl of our childhood favorite cereal. This tasty treat can be enjoyed as a shot, or over ice as a delicious dessert cocktail.
Cinnamon Toast Crunch Shot.name: Cinnamon Toast Crunch Shot
Cinnamon Toast Crunch Shot.recipeInstructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker over ice and shake until cold. Strain into a shot glass rimmed with cinnamon sugar mixture.

Fireball Cinnamon Whisky.description:
Fireball Cinnamon Whisky is one of the most popular and famous whiskies in America. The drink was first produced in the 1980s, and over the years, it slowly became popular in Canada and outside the country.

When it was first made, Fireball was one of Seagram's several flavored schnapps drinks. In 1989, Sazerac Company purchased the rights to the formula and the brand from Seagram. At first, Sazerac branded this as Dr. McGillicuddy's Fireball Whisky. It wasn't until years later in 2007 that the drink was re-branded to the Fireball Cinnamon Whisky most people now recognize.

The flavor of Fireball is unlike anything else. Even other cinnamon whiskies are difficult to compare. The drink goes down smooth, and as the branding will have you know, it's fiery. It's warming in the belly and flavorful on the tongue. You'll get the flavor of a cinnamon candy with all the spicy and sweet tones that you've always loved.

There are a ton of ways to drink Fireball Whisky, depending on your mood and preferences. If you're in the mood for the whisky itself, you can take it as a shot or drink it on the rocks. For many, however, the strong flavor of Fireball is hard to take straight. Luckily, there are so many outstanding mixed drinks you can make with Fireball that you'll have tons of options to choose from.

Enhance your cider drink with Fireball. Add a shot of Fireball to a pint of your favorite hard cider for an awesome cinnamon taste. The most commonly suggested cider for this drink is Angry Orchard Crisp Apple Cider, but any cider will work.

Try a mixed shot for something a little different. Combine Fireball and coffee liqueur in a shot glass for a spicy coffee flavor. If you're in the mood for a fizzy drink, combine one part Fireball and three parts Dr. Pepper for a Hot Pepper. The fireball helps bring out all the other flavors in the soda, making it a fun drink.

Buy Fireball Cinnamon Whisky online at a great price through Drizly and have it delivered directly to your door or pick it up in store.

RumChata Horchata Con Ron Cream Liqueur.description:
When you want to get the party started, make RumChata your go-to. A little bit rum, a little bit horchata, RumChata is a unique cream liqueur that highlights the best of these two fun-focused beverages. It's made with Caribbean rum, fresh cream and plenty of authentic horchata spices.

Take a sip, and you'll notice cinnamon, vanilla and plenty of sweet notes. Thanks to its smooth taste, RumChata is incredibly easy to drink. Sip it on the rocks to enjoy every bit of the spiked horchata flavors. Cool down by mixing RumChata with root beer, or heat things up by mixing it with coffee or hot chocolate. Got the munchies? RumChata even adds spice to cake, pancakes and bread pudding recipes.

Buy RumChata online at a great price through Drizly and have it delivered directly to your door or pick it up in store.

Citrus Margarita.description: Add a citrus flavor to your classic margarita. This new favorite combines tequila with zesty orange and lime juices, topped off with agave nectar.
recipeIngredient:
1 part Sauza® Gold Tequila
1/2 part DeKuyper® Triple Sec Liqueur
2 parts Orange Juice
2 parts Lime Juice
2 parts Agave Nectar
Citrus Margarita.name: Citrus Margarita
Citrus Margarita.recipeInstructions: Add all ingredients to an ice-filled shaker. Shake well. Strain over ice into glass

Dekuyper Triple Sec Liqueur.description: DeKuyper® Triple Sec Cordial brings the essence of orange to your favorite cocktails. DeKuyper's blend meticulously melds the flavors of sweet and bitter oranges from distilled dried peels for a one-of-a-kind liqueur. An essential ingredient in any bartender's repertoire, this cordial has a pronounced and lingering citrus taste. No margarita, long island iced tea, or cosmopolitan is complete without the distinctive orange flavor of triple sec.

Sauza Gold Tequila.description: According to legend, when the Spanish conquistadors ran out of the brandy they brought from Europe, they began to distill a local agave drink, which became North America’s first indigenous distilled spirit. In 1873, this golden beverage was dubbed “tequila” by Don Cenobio Sauza, who founded La Perseverancia Distillery in Tequila, Mexico. He became the first to export tequila to the rest of the world, and today, Sauza offers a full line of tequila. Sauza® Gold, one of the pioneer spirits from the brand, is double distilled in copper pot stills at low proof to retain the full agave flavor. It offers sweet aromas of caramel and cooked agave with a lightly astringent, sweet finish. Ideal for margaritas.

Tres Agaves Agave Nectar.description: Our organic cocktail-ready agave nectar, made with organic agaves, is the original and only organic agave sweetener on the market created specifically for Margaritas and other mixed drinks.  We've balanced it with just enough purified water so it measures, pours, and dissolves easily, with a consistent sweetness level, making it the finest simple syrup available.  Just add TRES AGAVES 100% Agave Tequila and unsweetened lime juice for the ultimate fresh Margarita!

Citrus Marmalade Mule.description: Looking for something new and refreshing to drink?  Here is your go-to.  Take the traditional mule to the next level with orange marmalade, fresh mint leaves and don't forget the frosty copper mug.  It certainly will not disappoint.
Citrus Marmalade Mule.name: Citrus Marmalade Mule
Citrus Marmalade Mule.recipeInstructions: Fill your copper mug with ice. In your shaker-pour your vodka, add orange marmalade, fresh mint leaves, and lime juice. Shake to combine. Pour over ice. Add ginger beer. Stir and garnish with lime and mint leaves. Enjoy!

Goslings Ginger Beer.description: We didn’t steer you wrong on the whole shorts thing. Trust us on this one, too. We spent over a year to achieve the ideal balance of sweetness and spiciness and matching it to the flavour profile of our award-winning Black Seal Rum.    Only our Black Seal Rum makes a Dark ‘n Stormy genuine. Only our Ginger Beer makes it perfect.

Citrus Mint Pinot Grigio.description: It's funny—our Pinot Grigio is already known for its fresh and crisp flavor, but we just can't seem to stop ourselves from adding more. This Citrus Mint cocktail will magnify everything you already love about this classic white wine.
recipeIngredient: 1 L The Naked Grape Pinot Grigio
Citrus Mint Pinot Grigio.name: Citrus Mint Pinot Grigio
Citrus Mint Pinot Grigio.recipeInstructions:
In a
large pitcher, combine all ingredients. . Let chill
for 2-4 hours (or overnight, if you can wait that long!). Serve
chilled or over ice.

The Naked Grape Pinot Grigio.description: Light-bodied, crisp white wine with aromas of pear, lemon and honey.

Classic Hot Toddy.description: For colder days ahead, warm up with the Old Forester classic hot toddy.
Classic Hot Toddy.name: Classic Hot Toddy
Classic Hot Toddy.recipeInstructions: In a mug, combine all liquid ingredients. Garnish with floating lemon wheel and fresh grated nutmeg on top

Old Forester Bourbon.description: Old Forester 86 Proof is America's First Bottled Bourbon. At 86 Proof, Old Forester delivers a fresh and bright flavor profile perfect for sipping neat, on the rocks, with a splash of water or in a classic cocktail.

Classic Margarita.description: Timeless and simple, there’s a reason classics never go out of style. Tequila, aromatic triple sec and zesty lime make up the classic margarita recipe we’ve come to love. Pair it with a salty or spicy dish for an explosion of flavors.
Classic Margarita.name: Classic Margarita
Classic Margarita.recipeInstructions:
Combine all ingredients
in mixing glass and shake vigorously with ice. Strain
over fresh ice in glass. Garnish
with a lime wheel or wedge on the rim and serve. Salt
optional

Sauza Silver Tequila.description: According to legend, when the Spanish conquistadors ran out of the brandy they brought from Europe, they began to distill a local agave drink, which became North America’s first indigenous distilled spirit. In 1873, this golden beverage was dubbed “tequila” by Don Cenobio Sauza, who founded La Perseverancia Distillery in Tequila, Mexico. He became the first to export tequila to the rest of the world, and today, Sauza offers a full line of tequila. Sauza® Silver, one of the pioneer spirits from the brand, is double distilled in copper pot stills at low proof to retain the full agave flavor. The aroma offers fresh green apple notes followed by jasmine and hints of spice with a fresh agave taste on the palate. It finishes with a moderate bite of bitter citrus. Ideal for margaritas.

Dekuyper Triple Sec Liqueur.description: DeKuyper® Triple Sec Cordial brings the essence of orange to your favorite cocktails. DeKuyper's blend meticulously melds the flavors of sweet and bitter oranges from distilled dried peels for a one-of-a-kind liqueur. An essential ingredient in any bartender's repertoire, this cordial has a pronounced and lingering citrus taste. No margarita, long island iced tea, or cosmopolitan is complete without the distinctive orange flavor of triple sec.

Stirrings Simple Syrup.description: Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is a starting point for many great cocktails. Set the foundation of your delicious drink with this kosher syrup, 12 oz, and take the guesswork out of making a tasty cocktail. This simple tonic, pack of 6, contains pure cane sugar and purified water in just the right proportion. This Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is the original inspiration for Stirrings "simple mixers" and is the critical first step for a yummy cocktail.

Cleanse-a-rita.description: This easy take on a margarita combines one of the most popular juice cleanse recipes with tequila for a drink just under 120 calories. The spicy cayenne pepper and tart lemon complement tequila's bite for a balanced beverage you can enjoy almost guilt-free.
Cleanse-a-rita.name: Cleanse-a-rita
Cleanse-a-rita.recipeInstructions: In a cocktail shaker, combine tequila, lemon, water, agave syrup, and a small pinch of cayenne pepper with ice. Shake vigorously until cold. Pour into a rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge dusted with salt and cayenne pepper

ReaLemon Lemon Juice.description: ReaLemon is 100% real lemon juice made from concentrate, and it's a great alternative to the hassle of fresh lemons. ReaLemon is a space-saving kitchen sidekick, ideal for adding a delicious twist of lemon to your favorite seafood and poultry recipes, plus it's great in marinades and it brightens up both hot and cold beverages. Since 1934, ReaLemon has been a trusted brand to deliver quality lemon juice.

Finest Call Agave Nectar.description:
This sweetener is made using authentic agave nectar from the Blue Agave plant found in the Jalisco region of Mexico. Use this premium sweetener in your top shelf margaritas and more!

• The agave nectar in our product is all-natural, organic and harvested from the fleshy leaves of the agave plant in the arid soil of Mexico

• Agave nectar's very low glycemic level has made it popular for health conscious consumers and a natural for use in upscale beverages

Clementine Crush.description: Jam-packed with tangy citrus flavor and a dash of tequila, this clementine cocktail never disappoints.
recipeIngredient: 1 part Sauza® Signature Blue Silver Tequila
Clementine Crush.name: Clementine Crush
Clementine Crush.recipeInstructions:
Add ingredients to an
ice­-filled shaker. Shake and strain over ice into glass and serve

Rose's Lime Juice.description: Rose's lime juice, often known simply as Rose's, is a concentrated fruit juice patented in 1867. This makes it the world's first concentrated bottled fruit juice drink.

Sauza Signature Blue Silver Tequila.description:
According to legend, when the Spanish conquistadors ran out of the brandy they brought from Europe, they began to distill a local agave drink, which became North America’s first indigenous distilled spirit. In 1873, this golden beverage was dubbed “tequila” by Don Cenobio Sauza, who founded La Perseverancia Distillery in Tequila, Mexico. He became the first to export tequila to the rest of the world, and today, Sauza offers a full line of tequila. Sauza® Signature Blue Silver Tequila is a 100% agave tequila complemented by an added herbal dimension for a consistently smooth flavor. Bright silver with crystal hints, the aroma of this tequila offers a balance of agave and herbal notes with hints of spice while agave and citrus flavors can be tasted on the palate. The short finish also has a warm, balanced body. Ideal for margaritas.

Winner of Gold Medal at the 2017 SIP Awards

Cl\u00e1sico 1934.description: A modernized take on the classic rum Manhattan. This drink was designed in 2016 in New York City and named after the year the Arechabala family registered and launched HAVANA CLUB rum in Cuba.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 part Martini & Rossi Rosso Sweet Vermouth
Cl\u00e1sico 1934.name: Clásico 1934
Cl\u00e1sico 1934.recipeInstructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass. Stir all ingredients vigorously with plenty of ice until very cold. Strain into a rocks glass with an ice sphere. Garnish with an orange lemon peel

Martini & Rossi Rosso Sweet Vermouth.description: Fortified wine from Italy that is distilled with a combination of more than 30 herbs and spices including sage, coriander, allspice, and Roman camomile. Used as an ingredient in many cocktails, the most well known being the Manhattan. Sweet vermouth is red in color. It is fortified with brandy making it a higher proof than unfortified wines. Also used in many cooking recipes. Vermouth has a stable shelf life and can be stored for up to a year without refrigeration.

Angostura Orange Bitters.description: Angostura® orange bitters is made from the peels of sun-ripened Caribbean oranges grown in lush, green orchards located in Trinidad. These oranges are hand-picked by select citrus growers and harvested only within the rainy season to ensure ultimate freshness and taste. Clear and with an unparalleled depth of flavour, Angostura® orange bitters is an exotic and versatile bitters that works incredibly well with vodka, gin and whisky, and adds real depth of flavour to rum cocktails. Its complexity and layers of flavours also makes it a culinary must-have ingredient. World renowned chefs have found that it works particularly well in savoury sauces, it complements seafood dishes, and marries well with chocolate.

Averna Amaro.description: Averna is a classic Italian after-dinner liqueur and a traditional amaro. Made in Sicily, Averna is velvety on the palate with orange hints balanced with licorice and Mediterranean herbs such as myrtle, juniper, rosemary, sage and aromatic resins. Averna is still made using the same recipe originally made popular by Salvatore Averna in Caltanissetta in 1868.

Havana Club Anejo Clasico.description:
The Arechabala Family started their rum-making business in 1878 in Cuba. They first registered the Havana Club trademark in 1934. With its well-rounded flavor featuring notes of tropical fruits and hints of vanilla and oak, Havana Club quickly became a beloved and iconic Cuban brand. It was a favorite of locals as well as American and European tourists flocking to Cuba’s chic nightspots and casinos from the late 1930s to the 1960s. Havana Club became one of the symbols of the razzle and dazzle of that Golden Age.

The Havana Club Anejo Clasico is distilled and aged in Puerto Rico under the Caribbean sun for 1-3 years in oak barrels. The aged rums are then blended together and aged for a second period in oak barrels for at least 3 months. The result, a smooth and velvety finish rum with hints and notes of pineapple, apricot, almonds and vanilla.

Coconut Chambord Slush.description: It's a slightly weird one, this slush, but you'll enjoy it all the same. It’s a bit tropical, a bit berry-tastic (oh, that’s not a thing? Now it is) and really who doesn’t enjoy a good slush on a hot day? Sure, it may have been about 40 degrees out when I made these, but you get the point.
Coconut Chambord Slush.name: Coconut Chambord Slush
Coconut Chambord Slush.recipeInstructions: Shake coconut cream until combined (separation is normal).. Combine Chambord, coconut cream, dark rum, and club soda in a blender.. Add 2 cups of ice (to start, you can add more if you'd like for consistency purposes).. Blend until mixed.. Pour into glasses.. Garnish with berries and coconut!

Chambord Black Raspberry Liqueur.description: Chambord® is a premium liqueur produced in the Loire Valley of France. An infusion of raspberries, blackberries and the exotic flavors of black raspberries, black currant, Madagascar vanilla and XO cognac, Chambord creates a more extraordinary cocktail.

Myers's Original Dark Rum.description:
Enjoy the unique taste of Caribbean rum with Myers's Original Dark Rum. With the initial aroma of mahogany and charred wood, our dark rum satisfies with a mildly sweet and moderately full-bodied palate of dark caramel and toasted coconut husks. Made with Jamaican molasses, our 100% fine Jamaican rum is expertly boiled, fermented and distilled using both column and pot stills. Matured for up to 4 years in white oak barrels, our rum adds a delicious kick to cocktails and traditional cooking recipes. Simply add with cola and pour over ice for a classic mixed drink.

Myers's Rum gained its namesake in 1879 when founder, Fred L. Myers, started producing rum in Jamaica with his son. Since then, we have maintained his dedication to quality ingredients for every bottle of rum produced. Enjoy over 130 years of good rum with Myers's. Please drink responsibly.

Coconut Water Mangorita Beach Bag.description:
This refreshing combo of coconut water, mango and tequila is the perfect frozen drink for any beach day.

Check out the rest of our 'Beach Bag' cocktails!
Coconut Water Mangorita Beach Bag.name: Coconut Water Mangorita Beach Bag
Coconut Water Mangorita Beach Bag.recipeInstructions: Combine all ingredients into a small 8 oz zip-top plastic bag and seal. . Gently shake bag to mix. . Lay flat in freezer for 6-8 hours until frozen. . When ready to serve gently crush bag contents until a slush.. Open bag and drop in garnish and serve with a straw.

Zico Coconut Water.description: ZICO contains five electrolytes to support rapid hydration. .. One ZICO has as much potassium as a banana to help prevent cramping. Drink ZICO before or during a workout for the natural energy needed for optimal performance. After a workout, ZICO replenishes and re-hydrates to aide recovery.

Coffee After Eight.description: Nothing says holiday to us more than minty chocolate. This drink can be enjoyed hot or over coffee ice cubes (so the flavor doesn't dilute). It's the perfect way to keep the party going late into the night.
Coffee After Eight.name: Coffee After Eight
Coffee After Eight.recipeInstructions: Combine schnapps, creme de cacao, heavy cream, coffee in a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously until cold and strain into a mug filled with coffee ice cubes

DeKuyper Peppermint Schnapps Liqueur.description: DeKuyper® Peppermint Schnapps Liqueur infuses your cocktails with fresh peppermint flavor. Cool and refreshing, this delicious clear schnapps is made with peppermint extract. Perfect for holiday cocktails, this liqueur brings a smooth and minty note to any drink year-round.

Cognac Caipirinha.description: In honor of the 2016 summer games in Brazil, Rémy Martin has put a unique twist on the country's national cocktail: the Caipirinha. This refreshing cocktail is the perfect combination of sweet and tart.
Cognac Caipirinha.name: Cognac Caipirinha
Cognac Caipirinha.recipeInstructions: Cut up a lemon into 6 wedges. Muddle the wedges in a rocks glass with simple syrup. Add Rémy Martin VSOP and top with ice. Stir and enjoy!

Remy Martin VSOP.description: Remy Martin V.S.O.P is the world's favorite Fine Champagne V.S.O.P an honor it has held since its introduction in 1927. Known by its frosted green bottle, this is Remy Martin's flagship brand. It is smooth, complex, yet balanced, and perfectly mature. Of all V.S.O.Ps sold worldwide, one of every three bottles sold is Remy Martin V.S.O.P.

Stirrings Simple Syrup.description: Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is a starting point for many great cocktails. Set the foundation of your delicious drink with this kosher syrup, 12 oz, and take the guesswork out of making a tasty cocktail. This simple tonic, pack of 6, contains pure cane sugar and purified water in just the right proportion. This Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is the original inspiration for Stirrings "simple mixers" and is the critical first step for a yummy cocktail.

Cointreau After Dark.description: A simple cocktail with only two ingredients, the Cointreau After Dark is a smooth addition to any holiday soirée.
Cointreau After Dark.name: Cointreau After Dark
Cointreau After Dark.recipeInstructions: Pour Cointreau into a rocks glass . Top with chocolate bitters. Add ice and stir briefly. Garnish with an orange peel

Cointreau.description:
Cointreau, the crystal clear Orange Liqueur, founded in Angers, France, remains one of the world's most distinguished spirits with over 160 years of history. 


Renowned for its perfect balance of sweet and bitter orange peels and made with only the finest all-natural ingredients, Cointreau has a uniquely refreshing and complex taste. A versatile, 80 proof spirit, Cointreau can be enjoyed as the base spirit in many cocktails, such as the Cointreau Rickey, but is also an essential ingredient in the most popular cocktails including the Margarita, the Cosmopolitan, and the Sidecar.

The Bitter Truth Chocolate Bitters.description: Tall, dark and although not necessarily handsome, most definitely rich: with cocoa butter and dark chocolate to entice the nose, hints of vanilla, cinnamon and bitter tones of gentian and wormwood elicit the palate. The Bitter Truth Chocolate Bitters play exceptionally well with sweet Vermouths and all kinds of aged spirits like Whisk(e)y, Rum, Tequila and Brandy.

Cointreau Breeze.description: As refreshing and cooling as the summer breeze, this is an easy craft cocktail that can be enjoyed year round.
Cointreau Breeze.name: Cointreau Breeze
Cointreau Breeze.recipeInstructions: Add ingredients to an iced highball. Briefly stir

Ocean Spray Cranberry Juice Cocktail.description: Enjoy the crisp, clean taste of real cranberries straight from the bog. It’s a delicious way to get your daily dose of vitamin C and unique cranberry health benefits.

Cointreau.description:

Tropicana Pure Premium Ruby Red Grapefru.description: A combination of delicious grapefruit taste with juicy bits of pulp. Tropicana Ruby Red Grapefruit is 100% pure squeezed grapefruit juice.

Cointreau Cranberry.description: Don't use all of the cranberry sauce for the turkey!  This simple cocktail is perfect when gathered around a table for Thanksgiving or Christmas.
Cointreau Cranberry.name: Cointreau Cranberry
Cointreau Cranberry.recipeInstructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick

Cinnamon Sticks.description: Cinnamon is the dried bark of various laurel trees. Possibly the most common baking spice, Cinnamon has a sweet and woody fragrance and is used in cakes, cookies, and desserts.  Cinnamon, known for its distinct aroma, is a spice that is not only useful for cooking but also remarkable for health benefits. Try infusing into pudding or ice cream bases, stewed fruit, hot drinks and even stews made with meat or game.  These 4" cinnamon sticks are perfect for steeping in cider or grating into recipes to impart a rich cinnamon flavor.

Cointreau Cucumber Mint Rickey.description: The cooling taste of cucumber pops with the addition of fresh mint, making this Rickey a perfect refresher.
Cointreau Cucumber Mint Rickey.name: Cointreau Cucumber Mint Rickey
Cointreau Cucumber Mint Rickey.recipeInstructions: Muddle the cucumber and mint in the bottom of the glass. Pour Cointreau and fresh lime juice. Add ice, top with club soda and stir. Garnish with a cucumber wheel and a mint sprig

Canada Dry Club Soda.description: Since 1904, Canada Dry has been known for producing quality beverages and mixers. Canada Dry Club Soda offers a clean, sparkling taste, and it's the perfect addition to your favorite cocktail. It can also be enjoyed on its own for a unique, refreshing carbonated beverage alternative that contains zero calories and is caffeine free. Enjoy a refreshing taste of bubbly effervescence with Canada Dry Club Soda.

Cointreau Original Margarita.description: The Original Margarita, made with Cointreau, was the result of a chic socialite, Margarita Sames, mixing her favorite spirits together until she made the perfect drink while entertaining at home. In 1948 in Acalpuco, Mexico, the Margarita was born, made with two of her favorites: Tequila & Cointreau.
recipeIngredient:
1 oz Cointreau
2 oz Blanco Tequila
3/4 oz Fresh Lime Juice
Cointreau Original Margarita.name: Cointreau Original Margarita
Cointreau Original Margarita.recipeInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain over ice into a salt rimmed rocks glass. Garnish with a lime wheel

Espol\u00f2n Blanco.description: Espolòn Blanco, our signature tequila, is the purest expression of our passion for Mexico’s legendary spirit. Made only with 100% Blue Weber agave it carries delicate  floral and tropical fruit notes and a clean finish. Espolòn Blanco can be enjoyed neat or as the perfect accompaniment to a classic tequila cocktail. Our label, featuring the brand’s iconic rooster Ramón, is inspired by the famous Mexican artist José Guadalupe Posada and references the charge in the fight for Mexico’s independence.

Cointreau Rickey.description: Originally made with rye whiskey, the Rickey is a classic drink simply crafted with fresh lime juice, your favorite base spirit, and club soda. The Cointreau Rickey is a perfection of this American creation, as the sweetness of Cointreau beautifully balances the tartness of fresh lime.
Cointreau Rickey.name: Cointreau Rickey
Cointreau Rickey.recipeInstructions: Pour Cointreau and fresh lime juice into a glass. Add ice, top with club soda and stir. Garnish with a lime and orange zest

Cointreau Strawberry Basil Rickey.description: The distinct aromatics of fresh basil greet your palate with the promise of warmer weather. Paired with ripe strawberries, Cointreau and lime, this Rickey tastes as beautiful as it looks.
Cointreau Strawberry Basil Rickey.name: Cointreau Strawberry Basil Rickey

Collingwood Canadian Mule.description: Take the mule out of Moscow with Collingwood Canadian Whisky.
Collingwood Canadian Mule.name: Collingwood Canadian Mule
Collingwood Canadian Mule.recipeInstructions: Fill a lowball glass or mug with ice . Mix in all the ingredients. Garnish with a lemon wedge

ReaLemon Lemon Juice.description: ReaLemon is 100% real lemon juice made from concentrate, and it's a great alternative to the hassle of fresh lemons. ReaLemon is a space-saving kitchen sidekick, ideal for adding a delicious twist of lemon to your favorite seafood and poultry recipes, plus it's great in marinades and it brightens up both hot and cold beverages. Since 1934, ReaLemon has been a trusted brand to deliver quality lemon juice.

Collingwood Canadian Whisky.description: Collingwood is a distinct artisanal whisky made at Canada’s longest continuously owned and operated distillery. As a toasted maplewood-finished whisky, Collingwood is full-flavored and complex, with a long, smooth finish.

Collingwood Dry Manhattan.description: Use extra dry vermouth for this Collingwood version of a Manhattan.
Collingwood Dry Manhattan.name: Collingwood Dry Manhattan
Collingwood Dry Manhattan.recipeInstructions: Fill a shaker with ice. Add ingredients and shake well. Strain into a martini glass

Noilly Prat Extra Dry Vermouth.description: Blend of dry white wines macerated with botanicals including Roman chamomile and gentian from France, bitter orange peels from Tunisia and nutmeg from Indonesia.

Collingwood Canadian Whisky.description: Collingwood is a distinct artisanal whisky made at Canada’s longest continuously owned and operated distillery. As a toasted maplewood-finished whisky, Collingwood is full-flavored and complex, with a long, smooth finish.

Collingwood Sour.description: Make your next whiskey sour with Collingwood Canadian Whisky and enjoy this simple and classic drink.
Collingwood Sour.name: Collingwood Sour
Collingwood Sour.recipeInstructions: Fill a shaker with ice. Add in ingredients. Shake well . Strain into a low ball glass filled with fresh ice

Coopers' Cup.description: Swap Moscow for Kentucky with this mule from Coopers' Craft.
Coopers' Cup.name: Coopers' Cup
Coopers' Cup.recipeInstructions: Add first three ingredients to a tin cup over crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of lime and a sprig of mint

Rose's Lime Juice.description: Rose's lime juice, often known simply as Rose's, is a concentrated fruit juice patented in 1867. This makes it the world's first concentrated bottled fruit juice drink.

Coopers\u2019 Craft Kentucky Straight Bo.description: Coopers’ Craft bourbon is a Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey, which uses a unique beech and birch charcoal-filter finishing process for a smooth and flavorful bourbon.

Coopers' On The Rocks.name: Coopers' On The Rocks
Coopers' On The Rocks.recipeInstructions: Pour Coopers' Craft into a rocks glass. Add ice cubes

Coopers\u2019 Craft Kentucky Straight Bo.description: Coopers’ Craft bourbon is a Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey, which uses a unique beech and birch charcoal-filter finishing process for a smooth and flavorful bourbon.

Coquito.description: The creamy coconut and rum make you feel like you've been transported to the Caribbean for Christmas. Yes please. Many "true" recipes call for raw egg but we opted for  a version without here.
Coquito.name: Coquito
Coquito.recipeInstructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Mix thoroughly. Store in a bottle in the fridge for up to three days. Always serve cold over ice. Garnish with a cinnamon stick

Cosmopolitan.description: A cocktail that went from a solid sour by Tony Cecchini to Carrie Bradshaw's sugary signature. But this version brings the drink back to its authentic roots. And remember, a proper Cosmo should be pink. If it's red, it's wrong.
recipeIngredient:
1.5 oz Citrus Vodka
1 oz Cointreau
1/2 oz Fresh Lime Juice
1-2 dashes Cranberry Juice
Cosmopolitan.name: Cosmopolitan
Cosmopolitan.recipeInstructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 15-20 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge

Ocean Spray Cranberry Juice Cocktail.description: Enjoy the crisp, clean taste of real cranberries straight from the bog. It’s a delicious way to get your daily dose of vitamin C and unique cranberry health benefits.
