<!--StartFragment-->

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;
mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none">Don’t worry, you don’t
need a blender to make this daiquiri.  All you need is some really good
rum, a lime and some simple syrup. Brugal Extra Dry rum is our personal
favorite.  <p></p></p>

<!--EndFragment-->
recipeIngredient:
2 oz Brugal Extra Dry

1 oz fresh Lime Juice

3/4 oz Simple Syrup
Extra Dry Fresh-Pressed Daiquiri.name: Extra Dry Fresh-Pressed Daiquiri
Extra Dry Fresh-Pressed Daiquiri.recipeInstructions: Place all ingredients into a shaker with ice, shake vigorously to combine. Strain into a glass full of ice. Garnish with a lime wheel

Stirrings Simple Syrup.description: Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is a starting point for many great cocktails. Set the foundation of your delicious drink with this kosher syrup, 12 oz, and take the guesswork out of making a tasty cocktail. This simple tonic, pack of 6, contains pure cane sugar and purified water in just the right proportion. This Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is the original inspiration for Stirrings "simple mixers" and is the critical first step for a yummy cocktail.

Brugal Extra Dry.description: Since 1888, Brugal has been creating rum to our own, higher standards, maintained today by the fourth and fifth generation of the founder’s family.  • Smoother and less sweet than ordinary rums because we use the same continuous distillation process as the world’s purest spirits. • All Brugal is cask-aged for the entire process to the standards of the world’s finest spirits.   Brugal Extra Dry rum has a clean, smooth flavour you can enjoy on the rocks.  It also works well in mojitos, fresh-pressed daiquiris and other cocktails.

Fall Harvest Beer Cocktail.description: Try this beer cocktail alongside your traditional turkey dinner this holiday season. It's a fun mix of flavors but also packs a punch. Enjoy responsibly friends.
Fall Harvest Beer Cocktail.name: Fall Harvest Beer Cocktail
Fall Harvest Beer Cocktail.recipeInstructions: Combine bourbon, cider, lemon juice in a shaker with ice. Shake until chilled and pour into a fresh glass with ice. Top with Pumpkin beer

Shipyard Seasonal.description: Note: this is a seasonal product and the selection will change month to month. Please contact your local retailer for more information.

Fennel Fizz Cocktail.description: This fizzy wine concoction is the perfect cocktail after a long day!
recipeIngredient: 1 bottle Kim Crawford Chardonnay, well chilled
Fennel or Dill Fronds to garnish
Fennel Fizz Cocktail.name: Fennel Fizz Cocktail
Fennel Fizz Cocktail.recipeInstructions: In a small saucepan bring sugar, water, and fennel seeds to a boil. Simmer 15 min. Cool 30 mins or overnight, strain to remove seeds. Divide the wine between 5 ice filled glasses. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons fennel syrup to each glass, stir. Garnish with the fennel wedges and fronds. Add a splash of club soda and serve

Canada Dry Club Soda.description: Since 1904, Canada Dry has been known for producing quality beverages and mixers. Canada Dry Club Soda offers a clean, sparkling taste, and it's the perfect addition to your favorite cocktail. It can also be enjoyed on its own for a unique, refreshing carbonated beverage alternative that contains zero calories and is caffeine free. Enjoy a refreshing taste of bubbly effervescence with Canada Dry Club Soda.

Kim Crawford Unoaked Chardonnay.description: White peach, grapefruit and melon with a hint of pineapple flavours are supported by a soft and textured mouthfeel (achieved through malolactic fermentation). It may have no oak, but this wine has an abundance of character. Drink it with all seafood, delicate white meats and creamy pasta dishes.

Finlandia Finnish Line.description: A refreshing vodka tonic with a taste of grapefruit and zesty lime.
Finlandia Finnish Line.name: Finlandia Finnish Line
Finlandia Finnish Line.recipeInstructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add ingredients. Stir lightly. Garnish with a grapefruit wedge

Spindrift Grapefruit Sparkling Water.description: Enjoy the tangy refreshment of Spindrift Grapefruit Sparkling Water, made with fresh squeezed grapefruits and just the right amount of carbonated water. Spindrift is simple and real--unsweetened and free of any added flavors, essences, or other additives, and it never contains anything artificial. Just real fruit and sparkling water. Spindrift can be enjoyed straight from a chilled can, poured over ice, or as a delicious mixer for your favorite cocktail.

Finlandia Grapefruit Vodka.description: Finlandia Grapefruit delivers the light and fresh grapefruit notes with a nose-tingling coolness. It has the bright taste of freshly squeezed grapefruit and the warmth of pure vodka.

Finlandia Finnish Mule.description: A fruity and Finnish take on the Moscow Mule.
Finlandia Finnish Mule.name: Finlandia Finnish Mule
Finlandia Finnish Mule.recipeInstructions: Build the ingredients in an ice-filled copper mug. Stir lightly. Garnish with ginger stalks, cucumber, and a lime wedge

Finlandia Grapefruit Vodka.description: Finlandia Grapefruit delivers the light and fresh grapefruit notes with a nose-tingling coolness. It has the bright taste of freshly squeezed grapefruit and the warmth of pure vodka.

Finlandia Herbarium.description: Create a fresh cocktail with a less ordinary herbal twist.
Finlandia Herbarium.name: Finlandia Herbarium
Finlandia Herbarium.recipeInstructions: Fill a pitcher with ice. Add the ingredients to the pitcher. Stir well. Garnish with additional herbs

Canada Dry Club Soda.description: Since 1904, Canada Dry has been known for producing quality beverages and mixers. Canada Dry Club Soda offers a clean, sparkling taste, and it's the perfect addition to your favorite cocktail. It can also be enjoyed on its own for a unique, refreshing carbonated beverage alternative that contains zero calories and is caffeine free. Enjoy a refreshing taste of bubbly effervescence with Canada Dry Club Soda.

Rose's Lime Juice.description: Rose's lime juice, often known simply as Rose's, is a concentrated fruit juice patented in 1867. This makes it the world's first concentrated bottled fruit juice drink.

Stirrings Simple Syrup.description: Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is a starting point for many great cocktails. Set the foundation of your delicious drink with this kosher syrup, 12 oz, and take the guesswork out of making a tasty cocktail. This simple tonic, pack of 6, contains pure cane sugar and purified water in just the right proportion. This Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is the original inspiration for Stirrings "simple mixers" and is the critical first step for a yummy cocktail.

Finlandia Vodka.description: Finlandia Classic is an extremely light tasting and delicate vodka with a crisp and clean taste.

Finlandia Oaks Lily.description: This horse race favorite is a fruity go-to all year long!
Finlandia Oaks Lily.name: Finlandia Oaks Lily
Finlandia Oaks Lily.recipeInstructions: Fill a stemless wine glass with crushed ice. Add in the ingredients. Stir. Add a straw. Garnish with blackberries and a lemon wedge

Ocean Spray Cranberry Juice Cocktail.description: Enjoy the crisp, clean taste of real cranberries straight from the bog. It’s a delicious way to get your daily dose of vitamin C and unique cranberry health benefits.

Finlandia Vodka.description: Finlandia Classic is an extremely light tasting and delicate vodka with a crisp and clean taste.

Finlandia Raspberry Lemonade.description: The sweet, fruity flavor of Finlandia Raspberry flavored vodka is perfect for this delicious Spring or Summer drink.
Finlandia Raspberry Lemonade.name: Finlandia Raspberry Lemonade
Finlandia Raspberry Lemonade.recipeInstructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add ingredients. Stir lightly. Garnish with a lemon wedge

Ocean Spray Cranberry Juice Cocktail.description: Enjoy the crisp, clean taste of real cranberries straight from the bog. It’s a delicious way to get your daily dose of vitamin C and unique cranberry health benefits.

Simply Lemonade.description: Enjoy refreshing, all-natural lemonade with no added preservatives colors or artificial flavors.

Finlandia Raspberry Vodka.description: A rich natural taste of raspberries followed by the delicate suggestion of chocolate—no other taste in the world matches the distinct flavor of our Finlandia Raspberry Vodka. The delightful berry warmth enhances the clean, crisp taste of Finlandia Classic Vodka.

Fireball Shot.description: Does not get easier than this. Fireball has become quite the crowd favorite shooter as of late. We suggest chilling the bottle; the icy temperature and spicy cinnamon flavor complement each other quite nicely.
Fireball Shot.name: Fireball Shot
Fireball Shot.recipeInstructions: Pour chilled Fireball whiskey into a shot glass

Fireball Cinnamon Whisky.description:
Fireball Cinnamon Whisky is one of the most popular and famous whiskies in America. The drink was first produced in the 1980s, and over the years, it slowly became popular in Canada and outside the country.

When it was first made, Fireball was one of Seagram's several flavored schnapps drinks. In 1989, Sazerac Company purchased the rights to the formula and the brand from Seagram. At first, Sazerac branded this as Dr. McGillicuddy's Fireball Whisky. It wasn't until years later in 2007 that the drink was re-branded to the Fireball Cinnamon Whisky most people now recognize.

The flavor of Fireball is unlike anything else. Even other cinnamon whiskies are difficult to compare. The drink goes down smooth, and as the branding will have you know, it's fiery. It's warming in the belly and flavorful on the tongue. You'll get the flavor of a cinnamon candy with all the spicy and sweet tones that you've always loved.

There are a ton of ways to drink Fireball Whisky, depending on your mood and preferences. If you're in the mood for the whisky itself, you can take it as a shot or drink it on the rocks. For many, however, the strong flavor of Fireball is hard to take straight. Luckily, there are so many outstanding mixed drinks you can make with Fireball that you'll have tons of options to choose from.

Enhance your cider drink with Fireball. Add a shot of Fireball to a pint of your favorite hard cider for an awesome cinnamon taste. The most commonly suggested cider for this drink is Angry Orchard Crisp Apple Cider, but any cider will work.

Try a mixed shot for something a little different. Combine Fireball and coffee liqueur in a shot glass for a spicy coffee flavor. If you're in the mood for a fizzy drink, combine one part Fireball and three parts Dr. Pepper for a Hot Pepper. The fireball helps bring out all the other flavors in the soda, making it a fun drink.

Buy Fireball Cinnamon Whisky online at a great price through Drizly and have it delivered directly to your door or pick it up in store.

Fireside.description: A refreshing grapefruit cocktail with a wintery addition of rosemary and maple syrup, the Fireside will keep you aglow all season long.
recipeIngredient: 2 sprigs Rosemary (remove the leaves of one sprig)
Fireside.name: Fireside
Fireside.recipeInstructions: In the bottle of a rocks glass, crush rosemary leaves into the maple syrup and salt. Fill the glass with ice and add Grey Goose. Top with grapefruit juice and stir well. Garnish with sprig of rosemary

Grey Goose Vodka.description: GREY GOOSE® Vodka is crafted with only the finest French ingredients - soft winter wheat and Gensac spring water. The unique once distilled production process is designed to bring out the superior characteristics of these ingredients.

Flaming Dr. Pepper.description: The Flaming Dr. Pepper shot tastes just like the soda but combines the extra thrill of fire brought to you by the 151 proof rum floated on top of this shot. It's quite strong due to the rum so we don't suggest tipping back more than 1 of these a night.
recipeIngredient:
3/4 oz Amaretto Liqueur
1/4 151 proof Rum
Light Beer
Flaming Dr. Pepper.name: Flaming Dr. Pepper
Flaming Dr. Pepper.recipeInstructions: Fill a shot glass with Amaretto liqueur and top with 1/4 oz of 151 proof rum. Put the shot glass into an empty pint glass then fill around the shot glass up to the rim with light beer. Light the rum on fire with a lighter or match. Blow out the flame and shoot back the drink

Disaronno Originale Amaretto.description: Disaronno Amaretto is one of the world's most popular Italian liqueurs. The distinct almond flavor makes for a delicious sipping liqueur or pair perfectly in a number of cocktails.

Bacardi 151.description:
Next time you’re pouring rum cocktails for your cohorts, serve up this nugget of rum trivia: Bacardi 151 gets its name for its proof level of 151. At 75.5%
alcohol by volume, that’s nearly double the level of typical rum. Wowza. All that alcohol means it’s highly flammable, so be responsible friends. Balance Bacardi 151’s punch by using it sparingly in sweet, fruity drinks, such as Hurricanes or Rum Punches.

Food & Wine Zee Spotted Pig Bloody Mary.description: Bartender Anna Vanderzee suggests making the mix for this recipe one day in advance to allow the spices and horseradish to marry with the tomato juice.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup finely grated peeled fresh horseradish
Finely grated zest of 1 small lemon
Food & Wine Zee Spotted Pig Bloody Mary.name: Food & Wine Zee Spotted Pig Bloody Mary
Food & Wine Zee Spotted Pig Bloody Mary.recipeInstructions: In a pitcher, combine the horseradish, Worcestershire sauce, Sriracha, lemon zest, celery salt, kosher salt and 2 tsps ground pepper. Add the tomato juice and stir well. Cover and refrigerate until chilled, at least 2 hours. Pour the tomato juice mixture into 8 ice-filled rocks glasses. Add 2 oz of vodka to each glass and stir. Garnish each drink with a pinch of ground pepper, a lime wedge and pickled vegetables

Campbell's Tomato Juice.description: Campbell's® Tomato Juice from Concentrate is the perfect blend of taste and nutrition. Campbell's only uses tomatoes that are vine ripened to perfection to ensure that your patrons get the full rich tomato flavor you've come to expect from Campbell's Tomato Juice from Concentrate.

Sriracha Hot Chili Sauce.description: Sriracha is made from sun ripen chilies which are ground into a smooth paste along with garlic and packaged in a convenient squeeze bottle. It is excellent in soups, sauces, pastas, pizzas, hot dogs, hamburgers, chowmein or on anything else to give it a delicious, spicy taste. Like all our sauces, we use only the highest quality ingredients and never any artificial colors or flavorings. Huy fong foods' chili sauces are made from fresh, red jalapeno chili peppers and contain no water or artificial colors.

Foxy Aperol Spritz.description: A sparkling wine-based cocktail traditionally served in the northern part of Italy during "apertif hour". Essential to the spritz is an Italian bitter orange liqueur such as Aperol, which is in the same family as Campari but a little less bitter and a little more refined. This Simple Aperol Spritz is fairly low in alcohol, luckily, because it goes down a little too easily! Cin cin!
recipeIngredient:
2 oz Aperol
3 oz Dry Prosecco
1 oz Club Soda
Foxy Aperol Spritz.name: Foxy Aperol Spritz
Foxy Aperol Spritz.recipeInstructions: Build in an ice-filled glass. Stir until well mixed. Garnish with an orange wheel or if you're feeling extra Italian, a green olive!

Schweppes Club Soda.description: Schweppe's original club soda makes an outstanding mixer! Universally recognized by refreshment seekers around the world, Schweppe's a must-have in any bar or party!

Aperol.description:
Aperol is a classic Italian aperitif and key ingredient in Italy’s most popular cocktail, the Aperol Spritz. Its low alcohol content makes it perfect for daytime. Bright orange in color, its unique bittersweet taste is derived from sweet and bitter oranges, herbs and roots. It is a secret recipe that has remained unchanged, since its creation in 1919.
An Aperol Spritz is unforgettably delicious and the perfect way to enjoy a weekend brunch or after work drink with friends.

Frangelico Frizzante.description: Frangelico, typically used in creamy, wintery cocktails, is also the base for a great summery, spritzy cocktail: the Frangelico Frizzante.
Frangelico Frizzante.name: Frangelico Frizzante
Frangelico Frizzante.recipeInstructions: Build over ice in a cocktail glass. Stir. Garnish with a lime wedge

Canada Dry Club Soda.description: Since 1904, Canada Dry has been known for producing quality beverages and mixers. Canada Dry Club Soda offers a clean, sparkling taste, and it's the perfect addition to your favorite cocktail. It can also be enjoyed on its own for a unique, refreshing carbonated beverage alternative that contains zero calories and is caffeine free. Enjoy a refreshing taste of bubbly effervescence with Canada Dry Club Soda.

Frangelico Hazelnut Liqueur.description: Frangelico is a premium hazelnut liqueur. It is perfect on the rocks, in coffee or as the key to transforming standard drinks into intriguing cocktails. Crafted with wild Tonda Gentile hazelnuts from the Piedmont region of northern Italy, Frangelico presents a pronounced but delicate hazelnut flavor complemented by hints of vanilla and dark chocolate.

Frank's Way.description: Enjoy Sinatra Select the way Frank would.
Frank's Way.name: Frank's Way
Frank's Way.recipeInstructions: Add ice to a rocks glass. Pour in Sinatra Select

Jack Daniel's Sinatra Select.description: Sinatra Select pays tribute to Jack’s biggest fan: Frank Sinatra. Made with our unique “Sinatra Barrels” that have deep grooves specially carved into their staves to expose the whiskey to extra layers of toasted oak. This added exposure imparts a rich amber color, bold character, and pleasant smokiness, punctuated by an incredibly smooth vanilla finish. Much like Frank, this Tennessee Whiskey is one of a kind.

Frankenbride Bellini.description: It's scary how perfect this freaky take on a Bellini is for kicking off your Halloween weekend festivities. The Basic Witches give this simple recipe two broomsticks up.
Frankenbride Bellini.name: Frankenbride Bellini
Frankenbride Bellini.recipeInstructions: Cut and core a fresh kiwi then blend into a puree using a blender. Combine 1/2 oz of kiwi puree with vodka and stir together. Pour kiwi and vodka mixture into a champagne flute. Top with a Prosecco. Garnish with 3 blackberries on a pick across the top of the glass

Franny & Joe.description: Frangelico combined with cold brew coffee is a match made in heaven. This hazelnut liqueur adds a distinct and delicious flavor to the coffee. Serve this at your next brunch as an unexpected crowd pleaser.
Franny & Joe.name: Franny & Joe
Franny & Joe.recipeInstructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and stir. Pour contents into an ice-filled stemless wine glass. Add creamer as desired

Stirrings Simple Syrup.description: Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is a starting point for many great cocktails. Set the foundation of your delicious drink with this kosher syrup, 12 oz, and take the guesswork out of making a tasty cocktail. This simple tonic, pack of 6, contains pure cane sugar and purified water in just the right proportion. This Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is the original inspiration for Stirrings "simple mixers" and is the critical first step for a yummy cocktail.

Frangelico Hazelnut Liqueur.description: Frangelico is a premium hazelnut liqueur. It is perfect on the rocks, in coffee or as the key to transforming standard drinks into intriguing cocktails. Crafted with wild Tonda Gentile hazelnuts from the Piedmont region of northern Italy, Frangelico presents a pronounced but delicate hazelnut flavor complemented by hints of vanilla and dark chocolate.

French Manhattan.description: Kentucky meets France in Chambord's take on the classic Manhattan.
French Manhattan.name: French Manhattan
French Manhattan.recipeInstructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a cherry

Woodford Reserve Kentucky Straight Bourb.description: Woodford Reserve is built around flavor. The art of making fine bourbon first took place on the site of the Woodford Reserve Distillery, a National Historic Landmark, in 1812. The perfectly balanced taste of our Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey is composed of more than 200 detectable flavor notes, from bold grain and wood, to sweet aromatics, spice, and fruit & floral notes.

Angostura Bitters.description:
You can’t—or at least you shouldn’t—make an Old Fashioned without them! Angostura Bitters are the most famous and prevalent type of bitters.  But what are bitters exactly? They are an alcoholic, highly concentrated, botanical concoction used to give your cocktail a bitter, sour, or bittersweet flavor. Because of the strong flavor bitters are added to drinks in dashes. (Two or three should do the trick.) 
This specific brand is named after Angostura, the Venezuelan town where they were first produced. The recipe is a closely guarded secret, with just five people knowing the exact formula. Angostura bitters were first used to soothe soldiers’ upset stomachs and are believed to have other healing benefits but we’re pretty sure your bottle will spend more time on your bar cart than in your medicine cabinet.

Chambord Black Raspberry Liqueur.description: Chambord® is a premium liqueur produced in the Loire Valley of France. An infusion of raspberries, blackberries and the exotic flavors of black raspberries, black currant, Madagascar vanilla and XO cognac, Chambord creates a more extraordinary cocktail.

French Martini.description: Originally created for Chambord's worldwide promotion, the key ingredient to this drink is the Chambord liqueur. The unique feature for this drink is that it was created specifically for a liqueur, which means substituting it would leave a bland taste.
recipeIngredient:
1 1/2 oz Vodka
1/4 oz Chambord Raspberry Liqueur
1/4 oz Pineapple Juice
1 Twist Lemon Peel to garnish
French Martini.name: French Martini
French Martini.recipeInstructions: Pour ingredients into shaker with ice, shake vigorously for 5-10 seconds. Pour into martini glass and enjoy

Dole Pineapple Juice.description: Dole Pineapple Juice - Beat the summer heat    Dole Pineapple Juice contains essential vitamins that help boost your metabolism and keep you nutrition even in the scorching heat. Available in pack of 8, these are the ideal potion for enjoying summers to the fullest.        Flavor: Pineapple      Servings: 8 fl Oz      Ingredients: Pineapple Juice, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Vitamin E, and Vitamin A

Chambord Black Raspberry Liqueur.description: Chambord® is a premium liqueur produced in the Loire Valley of France. An infusion of raspberries, blackberries and the exotic flavors of black raspberries, black currant, Madagascar vanilla and XO cognac, Chambord creates a more extraordinary cocktail.

Frenchie Negroni.description: A simple composition of equal parts ingredients. St-Germain softens the bitterness by adding fruity and refreshing notes to this classic aperitif.
Frenchie Negroni.name: Frenchie Negroni
Frenchie Negroni.recipeInstructions: Fill a rocks glass with ice. Add each ingredient . Garnish with an orange wedge

St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur.description:
Creating spirits is a labor of love, but few other liqueurs have such a laborious process. To gather the elderflowers needed to distill St. Germain Elderflower Liqueur, a team of 40 to 50 workers head to the French countryside and pick the blossoms of the beautiful flower. The window for picking the flowers is short, lasting only a few weeks in the spring. The rush to pick the blossoms resembles a last-minute rush by boyfriends or husbands to grab a fresh bouquet on Valentine's Day, but St. Germain Elderflower Liqueur boasts more satisfied recipients. Once picked, a race starts to begin the distillation process as the delicate flavors begin to dissipate only a short time after harvest.
The elderflowers undergo a maceration process that accentuates and perpetuates their delicate flavor and aroma. The process has taken over 100 years to perfect, which makes mastery of video games look far less impressive. Workers mix the elderflower blossoms with a small amount of citrus fruits and cane sugar to heighten the subtle flavor, but the result is nothing short of spectacular. It is a delicate, balanced liqueur that delivers hints of pear, apricot, lychee and grapefruit zest. Despite the fruit presence, it has a bit of tartness to balance it out. It's not exactly like a liquid Sweet Tart, and only an actual taste gives you the sense of its true flavor. Mix it with champagne or other cocktails for some added sweetness, or enjoy it on its own for a mind-blowing after dinner cocktail.

Oxley Dry Gin.description: OXLEY is a revolutionary English gin with a fresh, bright, smooth classic gin taste. Unlike any other spirit, OXLEY is made by the innovative Cold Distillation process. Cold Distillation occurs at -5C capturing the natural flavours of the botanicals and preserving them in the final spirit.

Fresh Paloma.description: Mexico's most popular cocktail was created by a legendary barman in Tequila, Mexico, and it's fast become a favorite across the land. Meaning "dove," a paloma is simple, refreshing, and packed with el Jimador flavor.
Fresh Paloma.name: Fresh Paloma
Fresh Paloma.recipeInstructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add el Jimador, grapefruit soda, and salt. Garnish with a lime wedge. Relax!

El Jimador Silver Tequila.description: El Jimador silver is made with 100% hand-harvested blue Weber agave and double distilled with sparkling clarity as it is bottled immediately after we create it. It has a smooth and distinct agave taste with hints of citrusy sweetness.

Frostbite.description: Made in Minnesota, there's one thing UV Vodka knows for sure: this is one kind of frostbite you'll 100% enjoy.
Frostbite.name: Frostbite

UV Blue Raspberry Vodka.description: Expected is…boring, which is the opposite of UV Blue. Naturally flavored with vine-ripened raspberries, UV Blue adds a touch of sudden sweetness to any situation. Try it with lemonade, lemon-lime soda or almost any other mixer.

Fros\u00e9 Vos\u00e9.description: An icy treat to beat the heat, this refreshing take on a blended cocktail is up for anything.
Fros\u00e9 Vos\u00e9.name: Frosé Vosé
Fros\u00e9 Vos\u00e9.recipeInstructions: Combine all ingredients and one cup of ice in a blender. Blend. Garnish with fresh fruit

Ice.description: Premium Packaged Ice. Ideal for large gatherings, events or for the business that needs large quantities of quality, sanitary ice.

Dolin Dry Vermouth.description: Dolin Vermouths are notably lighter, drier and less pungent than their larger commercial counterparts. The particular mixture of plants found near Chambéry give a fresh, restrained and elegant nose, with a subtle, complex bittersweet palate. Even the Blanc and Rouge retain great balance, with the sugar never cloying, and just enough bitterness to whet the appetite. Each can be enjoyed as aperitif on ice, with a twist of citrus, or in a broad array of traditional cocktails.

Three Olives Ros\u00e9 Vodka.description:
Why just rosé all day, when you can vosé all day and night? Three Olives Rosé Vodka means there’s no reason to let the party stop at sundown. You’ll notice strawberry and tart cherry scent with subtle backgrounds of citrus and wildflower on the nose and hints of pomegranate that develops into blended red fruit and French oak on the tongue. 

Get ready - because a few sips of this and you’ll be a bonafide vosé expert ready to drop tasting notes and finishing flavors at the drop of a hot little party hat.

Simply Grapefruit Juice.description: Citrus lovers have an exhilarating alternative! Made from a harmonious blend of grapefruit varieties, Simply Grapefruit® is a 100% not-from-concentrate grapefruit juice.

Frozen Cucumber Gin & Tonic.description: This refreshing frozen cocktail is perfect for those sweltering summer days! Using tonic water ice cubes (you literally just freeze tonic water in an ice cube tray!) helps to add a little extra flavor and keep it icy cold without watering it down. Using regular ice cubes, in combination with the tonic ice cubes, helps add to the slush factor.
recipeIngredient: ½ cup tonic water ice cubes
Frozen Cucumber Gin & Tonic.name: Frozen Cucumber Gin & Tonic
Frozen Cucumber Gin & Tonic.recipeInstructions: To a blender add gin, lime juice, tonic water, and cucumber. Blend well to pulverize the cucumber. Add tonic water and regular ice cubes. Blend until slushy with no large ice chunks

Hendrick's Gin.description:
Proudly touted as "a most unusual gin," Hendrick's Gin is a delightfully curious liquid with a unique character that stands out from the rest. This small-batch gin is produced by William Grant & Sons and infused with cucumber, rose and traditional juniper at the brand's Scottish distillery. Small batches are typically defined as 1,000 liters or fewer, but Hendrick's Gin is crafted in tiny 500-liter batches, giving the master distiller more control over her artistry.

Hendrick's is the result of combining two different spirits from rare and unusual stills: the Bennet still and the Carter-Head still. The exceptionally smooth gin features a nice balance of subtle flavors, which include wonderful notes of flowers, fruits, roots and seeds from across the world. In fact, the Wall Street Journal has described Hendrick's as the "Best Gin in the World."

William Grant & Sons suggests serving the gin over ice with tonic water. Garnish with a cucumber slice instead of the traditional lemon wedge. Another great option is to serve the gin with soda water and a bit of elderflower.

You can also create an odd variety of cocktails with distinctive bouquets. Gordon's Cup is a sour-and-salty concoction that marries cucumber, salt and pepper, lime juice and freshly ground salt and pepper. If that's too ambitious, try a simple Gin & Tonic using Hendrick's.

Buy Hendrick’s Gin online at a great price on Drizly and have it delivered directly to your door or pick up in store.

Schweppes Tonic Water.description: For over 200 years, Schweppes has produced classic carbonated beverages. Schweppes Tonic Water combines carbonated water with bittersweet quinine and is caffeine free. Make Schweppes Tonic Water your go to mixer for cocktails or enjoy as a soft drink alternative. Live excellently with the classic taste of Schweppes Tonic Water.

Frozen Peach & Chambord Mezcal Margarita.description: Although gin is my truest love, I have been fixated on both tequila and Mezcal lately. There is something about margaritas and tequila-based cocktails that beckon the arriving of summer, and this one is hard to resist.
recipeIngredient: Generous drizzle of Chambord black raspberry liqueur, for garnish
Frozen Peach & Chambord Mezcal Margarita.name: Frozen Peach & Chambord Mezcal Margarita
Frozen Peach & Chambord Mezcal Margarita.recipeInstructions: In a high-speed blender, combine the tequila, Mezcal, peach slices,  lime juice, and ice. As a general rule, use equal parts per volume of ice to liquids. Process until smooth, starting on the lowest setting and slowly increasing to the highest.. Taste for balance, adding agave nectar for additional sweetness.. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass and drizzle liberally with Chambord, adding a sprig of mint for garnish.

Sauza Silver Tequila.description: According to legend, when the Spanish conquistadors ran out of the brandy they brought from Europe, they began to distill a local agave drink, which became North America’s first indigenous distilled spirit. In 1873, this golden beverage was dubbed “tequila” by Don Cenobio Sauza, who founded La Perseverancia Distillery in Tequila, Mexico. He became the first to export tequila to the rest of the world, and today, Sauza offers a full line of tequila. Sauza® Silver, one of the pioneer spirits from the brand, is double distilled in copper pot stills at low proof to retain the full agave flavor. The aroma offers fresh green apple notes followed by jasmine and hints of spice with a fresh agave taste on the palate. It finishes with a moderate bite of bitter citrus. Ideal for margaritas.

Cointreau.description:
Cointreau, the crystal clear Orange Liqueur, founded in Angers, France, remains one of the world's most distinguished spirits with over 160 years of history. 


Renowned for its perfect balance of sweet and bitter orange peels and made with only the finest all-natural ingredients, Cointreau has a uniquely refreshing and complex taste. A versatile, 80 proof spirit, Cointreau can be enjoyed as the base spirit in many cocktails, such as the Cointreau Rickey, but is also an essential ingredient in the most popular cocktails including the Margarita, the Cosmopolitan, and the Sidecar.

Rose's Lime Juice.description: Rose's lime juice, often known simply as Rose's, is a concentrated fruit juice patented in 1867. This makes it the world's first concentrated bottled fruit juice drink.

Chambord Black Raspberry Liqueur.description: Chambord® is a premium liqueur produced in the Loire Valley of France. An infusion of raspberries, blackberries and the exotic flavors of black raspberries, black currant, Madagascar vanilla and XO cognac, Chambord creates a more extraordinary cocktail.

Frozen Rose Gin & Tonic.description: Summertime heat can be staggering, but this Frozen Rose Gin and Tonic is light, refreshing and has a perfect balance of rose and cucumber. It will surely cool you down.
Frozen Rose Gin & Tonic.name: Frozen Rose Gin & Tonic
Frozen Rose Gin & Tonic.recipeInstructions: Place all ingredients into a blender. . Blend on high speed until smooth.. Serve with a fancy straw!

Hendrick's Gin.description:
Proudly touted as "a most unusual gin," Hendrick's Gin is a delightfully curious liquid with a unique character that stands out from the rest. This small-batch gin is produced by William Grant & Sons and infused with cucumber, rose and traditional juniper at the brand's Scottish distillery. Small batches are typically defined as 1,000 liters or fewer, but Hendrick's Gin is crafted in tiny 500-liter batches, giving the master distiller more control over her artistry.

Hendrick's is the result of combining two different spirits from rare and unusual stills: the Bennet still and the Carter-Head still. The exceptionally smooth gin features a nice balance of subtle flavors, which include wonderful notes of flowers, fruits, roots and seeds from across the world. In fact, the Wall Street Journal has described Hendrick's as the "Best Gin in the World."

William Grant & Sons suggests serving the gin over ice with tonic water. Garnish with a cucumber slice instead of the traditional lemon wedge. Another great option is to serve the gin with soda water and a bit of elderflower.

You can also create an odd variety of cocktails with distinctive bouquets. Gordon's Cup is a sour-and-salty concoction that marries cucumber, salt and pepper, lime juice and freshly ground salt and pepper. If that's too ambitious, try a simple Gin & Tonic using Hendrick's.

Buy Hendrick’s Gin online at a great price on Drizly and have it delivered directly to your door or pick up in store.

Frozen Ros\u00e9.description: Summer cocktail season is here and a frozen concoction keeps you cool and happy!! This Frozen Rose is sure to be a crowd favorite...an adult slush made to order!
Frozen Ros\u00e9.name: Frozen Rosé
Frozen Ros\u00e9.recipeInstructions: Pour the wine into a large (13 x 9 or larger) sheet pan with lips. Freeze for at least 8+ hours. . Bring the water to a boil. Add the sugar, reduce the heat to low, and stir until all of the sugar is dissolved. . Add the strawberries to the water/sugar, and give it a solid stir. Let that mixture sit for around 30 minutes to infuse the simple syrup with the flavor of the strawberries.. Strain the strawberry syrup through a sieve, but don't mash the strawberries through, just let it flow through naturally. Save the strained strawberries to put on some ice cream later, because that would be delicious. Oh, but the syrup: Chill the syrup for 30 minutes.. Add 3 ounces of strawberry syrup, 2½ ounces lemon juice, 1 cup of ice, and the frozen wine to a blender and blend until smooth. . Serve!

Chateau d'Esclans Whispering Angel Ros\u.description:
Whispering Angel Rose is a blend of Grenache, Rolle, Cinsault, Syrah, and Mourvedre grapes. Strikingly pale pink in color, the aromas are fresh and fruity. On the palate, it is bone dry through the finish. The name really suits the delicate nature of this wine.

Caves d’esclans identifies vineyards, grapes and wines from château d’esclans as well as local growers to make what has reputedly become the world’s greatest rosé. As their objective is to obtain the best quality grapes and wines, Caves d’esclans have created relationships with the local grape growers, committed beside Caves d’esclans, whose vineyards are treated with the same high standards of quality as are the vineyards of Château d’esclans.

Frozen Sangria.description: This take on a sangria is a perfect poolside crowd pleaser!
recipeIngredient: Lemon or Orange Wheels, for garnish
Frozen Sangria.name: Frozen Sangria
Frozen Sangria.recipeInstructions: Pour sangria into an ice cube tray and freeze for at least 6 hours. It will never freeze completely due to the alcohol content, but once it's solid but still a bit soft when you push on it, it's ready. Pop the ice cubes into a blender and pour in the orange juice. Blend until smooth, about 30 seconds. You may have to stop the blender and push the ingredients down several times. Serve immediately

Oranges.description: Juicy and sweet and renowned for its concentration of vitamin C, oranges make the perfect snack and add a special tang to many recipes; it is no wonder that they are one of the most popular fruits in the world. Oranges are generally available from winter through summer with seasonal variations depending on the variety.

Black Box Red Sangria.description:
Made from grapes harvested in world-class appellations, Black Box award-winning wines hail from California’s famed wine country and the acclaimed vineyards of Argentina and Chile. 

Through a meticulous, traditional winemaking process, each wine is crafted to be food-friendly and fruit-forward - without the expense and fuss of bottled wines. 

This refreshingly delicious red Sangria exudes flavors of fresh berry and citrus fruits with hints of orange zest leading to a crisp, invigorating finish. This wine is delightful when enjoyed on its own, or when paired with spicy meats or grilled seafood.

Frozen Watermelon Moscow Mule.description: This Frozen Watermelon Moscow Mule is the refreshing drink you’ve been looking for all summer. Crisp ginger beer and lime juice are blended with the subtle flavors of watermelon and spiked with vodka to create a smooth, blended cocktail that’s sure to keep you cool.
Frozen Watermelon Moscow Mule.name: Frozen Watermelon Moscow Mule
Frozen Watermelon Moscow Mule.recipeInstructions: In a blender, add watermelon, lime juice, vodka and 6 ounces ginger beer (1/2 bottle). . Blend until watermelon is incorporated. Add remaining ginger beer and blend until smooth.. Serve in copper mugs, ice optional.

Tito's Handmade Vodka.description: Tito's Handmade Vodka is designed to be savored by spirit connoisseurs.  It is micro-distilled in an old-fashioned pot still, just like fine single malt scotches and high-end French cognacs.  This time-honored method of distillation requires more skill and effort than modern column stills, but it's well worth it. Our handcrafted technique offers more  control over the distillation process, resulting in a spectacularly clean product of incomparable excellence.  Only the heart of the run, "the nectar" is taken, leaving behind residual higher and lower alcohols.  The vodka is cleansed of phenols, esters, congenersand organic acids by filtering it through the finest activated carbon available.  Critics call Tito's "a homegrown symphonic spirit to applaud!" and say "it can go head to head with any of the worlds' greats and not break a sweat.

Goslings Ginger Beer.description: We didn’t steer you wrong on the whole shorts thing. Trust us on this one, too. We spent over a year to achieve the ideal balance of sweetness and spiciness and matching it to the flavour profile of our award-winning Black Seal Rum.    Only our Black Seal Rum makes a Dark ‘n Stormy genuine. Only our Ginger Beer makes it perfect.

Fruity Sangria.description: Knowing how to make a basic Sangria should be on everyone's to-do list. It's always a crowd-pleaser and it's the perfect pairing for spicy foods.
Fruity Sangria.name: Fruity Sangria
Fruity Sangria.recipeInstructions: Heat the orange juice and sugar over low heat to dissolve sugar. Combine all other ingredients in a pitcher. Let sit in the fridge for 1-2 hours. Serve in glasses filled with ice

Fuzzy Navel.description: This bright orange highball cocktail screams '80s. Well not really but that's when it became popular. The Fuzzy Navel is an easy-drinking libation for those that want something refreshing yet smooth.
Fuzzy Navel.name: Fuzzy Navel
Fuzzy Navel.recipeInstructions: Add ice to highball glass. Pour in peach schnapps followed by orange juice. Stir and garnish with orange

Leroux Peach Schnapps Liqueur.description: The Leroux Liqueur Company was actually started in Brussels, Belgium. However, after prohibition they really began operating Lerous & Co. Inc. in Philadelphia, United States. Seagrams obtained the company by 1940.

Game Day Peach Sour.description: Get game day ready with the Maker’s Mark Game Day Peach Sour. One part sour, one part sweet, this fruity twist on a classic bourbon sour will keep you happy no matter the score!
Game Day Peach Sour.name: Game Day Peach Sour
Game Day Peach Sour.recipeInstructions:
Combine
all ingredients in a shaker. Shake
without ice. Pour
over ice in a glass

Maker's Mark Bourbon Whisky.description:
Maker's Mark started with bread, of course. Bill Samuels bought the Burks' Distillery in Loretto, Kentucky, in 1953 and did the predictable – just not in a predictable way.

He wanted to select the right mashbill for his new Bourbon. He took inspiration from the Old Fitzgerald and W. L. Weller recipes made by Pappy Van Winkle. He did not want to take the time to distill, age and taste each candidate, so he made a loaf of bread from each mix of grain. One had no rye in it.

No rye? Samuels liked the loaf without the rye best so he ran with it. The winner contained the customary corn with malted barley and a large dose of red winter wheat. The product is in stark contrast to rye-heavy spirits like Bulleit or Knob Creek.

The result is less spicy than the rye-influenced whiskeys. Bring a glass to your nose. You'll smell spiced honey, cut fruit and citrus peel. Have a sip. Barley malt, butterscotch and vanilla bean will gradually bloom on your tongue. Wait a moment. The finish is of medium length with gentle caramel and dry oak spice.

This collection of flavors makes Maker's Mark very friendly with sweet vermouth. It makes a fine Manhattan with a cherry. Go light with the bitters. It's also a great choice with an Old Fashioned, particularly if you have dark purple Bing cherries to muddle.

If you're feeling funky, ask yourself two questions. Does bourbon like peaches? Both are as southern as sassafras. Does peach like orange? Of course, or we'd have no Fuzzy Navel. Bring all three together. Add 1 1/2 ounces of Maker's with 3/4 of an ounce peach schnapps to an ounce of OJ. Shake that well and then serve it up or on the rocks. There's a navel with some extra fuzz.

For your home bar (depending on your budget and the height of your top shelf) Maker's Mark makes a fine everyday house bourbon or a special occasion sipper to put next to your best bottles from Scotland, Ireland and Japan. Buy Maker’s Mark Whisky online at a great price on Drizly and have it delivered directly to your door or pick it up in store.

Garden Gazpacho Mary.description: We've picked some of our favorite garden flavors and created a summery twist on the classic bloody mary. Packed with fresh veggies like cucumber, red bell pepper and plum tomatoes, this drink is the perfect refreshing addition to your next backyard brunch party. For a spicy kick swap out the vodka for our Jalapeno & Cilantro Tequila.
Garden Gazpacho Mary.name: Garden Gazpacho Mary
Garden Gazpacho Mary.recipeInstructions: Seed, skin and crush the tomatoes, passing the pulp through a fine mesh strainer until you have 3/4 cup of juice.. Next seed both peppers, making sure to carefully wash your hands immediately after working with the jalapeno. . Drop all ingredients, except the vodka into a blender and blend until the vegetables look roughly chopped and combined. . Pour your mix into a pitcher and refrigerate overnight to fully integrate flavors. . To serve, place half a scoop of ice into the bottom of 5 pint glasses and pour in 1.5 oz of vodka into each. . Fill the remainder of the glass with your gazpacho mix and stir slowly to combine. . Serve with a lemon wedge and fresh vegetable garnish.

Campbell's Tomato Juice.description: Campbell's® Tomato Juice from Concentrate is the perfect blend of taste and nutrition. Campbell's only uses tomatoes that are vine ripened to perfection to ensure that your patrons get the full rich tomato flavor you've come to expect from Campbell's Tomato Juice from Concentrate.

Morton Kosher Salt.description: Morton Coarse Kosher Salt is a versatile salt loved by chefs for its texture, ease of use and its ability to bring out the natural flavors of food. The coarse flake crystals of Morton Coarse Kosher Salt are much bigger than regular table salt crystals, making it easy to pinch for measuring and sprinkling. Also, the larger flakes adhere well to food and dissolve slowly, providing a well-rounded flavor. While Morton Coarse Kosher Salt can be used in many ways, it's ideal for brining and rimming margarita glasses as well as roasting, marinades and rubs.

Gentleman's Manhattan.name: Gentleman's Manhattan
Gentleman's Manhattan.recipeInstructions: Fill a cocktail mixing glass halfway with cubed ice. Add all ingredients and stir for 10 seconds. Strain the liquid into the glass. Add 2 dark cherries on a pick and rest on side of glass to garnish

Martini & Rossi Rosso Sweet Vermouth.description: Fortified wine from Italy that is distilled with a combination of more than 30 herbs and spices including sage, coriander, allspice, and Roman camomile. Used as an ingredient in many cocktails, the most well known being the Manhattan. Sweet vermouth is red in color. It is fortified with brandy making it a higher proof than unfortified wines. Also used in many cooking recipes. Vermouth has a stable shelf life and can be stored for up to a year without refrigeration.

Jack Daniel's Gentleman Jack.description: Gentleman Jack Tennessee Whiskey undergoes a second charcoal mellowing to achieve exceptional smoothness. It has a balanced flavor with notes of caramel and vanilla that is perfect for celebrating life’s extraordinary occasions and moments along the way.

Angostura Bitters.description:
You can’t—or at least you shouldn’t—make an Old Fashioned without them! Angostura Bitters are the most famous and prevalent type of bitters.  But what are bitters exactly? They are an alcoholic, highly concentrated, botanical concoction used to give your cocktail a bitter, sour, or bittersweet flavor. Because of the strong flavor bitters are added to drinks in dashes. (Two or three should do the trick.) 
This specific brand is named after Angostura, the Venezuelan town where they were first produced. The recipe is a closely guarded secret, with just five people knowing the exact formula. Angostura bitters were first used to soothe soldiers’ upset stomachs and are believed to have other healing benefits but we’re pretty sure your bottle will spend more time on your bar cart than in your medicine cabinet.

Martini & Rossi Extra Dry Vermouth.description: MARTINI Extra Dry was launched on New Year's Day 1900. Elegant, delicate and very cool. For many it is the essential ingredient and the perfect mixer.  Characterised by its pale colour and fresh and fruity aromas - together with a sharp perfume and a tantalising sweetness - MARTINI Extra Dry is the only place to begin when mixing up a cocktail.

Gentleman's Sour.name: Gentleman's Sour
Gentleman's Sour.recipeInstructions: Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with cubed ice. Add all ingredients and shake vigorously for 20-30 seconds. Fill a rocks glass halfway with cubed ice. Strain the liquid into the glass. Add lemon wedge to garnish

Jack Daniel's Gentleman Jack.description: Gentleman Jack Tennessee Whiskey undergoes a second charcoal mellowing to achieve exceptional smoothness. It has a balanced flavor with notes of caramel and vanilla that is perfect for celebrating life’s extraordinary occasions and moments along the way.

ReaLemon Lemon Juice.description: ReaLemon is 100% real lemon juice made from concentrate, and it's a great alternative to the hassle of fresh lemons. ReaLemon is a space-saving kitchen sidekick, ideal for adding a delicious twist of lemon to your favorite seafood and poultry recipes, plus it's great in marinades and it brightens up both hot and cold beverages. Since 1934, ReaLemon has been a trusted brand to deliver quality lemon juice.

Stirrings Simple Syrup.description: Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is a starting point for many great cocktails. Set the foundation of your delicious drink with this kosher syrup, 12 oz, and take the guesswork out of making a tasty cocktail. This simple tonic, pack of 6, contains pure cane sugar and purified water in just the right proportion. This Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is the original inspiration for Stirrings "simple mixers" and is the critical first step for a yummy cocktail.

Ghostly Gin and Tonic.description: Looking to switch up your usual G & T? This drink should do the trick (or treat). Mix up this perfect Ghostly Gin and Tonic to celebrate all the hauntings of Halloween! It's scary delicious.
Ghostly Gin and Tonic.name: Ghostly Gin and Tonic
Ghostly Gin and Tonic.recipeInstructions: Take Mini Sour Gummy Worms and empty into ice cube tray . Fill with your favorite tonic water and freeze 8+ hours or overnight. Remove ice cubes and toss into your favorite glass. Add in more tonic Water and 2 Oz of Gin. Garnish with additional Gummy Worms and serve

Tanqueray London Dry Gin.description:
Tanqueray London Dry Gin is made with a time-tested recipe that is meant to entertain. The expertly crafted recipe blends the four distinct botanicals of juniper, coriander, angelica and licorice into a perfectly balanced spirit that has a unique herbal quality and dry finish. In a 2016 poll, Tanqueray London Dry Gin was voted the favorite gin among some of the world's most renowned bartenders*. The perfect inspiration for your own ingenious cocktails, mix our award-winning London Dry Gin with a splash of premium tonic water in a coupe glass and a wedge of lime for a classic and refreshing tasting gin and tonic.

Tanqueray was developed over 180 years ago by Charles Tanqueray, a clergyman's son who chose not to follow the family calling and instead opened a distillery in Bloomsbury, London. Not afraid to mix up brave ideas in his own unique style, he invented a gin which is still celebrated to this day. The perfect mix of ingenuity, heritage and hard work, Tanqueray is a dry, crisp gin with a rich juniper flavor that makes the most refreshing tasting gin and tonics and the driest of martini cocktails

Ghoulish Gin-ger Ale.description: This gory cocktail is bloody delicious! Feel free to substitute vodka in place of gin. (We even like whiskey!) This cocktail is essentially a Dirty Shirley but we've upped the scare-factor with the garnish. We made these creepy ice cubes by freezing gummy candies in an ice cube tray with water.
recipeIngredient:
2 oz Gin
4 oz Ginger Ale
1 oz Grenadine Syrup
2-3 Dashes Cranberry Bitters
Ghoulish Gin-ger Ale.name: Ghoulish Gin-ger Ale
Ghoulish Gin-ger Ale.recipeInstructions: In a rocks glass with ice combine gin and ginger ale. Gently pour grenadine around the inside edges of the glass and garnish with scary accessories. Serve with a straw or swizzle stick to stir grenadine before drinking

Schweppes Ginger Ale.description: Since 1783, Schweppes has been providing dependable, crisp and refreshing Ginger Ale that consumers have grown fond of. With its bold, natural flavor from ginger and lively bubbles, Schweppes Ginger Ale provides a refreshing carbonated beverage. It’s caffeine free making it the perfect choice for relaxing and recharging. Its ginger flavor and carbonation make it a crowd pleasing beverage choice, while also being a versatile mixer that can spark any occasion. With over 200 years of experience, Schweppes has become synonymous with dependability and the Ginger Ale consumers turn to when looking for versatility. Enjoy a refreshing Schweppes Ginger Ale today.

Martini & Rossi Extra Dry Vermouth.description: MARTINI Extra Dry was launched on New Year's Day 1900. Elegant, delicate and very cool. For many it is the essential ingredient and the perfect mixer.  Characterised by its pale colour and fresh and fruity aromas - together with a sharp perfume and a tantalising sweetness - MARTINI Extra Dry is the only place to begin when mixing up a cocktail.

Rose's Grenadine.description: Rose's makes the finest grenadine syrup. It has what most other grenadines lost long ago - the rich, singular flavor of pomegranates. Used in many classic drink recipes, rose's grenadine is without equal.

Fee Brothers Cranberry Bitters.description: Use a few dashes of Fee’s Cranberry Bitters to add an interesting background flavor to your cocktails.

Gilded Elixir.description: Try this tart tequila cocktail that is sure to be a crowd pleaser!
Gilded Elixir.name: Gilded Elixir
Gilded Elixir.recipeInstructions: Muddle 4 tart apple slices. Add remaining ingredients into a shaker with ice. Strain over glass and top with champagne

Korbel Brut California Champagne.description: The art of blending is the key to the high quality and value of Korbel Brut. We blend multiple varieties from multiple appellations and even multiple years. Each grape variety and appellation that we use contributes a unique character to the final blend. The goal is to make a California champagne that consistently delivers the highest level of quality. As the last step, Korbel Brut California champagne receives a medium-dry level of dosage - just enough to balance the classic crisp acidity and make Korbel Brut the perfect match for all of life's celebrations.

DeLeon Anejo Tequila.description: Select highland Tequila is aged for over a year: first in American Oak, and finally finished in French Oak wine casks for an indulgent profile as rich caramel, sweet oak and dried fruit combine for a delicate finish.    The tequila is aged first in American oak allowing the liquid to mellow and soften over time, picking up caramel, creamy notes. It is then finished in fine, French sauternes casks for an exceptionally rich, lightly spiced, and elegant profile.

Gimlet.description: Some believe the Gimlet cocktail was named after a British Royal Navy doctor that may have served this to his crew in order to ward off scurvy. The lime juice and gin combination makes a classically refreshing cocktail served up or down over ice, it always delights.
Gimlet.name: Gimlet
Gimlet.recipeInstructions: In a shaker filled with ice combine gin, lime juice, and simple syrup; shake until cold. Pour into a martini glass or rocks glass over fresh ice. Garnish with a fresh wheel of lime

Stirrings Simple Syrup.description: Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is a starting point for many great cocktails. Set the foundation of your delicious drink with this kosher syrup, 12 oz, and take the guesswork out of making a tasty cocktail. This simple tonic, pack of 6, contains pure cane sugar and purified water in just the right proportion. This Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is the original inspiration for Stirrings "simple mixers" and is the critical first step for a yummy cocktail.

Gin Sling.description: The Gin Sling is a classic cocktail with just the right amount of bitters to go down smooth. This is the perfect drink to class up a happy hour in your home!
Gin Sling.name: Gin Sling
Gin Sling.recipeInstructions: In a cocktail shaker filled halfway with ice, combine gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, vermouth, and bitters. . Strain into a highball glass filled halfway with ice.. Top with soda water. . Garnish and serve.

Canada Dry Club Soda.description: Since 1904, Canada Dry has been known for producing quality beverages and mixers. Canada Dry Club Soda offers a clean, sparkling taste, and it's the perfect addition to your favorite cocktail. It can also be enjoyed on its own for a unique, refreshing carbonated beverage alternative that contains zero calories and is caffeine free. Enjoy a refreshing taste of bubbly effervescence with Canada Dry Club Soda.

Martini & Rossi Rosso Sweet Vermouth.description: Fortified wine from Italy that is distilled with a combination of more than 30 herbs and spices including sage, coriander, allspice, and Roman camomile. Used as an ingredient in many cocktails, the most well known being the Manhattan. Sweet vermouth is red in color. It is fortified with brandy making it a higher proof than unfortified wines. Also used in many cooking recipes. Vermouth has a stable shelf life and can be stored for up to a year without refrigeration.

Gin and Juice.description: As the name Gin and Juice would suggest, this simple cocktail only contains two ingredients. No multi-step process here, just mix, enjoy and stay "laid back...sippin on gin and juice".
recipeIngredient:
2 oz Gin
2/3 oz Fruit Juice
Fresh Fruit garnish
Gin and Juice.name: Gin and Juice
Gin and Juice.recipeInstructions: In a shaker filled with ice combine gin and juice; shake until cold. Pour into a Collins glass with fresh ice. Garnish with fresh fruit

Gin and Tonic.description: The history of this drink dates back to the British occupancy of India. Soldiers were given quinine to fight malaria. The taste of the medicine on its own was not palatable so soldiers would commonly mix it with sugar, water, and some of their gin ration. The classic cocktail was born. A refreshing and light flavored drink, it's still one of the world's most common and popular cocktails.
recipeIngredient:
2 oz Gin
4 oz Tonic Water
Fresh Lime Wedge
Gin and Tonic.name: Gin and Tonic
Gin and Tonic.recipeInstructions: Fill a rocks glass halfway with fresh ice cubes and add 2 oz of gin. Rub the lime wedge around the rim of the glass and squeeze the lime into the glass. Fill glass with tonic and give a quick stir with a stirrer

Schweppes Tonic Water.description: For over 200 years, Schweppes has produced classic carbonated beverages. Schweppes Tonic Water combines carbonated water with bittersweet quinine and is caffeine free. Make Schweppes Tonic Water your go to mixer for cocktails or enjoy as a soft drink alternative. Live excellently with the classic taste of Schweppes Tonic Water.

Ginger Old Fashioned.description: Sailor Jerry Spiced Rum paired with a dash of bitters and a touch of sweetness is sure to be a pleaser for any party!
recipeIngredient: Dashes of Ginger Bitters, Angostura Bitters
Ginger Old Fashioned.name: Ginger Old Fashioned
Ginger Old Fashioned.recipeInstructions: In a mixing glass, add sugar cubes and dissolve with water and bitters. Add Sailor Jerry and stir. Add ice and continue to stir. Strain into a chilled old fashioned glass. Add fresh ice block and garnish with candied ginger

Sailor Jerry Spiced Rum.description:
In the past, a ship's captain would take a ladle of rum, add gunpowder and ignite it to provide "proof" of the rum's integrity to his crew. Sailor Jerry continues this age-old tradition of serving quality spiced rum to provide an unmatched base for mixed drinks. 

The brand prides itself on creating spiced rum the old-school way, using an expert blend of carefully chosen spices in high-proof rum for a perfectly balanced liquid. Because sailors refused to water down their spirits, this 92-proof spiced rum definitely offers a historically accurate experience.

Crafted after intensive research into historical maritime rums, Sailor Jerry developed a smooth rum with a rich flavor. The result is a high-proof spirit that's perfect for mixing in your favorite cocktails, including Long Island Iced Teas, Mai Tais and Mojitos. The rum features prominent oak and vanilla flavors with hints of cinnamon and clove spices.

Buy Sailor Jerry Rum online at a great price through Drizly and have it delivered directly to your door or pick it up in store.

Ginger Spiced Negroni.description: A perfect ginger, wintery cocktail with a seasonal twist.
Ginger Spiced Negroni.name: Ginger Spiced Negroni
Ginger Spiced Negroni.recipeInstructions: Add ingredients to a mixing glass. Add some ice cubes and stir. Add more ice and repeat. Strain into a chilled old fashioned glass. Add a fresh ice black and garnish with candied ginger

Campari.description:
For over 150 years, Campari has been a favorite liqueur for drinkers with different tastes. The liquid is a dark red color and is often mixed with other alcohols and non-alcoholic drinks for cocktails. The drink was created in 1860.
 
Depending on where the Campari is sold, the alcohol content ranges from 20.5 percent to 28 percent. When you smell Campari, you'll be reminded of pomegranate, strawberry, spicy herbs, bitter orange and cherry. The flavor starts off sweet and is followed by an herbal, spicy taste. After that, the bitterness of the drink starts to build. This is a wholly unique drink.

The recipe and creation process of Campari is still a secret to this day. Depending on your source, even the number of ingredients changes (ranging from 20 to 80). However, there are a few ingredients that are known. Campari includes fruits in water and alcohol as well as an infusion of herbs.

The most common ways to drink Campari are in cocktails, with prosecco or with soda water. While you can drink it neat, many have trouble with the bitter taste. Because of this, many of the mixed drinks that use Campari are strong flavored as well.

The most well-known drink using Campari is a Negroni. A Negroni can be served either straight up or on the rocks. All you need for this classic mixed drink is one ounce of dry gin, one ounce of Campari and one ounce of sweet vermouth. Mix these three together either in a mixing glass with ice or mix them right in the glass with some ice.

Another great Campari-based mixed drink is the Jasmine. In a cocktail shaker, combine one-and-a-half ounces of gin, three-quarters of an ounce of fresh-squeezed lemon juice, a quarter ounce of Campari and a quarter ounce of Cointreau. Fill the shaker with ice and shake for about 10 seconds. Strain your drink into a cocktail glass. Don't forget to add a lemon twist garnish for the perfect bold drink.

Buy Campari online through Drizly and have it delivered directly to your door or pick it up in store.

Martini & Rossi Rosso Sweet Vermouth.description: Fortified wine from Italy that is distilled with a combination of more than 30 herbs and spices including sage, coriander, allspice, and Roman camomile. Used as an ingredient in many cocktails, the most well known being the Manhattan. Sweet vermouth is red in color. It is fortified with brandy making it a higher proof than unfortified wines. Also used in many cooking recipes. Vermouth has a stable shelf life and can be stored for up to a year without refrigeration.

Glen Groni.description: Perfect for a boozy brunch with friends, this twist on the classic Negroni will brighten up any gathering.
recipeIngredient:
2 oz Glen Grant The Major's Reserve
1/2 oz Campari
1/2 oz Simple Syrup
1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
3/4 oz Lemon Juice
1 oz Club Soda or Sparkling Wine
Glen Groni.name: Glen Groni
Glen Groni.recipeInstructions: Shake all ingredients, except club soda or sparkling wine, with ice for ten seconds. Strain into a cocktail glass. Top with club soda or sparkling wine

Canada Dry Club Soda.description: Since 1904, Canada Dry has been known for producing quality beverages and mixers. Canada Dry Club Soda offers a clean, sparkling taste, and it's the perfect addition to your favorite cocktail. It can also be enjoyed on its own for a unique, refreshing carbonated beverage alternative that contains zero calories and is caffeine free. Enjoy a refreshing taste of bubbly effervescence with Canada Dry Club Soda.

Gold Rush.description: An update to the classic Bees Knees cocktail, the Gold Rush substitutes bourbon for gin. Created in NYC's Milk and Honey Bar in the early 2000's, this cocktail is the perfect balance of sweet and tart, good for all seasons.
recipeIngredient:
2 oz Bourbon
3/4 oz Lemon Juice
3/4 oz Honey Simple Syrup
Gold Rush.name: Gold Rush
Gold Rush.recipeInstructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker filled with ice. Shake until cold (10-15 seconds). Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice

ReaLemon Lemon Juice.description: ReaLemon is 100% real lemon juice made from concentrate, and it's a great alternative to the hassle of fresh lemons. ReaLemon is a space-saving kitchen sidekick, ideal for adding a delicious twist of lemon to your favorite seafood and poultry recipes, plus it's great in marinades and it brightens up both hot and cold beverages. Since 1934, ReaLemon has been a trusted brand to deliver quality lemon juice.

Grand Old Fashioned.description: The Old Fashioned is quite simply the drink that started it all. It is the OG cocktail. The preferred libation of drinkers in the know from the 19th century to today. Our version takes this drink from good to grand, with the addition of Grand Marnier's signature blend of cognac and orange.
Grand Old Fashioned.name: Grand Old Fashioned
Grand Old Fashioned.recipeInstructions: Combine Angostura bitters and Grand Marnier Cordon Rouge in a rocks glass.  Add ice and stir. Press orange peel across the top and on the edges of the rocks glass. Garnish with an orange peel and a brandied or maraschino cherry

Grand Marnier Cordon Rouge.description: Created in 1880 by founder Louis-Alexandre Marnier Lapostolle, Grand Marnier® Cordon Rouge is a premium blend of cognacs with wild tropical oranges from the Caribbean. Louis-Alexandre’s vision of blending the essence of wild tropical oranges with cognac from France was unconventional and truly the earliest form of spirits innovation of its time. Grand Marnier Cordon Rouge is a versatile spirit that can be enjoyed on the rocks or neat, yet exceptionally delicious in cocktails.

Angostura Bitters.description:
You can’t—or at least you shouldn’t—make an Old Fashioned without them! Angostura Bitters are the most famous and prevalent type of bitters.  But what are bitters exactly? They are an alcoholic, highly concentrated, botanical concoction used to give your cocktail a bitter, sour, or bittersweet flavor. Because of the strong flavor bitters are added to drinks in dashes. (Two or three should do the trick.)
