Bacardi Tangerine Rum.description: BACARDÍ® TANGERINE Flavored Rum is infused with rich tangerine flavors to create a tangy and fresh taste, inspired by the brand's Caribbean heritage. BACARDÍ®  TANGERINE is a BACARDÍ original flavor that is great as a shot drink or mixed with fruit juices and soda water for a refreshing drink that's full of flavor.

John Daly.description: Named for the golfer and his penchant for a good drink, this cocktail is essentially an alcoholic version of an Arnold Palmer, which means it's delicious. If you want to go off-script, substitute the vodka for bourbon.
recipeIngredient:
1.5 oz Vodka
2 oz Lemonade
2 oz Iced Tea
John Daly.name: John Daly
John Daly.recipeInstructions: Fill a large highball glass with ice. Add vodka, tea, and lemonade. Gently stir. Garnish with a lemon slice

Simply Lemonade.description: Enjoy refreshing, all-natural lemonade with no added preservatives colors or artificial flavors.

Brisk Iced Tea.description: This is the Brisk that started it all. The original iced tea with tons of attitude. The one with the bold lemon flavor that kicked iced tea off the back porch. Now that’s Brisk, baby!

Jungle Juice.description: A common term used for any large-batch alcoholic punch, this may bring back memories of college parties or not (you get what we mean).  The key to a good jungle juice is masking the flavor of any cheaper alcohol you use and not making it too sweet. We also like to add a little fruit, just to class it up.
recipeIngredient: 2 gallons of Orange or Mixed Fruit Juice
Jungle Juice.name: Jungle Juice
Jungle Juice.recipeInstructions: Combine all ingredients in large bowl or pitcher. Add fruit to garnish

Kahlua Caramel Affogato.description: The Kahlua Caramel Affogato brings a summer vibe to this delicious adult treat.
Kahlua Caramel Affogato.name: Kahlua Caramel Affogato
Kahlua Caramel Affogato.recipeInstructions: Scoop gelato into a coffee mug or rocks glass. Pour in 1 part of Kahlua and 1 part hot, fresh espresso. Drizzle caramel sauce and sprinkle espresso beans on top for garnish. Serve immediately!

Kahlua.description:
Kahlua coffee-flavored liqueur is made with the finest 100% Arabica coffee beans from Veracruz, Mexico. The climate in this region of the country produce well-rounded, light-bodied coffee. These quality beans  are then mixed with sugar cane rum, vanilla bean, and notes of caramel.  They combine perfectly to make an easy-sipping liqueur enjoyed by millions. Known for its deep brown color and smooth finish, Kahlua is the number one selling coffee liqueur in the world.

Kahlua is also the primary ingredient in a number of famous (or perhaps infamous) cocktails. The Espresso Martini, The Mind Eraser, and personal favorite of  “The Dude” The White Russian.

Kahlua Coconut Milk White Russian.description:
A non-dairy version of the White Russian replaces heavy cream with coconut milk
to make it vegan. It's the perfect after-dinner drink to serve with (or as)
dessert.
recipeIngredient:
2 oz Vodka
1 oz Kahlua
1 oz Full-Fat Coconut Milk
Kahlua Coconut Milk White Russian.name: Kahlua Coconut Milk White Russian
Kahlua Coconut Milk White Russian.recipeInstructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour Kahlua into the glass. Pour vodka into the glass. Add coconut milk

Absolut Vodka.description: Absolut Vodka was first launched in New York in 1979. It soon became the talk of the town, in the US and eventually of the world. But the recipe behind the clean and natural taste of Absolut is actually older than 30 years. So is the 18th century medicine bottle found in an antique store in Stockholm, Sweden that gave inspiration to the iconic Absolut Vodka bottle.

Kamikaze.description: When this shooter is done right no chaser is required. Dating back to the days of disco, the Kamikaze shooter allowed for the best kind of saturday night fever.
recipeIngredient:
1 oz Vodka
1 oz Cointreau or Triple Sec Liqueur
1 oz Rose's Lime Juice
Kamikaze.name: Kamikaze
Kamikaze.recipeInstructions: Combine vodka, triple sec, and lime juice in a shaker over ice; shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds. Strain into a rocks glass or into two shot glasses

Cointreau.description:
Cointreau, the crystal clear Orange Liqueur, founded in Angers, France, remains one of the world's most distinguished spirits with over 160 years of history. 


Renowned for its perfect balance of sweet and bitter orange peels and made with only the finest all-natural ingredients, Cointreau has a uniquely refreshing and complex taste. A versatile, 80 proof spirit, Cointreau can be enjoyed as the base spirit in many cocktails, such as the Cointreau Rickey, but is also an essential ingredient in the most popular cocktails including the Margarita, the Cosmopolitan, and the Sidecar.

Rose's Lime Juice.description: Rose's lime juice, often known simply as Rose's, is a concentrated fruit juice patented in 1867. This makes it the world's first concentrated bottled fruit juice drink.

Kentucky Bourbon Stout.description: This Kentucky Bourbon Stout is a Southern twist on the boilermaker cocktail!  Enjoy this bourbon stout by mixing Kentucky bourbon and coffee liqueur with a rich coffee stout.
Kentucky Bourbon Stout.name: Kentucky Bourbon Stout
Kentucky Bourbon Stout.recipeInstructions: Pour bourbon and coffee liqueur into a highball or tulip glass.  . Slowly pour stout into glass. . Serve immediately.

Bulleit Bourbon.description:
Bulleit Bourbon Whiskey allows you to savor the complex flavor and warm finish inspired by the whiskey pioneered by Augustus Bulleit 150 years ago. With its amber color and oaky aroma, our aged whiskey makes a good first impression before it's even opened. The flavor profile of our bourbon whiskey combines hints of maple, oak and nutmeg for a dry, well-balanced finish that lingers long after the final sip. Simply combine our bourbon whiskey with cloves, lemon juice, brown sugar and hot water for a comforting Hot Toddy.

Bulleit Bourbon is still distilled and aged in the Bulleit family tradition. High rye content gives it a bold, spicy character with a distinctively smooth, clean finish. Kentucky limestone-filtered water provides a foundation for the bourbon's character, while charred American oak barrels lend a smoky backbone. Please drink responsibly.

Kentucky Bourbon Barrel Stout.description: Kentucky Bourbon Barrel Stout is brewed and aged with Alltech Café Citadelle Haitian coffee and aged in world-famous Kentucky bourbon barrels. The result is a complex stout with dark-roasted malts, hints of caramel and vanilla and a lightly roasted coffee finish.

Kentucky Mule.description: The ultimate summer drink, as refreshing as the copper mug you sometimes see it served in, this American take on the Russian classic replaces vodka with Wild Turkey bourbon, for those who want a much more flavorful Mule.
Kentucky Mule.name: Kentucky Mule
Kentucky Mule.recipeInstructions: Add Wild Turkey, ginger syrup, lime juice and bitters into shaker filled with ice. Shake, then strain over ice into highball glass. Top with splash of soda water. Garnish with lime and mint sprig

Canada Dry Club Soda.description: Since 1904, Canada Dry has been known for producing quality beverages and mixers. Canada Dry Club Soda offers a clean, sparkling taste, and it's the perfect addition to your favorite cocktail. It can also be enjoyed on its own for a unique, refreshing carbonated beverage alternative that contains zero calories and is caffeine free. Enjoy a refreshing taste of bubbly effervescence with Canada Dry Club Soda.

Angostura Bitters.description:
You can’t—or at least you shouldn’t—make an Old Fashioned without them! Angostura Bitters are the most famous and prevalent type of bitters.  But what are bitters exactly? They are an alcoholic, highly concentrated, botanical concoction used to give your cocktail a bitter, sour, or bittersweet flavor. Because of the strong flavor bitters are added to drinks in dashes. (Two or three should do the trick.) 
This specific brand is named after Angostura, the Venezuelan town where they were first produced. The recipe is a closely guarded secret, with just five people knowing the exact formula. Angostura bitters were first used to soothe soldiers’ upset stomachs and are believed to have other healing benefits but we’re pretty sure your bottle will spend more time on your bar cart than in your medicine cabinet.

Wild Turkey Bourbon.description: Crafted with conviction by our Master Distillers, Wild Turkey Bourbon is aged longer to deliver more character - and to give it that Wild Turkey signature kick, Eddie and Jimmy Russell use the classic Wild Turkey high-rye mash bill before it ages in the deepest level #4 “alligator” char American oak barrels. Wild Turkey shines on its own, or in a mixed drink like a Manhattan or an Old Fashioned. That’s why Eddie calls it “a whiskey that can stand up to any mixer or in any cocktail with the bold, in-your–face taste that is distinctively Wild Turkey.” We distill at a lower proof, so less water is added, resulting in a fuller and more robust bourbon flavor – just way the Russell’s have been making it for over 60 years.

Ketel Botanical Cucumber & Soda.description: For a deliciously fresh taste experience, and a drink that has 40% fewer calories than a glass of white wine, try Ketel One Botanical Cucumber and Mint with soda.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 oz Ketel One Botanical Cucumber and Mint
Ketel Botanical Cucumber & Soda.name: Ketel Botanical Cucumber & Soda
Ketel Botanical Cucumber & Soda.recipeInstructions: Fill a stemmed white wine glass with ice. Mix in Ketel One Botanical Cucumber and Mint and soda. Garnish with a cucumber slice and a sprig of mint

Ketel One Botanical Cucumber and Mint.description:
· 40% Few Calories than a Glass of White Wine*
· No Carbs
· No Sugar/No Artificial Sweeteners
· No Artificial Flavors
· Made with 100% Non GMO Free

Delight in the real ingredients and natural flavors of Ketel One® Botanical Cucumber & Mint. Crisp, sliced cucumber and mint botanicals are blended with Ketel One® Vodka and distilled through a copper pot still and then infused with the natural essence of fresh, crisp and fragrant botanicals. With no carbs, artificial flavors, sweeteners or sugar*, our sensible vodka specialty is the mindful way to celebrate the weekend or relax with friends. 

Perfect for pairing with food, mix with club soda and serve with steak tartare on toasted rounds for an impressive tapas-drink duo.

With over 327 years of distilling expertise, passed down for 11 generations, Carl Jr. and Bob Nolet, brothers and 11th generation distillers, have created a new spirit that honors the consumer shift to more conscious living. Crafted with 100% non-GMO grain and distilled in a copper pot still,  Ketel One® Botanical delivers the same great quality consumers have come to know and love from Ketel One® Vodka. Come visit us in Schiedam! We'd be happy to show you around. Please drink responsibly.

*Ketel One Botanical (per 1.5 oz.): 73 Cals, 0g Carbs, 0g Protein, 0g Fat; White Table Wine (per 5 fl. oz., USDA ARS, National Nutrient Database May 2016): 121 Cals, 3.82g Carbs, 0.1g Protein, 0g Fat

Ketel Botanical Grapefruit and Soda.description: For a deliciously fresh taste experience, and a drink that has 40% fewer calories than a glass of white wine, try Ketel One Botanical Grapefruit and Rose with soda.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 oz Ketel One Botanical Grapefruit and Rose
Ketel Botanical Grapefruit and Soda.name: Ketel Botanical Grapefruit and Soda
Ketel Botanical Grapefruit and Soda.recipeInstructions: Fill a stemmed white wine glass with ice. Mix in Ketel One Botanical Grapefruit and Rose and soda. Garnish with a slice of grapefruit

Ketel Botanical Peach and Soda.description: For a deliciously fresh taste experience, and a drink that has 40% fewer calories than a glass of white wine, try Ketel One Botanical Peach and Orange Blossom with soda.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 oz Ketel One Botanical Peach and Orange Blossom
Ketel Botanical Peach and Soda.name: Ketel Botanical Peach and Soda
Ketel Botanical Peach and Soda.recipeInstructions: Fill a stemmed white wine glass with ice. Mix in Ketel One Botanical Peach and Orange Blossom and soda. Garnish with a peach slice

Ketel One Bloody Mary.description: A classic brunch cocktail, the Bloody Mary is almost a meal in itself. Garnish with anything from celery to bacon to lobster claws, but ground yourself first with this delicious base.
recipeIngredient: 3 oz Ketel One Bloody Mary Base
Ketel One Bloody Mary.name: Ketel One Bloody Mary
Ketel One Bloody Mary.recipeInstructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass. Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a celery stalk, olive, lemon wedge, or bacon (or more!)

Ketel One Vodka.description:
Ketel One, the world's bestselling premium vodka, is an exceptionally smooth, family-made concoction that is loved the world over. Made at the historic Nolet Distillery in the Netherlands, Ketel One Vodka is crafted from 100 percent wheat in copper-pot stills. The mixture is filtered over loose charcoals and rested in tile-lined tanks, resulting in an 80-proof (40 percent ABV) spirit. The vodka takes its name from the original coal-fired copper still used in its production, the Distilleerketel #1.

Born under the watchful eye of its Master Distiller, Ketel One is one of the smoothest vodkas on the planet. The first thing you'll notice when opening a bottle is the distinct freshness with hints of honey and citrus fragrances. Take a sip and allow the silky vodka to coat your tongue, savoring its crisp, lively tingle. Ketel One's subtle flavors and long finish ensure its premium quality. There's simply nothing quite like it.

As a premium vodka, Ketel One is best enjoyed neat for the full flavor profile. Even so, you can't beat the array of cocktails born of this expertly-crafted liquid, including the quintessential Ketel One Mule. Fill a copper mug or highball glass with Ketel One, ginger beer and fresh lime juice garnished with lime for an elegant drink that stands out at parties.

Prefer a martini? Try Ketel One vodka with vermouth and a twist of lemon. For something even more refreshing, go with a Ketel Soda, which is simply Ketel One vodka and club soda with fresh cucumber and mint.

Buy Ketel One online at a great price through Drizly and enjoy a glass of this great tasting vodka.

Ketel One Ultimate Martini.description: It doesn't get much more classic than the martini. Keep things crisp and simple with this Ketel One recipe.
Ketel One Ultimate Martini.name: Ketel One Ultimate Martini
Ketel One Ultimate Martini.recipeInstructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon

Carpano Antica Formula Vermouth.description: Carpano's Antica Formula, from the original recipe developed by Antonio Benedetto Carpano in 1786, is a sweet vermouth of the highest quality. This distinctive and powerful aromatized wine should be considered a standard component in any respectable bar. It can be served chilled as an aperitivo, a digestivo or a welcome addition to your favorite cocktail.

Kickoff Crown & Cola.description: Get ready to kick off your next tailgate with a classic Crown & Cola.
Kickoff Crown & Cola.name: Kickoff Crown & Cola
Kickoff Crown & Cola.recipeInstructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour in Crown Royal Vanilla. Top with cola . Garnish with a lime wedge

Coca-Cola.description: Bring home the refreshing taste of Coca-Cola. Serve ice cold for maximum refreshment.

Crown Royal Vanilla.description: Carefully selected whiskies are infused with the rich flavor of Madagascar Bourbon Vanilla to create Crown Royal Vanilla. The blend finishes with a vicious, warming Crème Brulee aftertaste.

Kir Royal.description: Part sweet, part dry, try this fun cocktail.
Kir Royal.name: Kir Royal
Kir Royal.recipeInstructions: Pour Chambord into a champagne flute. Top with Korbel

Korbel Extra Dry California Champagne.description: Korbel Extra Dry is a fresh, off-dry California champagne that is light, luscious, and always a crowd favorite. It features delightful flavors of bright citrus, vanilla and spice.

Chambord Black Raspberry Liqueur.description: Chambord® is a premium liqueur produced in the Loire Valley of France. An infusion of raspberries, blackberries and the exotic flavors of black raspberries, black currant, Madagascar vanilla and XO cognac, Chambord creates a more extraordinary cocktail.

Knob Creek Lion\u2019s Tail.description: Being on the sidelines has its perks with the Knob Creek Lion’s Tail, the combination of Knob Creek Bourbon Whiskey, lime juice and simple syrup will soon become your favorite game day drink!
Knob Creek Lion\u2019s Tail.name: Knob Creek Lion’s Tail
Knob Creek Lion\u2019s Tail.recipeInstructions:
Combine
all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and stir. Pour
into a chilled glass. Garnish
with a lime twist

Knob Creek Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whi.description:
Knob Creek Bourbon has some good blood. Not only is it named after the boyhood home of Abraham Lincoln, it has some highly acclaimed brothers in the Jim Beam family: Booker's, Basil Hayden's and Baker's.

Aged nine years, Knob Creek is the oldest by a couple years. The extra aging draws more flavor and sugar from the wood, providing a full-bodied, fruity flavor with hints of grass and grain. It's 100-proof, which is considered the honest age of bourbons made a century ago. The Beam family makes this spirit with extra char on white oak barrels for a bigger flavor.

Knob Creek Bourbon is comfortable on the top shelf of any home bar. You should put it right up there with the best names from Tennessee, Ireland, Canada or Scotland. It's a great dessert after a grilled steak and is at home with a cigar next to your ash tray.

How does it mix? Its bold, organic flavor stands up well in cocktails if you must mix it. Fresh mint and a hint of sugar make a fine Julep. It makes a nice old fashioned with orange, bitters and a cherry. The family suggests you try a new fashioned. Instead of sugar, use Amaretto as a sweetener. Mix that with bitters and an orange peel. Serve it up or on the rocks.

Whatever you do, taste it with a little extra patience. It spent nine long years getting to you. Don't rush it.

Buy Knob Creek Bourbon Whiskey online at a great price on Drizly and have it delivered directly to your door or pick it up in store.

Winner of Double Gold Medal at the 2017 San Francisco World Spirits Competition

ReaLime Lime Juice.description: ReaLime Lime Juice From Concentrate is 100 percent natural-strength juice made from fresh, quality limes. ReaLime adds a perfect citrusy zing to beverages, marinades, meats, seafood and salads.

Simple Syrup.description: Convenient simple syrup for cocktail making.

La Fortuna.description: Lime, agave, and pomegranate accentuate the crispness of Herradura Silver.
La Fortuna.name: La Fortuna
La Fortuna.recipeInstructions: Combine all the ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake hard so that some of the ice melts. Strain over fresh ice into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge

Herradura Silver Tequila.description: A Silver that’s second to none. Herradura Silver is matured in American white oak barrels for 45 days, imparting a light straw color and woody aroma. Vanilla and citrus characters complement the flavor of sweet agave. The smooth, clean profile of Herradura Silver has maintained its reputation as one of the finest tequilas in the world and a staple in our collection.

POM Wonderful Pomegranate Juice.description: From concentrate. 100% California pomegranates. No sugar added. Not a low calorie food. All natural 100% juice. Flash pasteurized. pomfeedback.com. This bottle is BPA free.

Lavender Mind Eraser.description: The Lavender Mind Eraser is the perfect cocktail for easy outdoor entertaining on the patio to help guests take it easy throughout the summer.
Lavender Mind Eraser.name: Lavender Mind Eraser
Lavender Mind Eraser.recipeInstructions: In a rocks glass with ice, pour in Kahlua and one dash lavender bitters. Add vodka, careful not to mix too heavily. Add one more dash of lavender bitters. Top with club soda

Le Poire Le Grand Fizz.description: An elegant blend of Grey Goose Le Poire Vodka, St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur, soda water and lime for a refreshing summer cocktail.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 parts Grey Goose Le Poire Vodka
Le Poire Le Grand Fizz.name: Le Poire Le Grand Fizz
Le Poire Le Grand Fizz.recipeInstructions: Build in an oversized cabernet wine glass with lots of ice. Add Grey Goose Le Poire Vodka and St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur. Add fresh lime juice. Top with chilled soda water. Stir. Garnish with pear slices and a Grey Goose stirrer

St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur.description:
Creating spirits is a labor of love, but few other liqueurs have such a laborious process. To gather the elderflowers needed to distill St. Germain Elderflower Liqueur, a team of 40 to 50 workers head to the French countryside and pick the blossoms of the beautiful flower. The window for picking the flowers is short, lasting only a few weeks in the spring. The rush to pick the blossoms resembles a last-minute rush by boyfriends or husbands to grab a fresh bouquet on Valentine's Day, but St. Germain Elderflower Liqueur boasts more satisfied recipients. Once picked, a race starts to begin the distillation process as the delicate flavors begin to dissipate only a short time after harvest.
The elderflowers undergo a maceration process that accentuates and perpetuates their delicate flavor and aroma. The process has taken over 100 years to perfect, which makes mastery of video games look far less impressive. Workers mix the elderflower blossoms with a small amount of citrus fruits and cane sugar to heighten the subtle flavor, but the result is nothing short of spectacular. It is a delicate, balanced liqueur that delivers hints of pear, apricot, lychee and grapefruit zest. Despite the fruit presence, it has a bit of tartness to balance it out. It's not exactly like a liquid Sweet Tart, and only an actual taste gives you the sense of its true flavor. Mix it with champagne or other cocktails for some added sweetness, or enjoy it on its own for a mind-blowing after dinner cocktail.

Perrier Sparkling Water.description: Elegant, sparkling and refreshing, with  just a hint of zaniness... PERRIER is unique.

Grey Goose La Poire.description: GREY GOOSE® La Poire is created to specifically reflect the taste and freshness of an Anjou pear – a classic flavor of French cuisine.  The result is a flavored vodka alive with the aromas of pears and a crisp, smooth taste.

Lemon Beani-tini.description: Here’s something new to do with your easter candy-  Take those extra jelly beans and infuse them with your favorite vodka.  Adding lemon juice and coconut milk makes for a cocktail thats refreshing and appeals to those with a sweet tooth.
recipeIngredient: 1 oz toasted coconut flakes for garnish
Lemon Beani-tini.name: Lemon Beani-tini
Lemon Beani-tini.recipeInstructions: Pour infused vodka, lemon juice & coconut milk into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.. Shake to combine. Strain into a coupe glass and garnish with toasted coconut flakes

Lemon Drop Martini.description: Pretty much the adult version of one of our childhood candy store favorites. Tart yet sweet, the Lemon Drop is typically drank as a shot or straight up in a martini glass. Sugar the rim of your glass for an added kick of sweetness.
recipeIngredient:
2 oz Vodka
1/2 oz Cointreau or Triple Sec Liqueur
1/2 Fresh Lemon Juice
Lemon Drop Martini.name: Lemon Drop Martini
Lemon Drop Martini.recipeInstructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice; shake until cold 10-15 seconds. Strain into two shot glasses or a martini glass

Cointreau.description:
Cointreau, the crystal clear Orange Liqueur, founded in Angers, France, remains one of the world's most distinguished spirits with over 160 years of history. 


Renowned for its perfect balance of sweet and bitter orange peels and made with only the finest all-natural ingredients, Cointreau has a uniquely refreshing and complex taste. A versatile, 80 proof spirit, Cointreau can be enjoyed as the base spirit in many cocktails, such as the Cointreau Rickey, but is also an essential ingredient in the most popular cocktails including the Margarita, the Cosmopolitan, and the Sidecar.

ReaLemon Lemon Juice.description: ReaLemon is 100% real lemon juice made from concentrate, and it's a great alternative to the hassle of fresh lemons. ReaLemon is a space-saving kitchen sidekick, ideal for adding a delicious twist of lemon to your favorite seafood and poultry recipes, plus it's great in marinades and it brightens up both hot and cold beverages. Since 1934, ReaLemon has been a trusted brand to deliver quality lemon juice.

Lemon Palmer.description: Turn the classic Arnold Palmer into a simple cocktail that's easy to make and even easier to sip.
Lemon Palmer.name: Lemon Palmer
Lemon Palmer.recipeInstructions: Fill a pint glass with ice. Pour in the ingredients. Gently stir. Garnish with a lemon wedge

High Noon Lemon Vodka.description: High Noon Vodka is grown by trusted, hand selected Midwest farms to ensure only the highest quality corn Vodka is produced – right here in America. We use our Original Vodka as our base, and add real fruit juice to deliver a refreshing taste and lemon flavored vodka. High Noon Lemon provides a fresh squeezed taste bursting with flavor and a balanced and smooth mouthfeel. Always crafted with care, with no artificial flavors, no preservatives and no corn syrup. Best served with ice and a splash of soda.

Lemonade Spritzer.description: A light low-calorie cocktail, this Lemonade Spritzer has less than 120 calories. Ideal for daytime drinking this recipe is quick and easy to mix up a large batch for entertaining.
Lemonade Spritzer.name: Lemonade Spritzer
Lemonade Spritzer.recipeInstructions: Fill a wine glass 1/4 of the way with ice cubes. Add white wine, soda, lemonade. Garnish with a fresh lemon wedge

Canada Dry Club Soda.description: Since 1904, Canada Dry has been known for producing quality beverages and mixers. Canada Dry Club Soda offers a clean, sparkling taste, and it's the perfect addition to your favorite cocktail. It can also be enjoyed on its own for a unique, refreshing carbonated beverage alternative that contains zero calories and is caffeine free. Enjoy a refreshing taste of bubbly effervescence with Canada Dry Club Soda.

Simply Lemonade.description: Enjoy refreshing, all-natural lemonade with no added preservatives colors or artificial flavors.

Linebacker's Apple Cider.description: Though a linebacker could probably take down this batch recipe on his own, this is meant to be enjoyed with the whole team!
recipeIngredient: 3 cups of Crown Royal Regal Apple
Linebacker's Apple Cider.name: Linebacker's Apple Cider
Linebacker's Apple Cider.recipeInstructions: Add apple cider, cinnamon sticks, star anise, whole cloves, oranges, and lemons into a slow-cooker. Turn the heat on low and cook for 6-7 hours. Before serving, take out all of the whole spices, oranges and lemons. Pour whisky in. Stir. Add additional oranges, lemons, and cinnamon sticks for garnish

Crown Royal Apple.description: To create Crown Royal Regal Apple, whiskies are hand-selected and infused with Regal Gala Apples. The blend balances its slightly tart, crisp apple flavor, with notes of caramel and light spice.

Loco & Coco.description: All cocktails should taste this good. Mix up some Loco & Coco and sip on something special.
Loco & Coco.name: Loco & Coco

Vita Coco Coconut Water.description: Not so long ago, you had to use a machete if you wanted a sip of pure coconut water. We’ve taken the machete out of the equation, which is good, because those things are dangerous. Now all that’s left is Mother Nature’s most hydrating, refreshing, vitamin- and mineral-rich nectar. Vita Coco is never made from concentrate. That means we pick, crack, and pack fresh young coconuts directly at the source. After the coconuts are cleaned, the delicate water inside is flash pasteurized (and occasionally mixed with all-natural fruit puree) then poured into a shelf-stable Tetra Pak. The entire process from tree to Pak doesn't exceed 72 hours. We hear the end result is a lot like sticking a straw in a coconut.

Captain Morgan Loconut.description:
Captain Morgan is going loco for coco. Our newest flavor is an intensely delicious blend of caribbean rum, coconut liqueur, spice and natural flavors–perfect for poolside or a backyard bbq. 
Crack open one of our coconut-scented bottles and raise a glass Like a Captain!

Loconut Rocks.description: Captain Morgan LocoNut doesn't need much–just add ice!
Loconut Rocks.name: Loconut Rocks
Loconut Rocks.recipeInstructions: Combine Captain Morgan LocoNut into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a rocks glass with ice

Captain Morgan Loconut.description:
Captain Morgan is going loco for coco. Our newest flavor is an intensely delicious blend of caribbean rum, coconut liqueur, spice and natural flavors–perfect for poolside or a backyard bbq. 
Crack open one of our coconut-scented bottles and raise a glass Like a Captain!

London Mule.description: A modern take on the classic 1950's cocktail, the London Mule mixes gin with spicy ginger beer and fresh lime juice.
London Mule.name: London Mule
London Mule.recipeInstructions: Fill Mason glass with ice. Pour in gin and ginger beer. Garnish with lime and fresh ginger

Fever Tree Ginger Beer.description: By brewing a blend of three gingers from Nigeria, Cochin and the Ivory Coast, Fever Tree has created an award winning ginger beer that has been highly acclaimed by gastronomes and critics alike. Fever Tree Ginger Beer is perfect in a Dark & Stormy, Moscow Mule or simply as a soft drink on its own.

Bulldog London Dry Gin.description: Less juniper heavy and more dominantly citrus, BULLDOG is a refreshing gin that is smooth enough to drink on the rocks, bold enough to perfect the gin & tonic, and versatile enough to shake up any cocktail.

Long Island Iced Tea.description: Many claim to be the creators of this young-at-heart staple (all with slightly differing ingredient lists), but this version is the real deal. And while the name of this classic cocktail is misleading, very few actually liken the taste to a real iced tea. One thing we know for sure is that this cocktail has certainly made a name for itself outside of Long Island.
recipeIngredient:
1/2 oz Vodka
1/2 oz Silver Tequila
1/2 Gin
1/2 White Rum
1/4 oz Cointreau or Triple Sec Liqueur
1/4 oz Fresh Lemon Juice
Cola (preferably not diet)
Lemon wedge
Long Island Iced Tea.name: Long Island Iced Tea
Long Island Iced Tea.recipeInstructions: Add all ingredients except cola to ice-filled shaker; shake for 5-10 seconds. Pour contents, including ice, into pint glass. Top with splash of cola and gently stir. Garnish with a cherry and citrus wedge.

Coca-Cola.description: Bring home the refreshing taste of Coca-Cola. Serve ice cold for maximum refreshment.

Cointreau.description:
Cointreau, the crystal clear Orange Liqueur, founded in Angers, France, remains one of the world's most distinguished spirits with over 160 years of history. 


Renowned for its perfect balance of sweet and bitter orange peels and made with only the finest all-natural ingredients, Cointreau has a uniquely refreshing and complex taste. A versatile, 80 proof spirit, Cointreau can be enjoyed as the base spirit in many cocktails, such as the Cointreau Rickey, but is also an essential ingredient in the most popular cocktails including the Margarita, the Cosmopolitan, and the Sidecar.

ReaLemon Lemon Juice.description: ReaLemon is 100% real lemon juice made from concentrate, and it's a great alternative to the hassle of fresh lemons. ReaLemon is a space-saving kitchen sidekick, ideal for adding a delicious twist of lemon to your favorite seafood and poultry recipes, plus it's great in marinades and it brightens up both hot and cold beverages. Since 1934, ReaLemon has been a trusted brand to deliver quality lemon juice.

Stirrings Simple Syrup.description: Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is a starting point for many great cocktails. Set the foundation of your delicious drink with this kosher syrup, 12 oz, and take the guesswork out of making a tasty cocktail. This simple tonic, pack of 6, contains pure cane sugar and purified water in just the right proportion. This Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is the original inspiration for Stirrings "simple mixers" and is the critical first step for a yummy cocktail.

Lychee Martini.description: This lychee martini is a classy uptown cocktail with a nod to Halloween with it's 'eyeball' popsicle and bloody rim. But these fun touches also add to the fragrant flavor of this easy drink.
Lychee Martini.name: Lychee Martini
Lychee Martini.recipeInstructions: Put one of the raspberries into the middle of one of the lychee so the end of the berry is facing outward (ie you can't see the open part). . Press a short popsicle stick into the other end of the lychee then sit on a plate or baking sheet and freeze for at least 2 hours until frozen (you can also do the day before). . When ready to make drink, put some ice in your glass to chill it. . Crush the rest of the raspberries on a plate to form a paste. . Put the remaining lychee in a cocktail shaker or small bowl and add the 1/2tbsp syrup from the can. . Muddle/crush the lychee to release the juices. . Add the gin/vodka and vermouth and shake/stir to mix. . Discard the ice from the glass and dip the rim of the glass in the mashed raspberries to give a red rim to the glass. You can dab on extra by hand. . Put the frozen lychee 'popsicle' in the glass then strain the lychee martini into the glass and enjoy!

Tito's Handmade Vodka.description: Tito's Handmade Vodka is designed to be savored by spirit connoisseurs.  It is micro-distilled in an old-fashioned pot still, just like fine single malt scotches and high-end French cognacs.  This time-honored method of distillation requires more skill and effort than modern column stills, but it's well worth it. Our handcrafted technique offers more  control over the distillation process, resulting in a spectacularly clean product of incomparable excellence.  Only the heart of the run, "the nectar" is taken, leaving behind residual higher and lower alcohols.  The vodka is cleansed of phenols, esters, congenersand organic acids by filtering it through the finest activated carbon available.  Critics call Tito's "a homegrown symphonic spirit to applaud!" and say "it can go head to head with any of the worlds' greats and not break a sweat.

Madras.description: The Madras is an easy drink to mix and serve whenever you have guests around. Perfect for every season, we love how quick this vodka cocktail is to mix up. For a spicy twist try infusing vodka with jalapeno to give this drink a little kick in the patchwork shorts.
recipeIngredient:
2 oz Vodka
3 oz Cranberry Juice
1 oz Orange Juice
Fresh Lime Wedge
Madras.name: Madras
Madras.recipeInstructions: In a rocks glass over ice combine vodka and juices. Stir and serve with a fresh lime wedge

Ocean Spray Cranberry Juice Cocktail.description: Enjoy the crisp, clean taste of real cranberries straight from the bog. It’s a delicious way to get your daily dose of vitamin C and unique cranberry health benefits.

Mai Tai.description: Made popular through Elvis Presley's film Blue Hawaiian, the Mai Tai is a classic tropical drink synonymous with Tiki Culture. This recipe calls for a unique ingredient Orgeat, an almond syrup, that adds a little extra sweetness.
recipeIngredient: Fresh Orange and Lime to Garnish
Mai Tai.name: Mai Tai
Mai Tai.recipeInstructions: Combine all ingredients into a shaker with ice, shake vigorously until cold about 10 seconds. Strain into a collins glass over fresh ice and enjoy!

Sailor Jerry Spiced Rum.description:
In the past, a ship's captain would take a ladle of rum, add gunpowder and ignite it to provide "proof" of the rum's integrity to his crew. Sailor Jerry continues this age-old tradition of serving quality spiced rum to provide an unmatched base for mixed drinks. 

The brand prides itself on creating spiced rum the old-school way, using an expert blend of carefully chosen spices in high-proof rum for a perfectly balanced liquid. Because sailors refused to water down their spirits, this 92-proof spiced rum definitely offers a historically accurate experience.

Crafted after intensive research into historical maritime rums, Sailor Jerry developed a smooth rum with a rich flavor. The result is a high-proof spirit that's perfect for mixing in your favorite cocktails, including Long Island Iced Teas, Mai Tais and Mojitos. The rum features prominent oak and vanilla flavors with hints of cinnamon and clove spices.

Buy Sailor Jerry Rum online at a great price through Drizly and have it delivered directly to your door or pick it up in store.

Rose's Lime Juice.description: Rose's lime juice, often known simply as Rose's, is a concentrated fruit juice patented in 1867. This makes it the world's first concentrated bottled fruit juice drink.

Stirrings Simple Syrup.description: Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is a starting point for many great cocktails. Set the foundation of your delicious drink with this kosher syrup, 12 oz, and take the guesswork out of making a tasty cocktail. This simple tonic, pack of 6, contains pure cane sugar and purified water in just the right proportion. This Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is the original inspiration for Stirrings "simple mixers" and is the critical first step for a yummy cocktail.

Major's Punch.description: The perfect citrus and sparkling party punch taken up a notch with an unexpected Single Malt Scotch twist.
recipeIngredient:
7 1/2 oz Glen Grant The Major's Reserve
7 1/2 oz Aperol
5 oz Fresh Squeezed Lemon Juice
5 oz Fresh Squeezed Grapefruit Juice
2 1/2 oz Simple Syrup
5-10 oz Soda Water
Major's Punch.name: Major's Punch
Major's Punch.recipeInstructions: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl and mix well. Add ice. Garnish with lemon wheels. Let sit for one minute and stir again before serving in cocktail glasses

Canada Dry Club Soda.description: Since 1904, Canada Dry has been known for producing quality beverages and mixers. Canada Dry Club Soda offers a clean, sparkling taste, and it's the perfect addition to your favorite cocktail. It can also be enjoyed on its own for a unique, refreshing carbonated beverage alternative that contains zero calories and is caffeine free. Enjoy a refreshing taste of bubbly effervescence with Canada Dry Club Soda.

Aperol.description:
Aperol is a classic Italian aperitif and key ingredient in Italy’s most popular cocktail, the Aperol Spritz. Its low alcohol content makes it perfect for daytime. Bright orange in color, its unique bittersweet taste is derived from sweet and bitter oranges, herbs and roots. It is a secret recipe that has remained unchanged, since its creation in 1919.
An Aperol Spritz is unforgettably delicious and the perfect way to enjoy a weekend brunch or after work drink with friends.

Stirrings Simple Syrup.description: Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is a starting point for many great cocktails. Set the foundation of your delicious drink with this kosher syrup, 12 oz, and take the guesswork out of making a tasty cocktail. This simple tonic, pack of 6, contains pure cane sugar and purified water in just the right proportion. This Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is the original inspiration for Stirrings "simple mixers" and is the critical first step for a yummy cocktail.

Maker\u2019s Mark Purple Stallion Julep.description: Sweet and colorful, the Purple Stallion Julep is a tasty change on a classic drink. This bourbon and schnapps drink is perfect for sitting back and watching any game!
Maker\u2019s Mark Purple Stallion Julep.name: Maker’s Mark Purple Stallion Julep
Maker\u2019s Mark Purple Stallion Julep.recipeInstructions:
Muddle
together 1/3 cup fresh blueberries, DeKuyper Blueberry Schnapps and simple
syrup. Add
the bourbon, stir well and top with lots of crushed ice. Garnish
with fresh mint

Maker's Mark Bourbon Whisky.description:
Maker's Mark started with bread, of course. Bill Samuels bought the Burks' Distillery in Loretto, Kentucky, in 1953 and did the predictable – just not in a predictable way.

He wanted to select the right mashbill for his new Bourbon. He took inspiration from the Old Fitzgerald and W. L. Weller recipes made by Pappy Van Winkle. He did not want to take the time to distill, age and taste each candidate, so he made a loaf of bread from each mix of grain. One had no rye in it.

No rye? Samuels liked the loaf without the rye best so he ran with it. The winner contained the customary corn with malted barley and a large dose of red winter wheat. The product is in stark contrast to rye-heavy spirits like Bulleit or Knob Creek.

The result is less spicy than the rye-influenced whiskeys. Bring a glass to your nose. You'll smell spiced honey, cut fruit and citrus peel. Have a sip. Barley malt, butterscotch and vanilla bean will gradually bloom on your tongue. Wait a moment. The finish is of medium length with gentle caramel and dry oak spice.

This collection of flavors makes Maker's Mark very friendly with sweet vermouth. It makes a fine Manhattan with a cherry. Go light with the bitters. It's also a great choice with an Old Fashioned, particularly if you have dark purple Bing cherries to muddle.

If you're feeling funky, ask yourself two questions. Does bourbon like peaches? Both are as southern as sassafras. Does peach like orange? Of course, or we'd have no Fuzzy Navel. Bring all three together. Add 1 1/2 ounces of Maker's with 3/4 of an ounce peach schnapps to an ounce of OJ. Shake that well and then serve it up or on the rocks. There's a navel with some extra fuzz.

For your home bar (depending on your budget and the height of your top shelf) Maker's Mark makes a fine everyday house bourbon or a special occasion sipper to put next to your best bottles from Scotland, Ireland and Japan. Buy Maker’s Mark Whisky online at a great price on Drizly and have it delivered directly to your door or pick it up in store.

DeKuyper Blueberry Schnapps Liqueur.description: DeKuyper® Blueberry Schnapps Liqueur delivers the full-bodied taste of blueberry in every sip. This blueberry liqueur captures the taste of fresh, ripe blueberries in a cocktail glass. Great it on its own for a smooth, full-bodied drink, it balances your favorite cocktails with its deep blueberry flavor. Mix up favorite cocktails like Mojitos and Margaritas with a shot or two for a kick of blueberry color and sweetness.

Mango Margarita.description: The Mango Margarita is one of the most popular variations of this crowd-favorite cocktail. The smooth fruitiness of mango is a delicious addition. We always sip this cocktail on the rocks with a salted rim.
recipeIngredient: 1 oz Cointreau or Triple Sec Liqueur
Mango Margarita.name: Mango Margarita
Mango Margarita.recipeInstructions: Combine ingredients in an ice filled shaker and shake for 5-10 seconds. Strain into an ice filled rocks glass

Cointreau.description:
Cointreau, the crystal clear Orange Liqueur, founded in Angers, France, remains one of the world's most distinguished spirits with over 160 years of history. 


Renowned for its perfect balance of sweet and bitter orange peels and made with only the finest all-natural ingredients, Cointreau has a uniquely refreshing and complex taste. A versatile, 80 proof spirit, Cointreau can be enjoyed as the base spirit in many cocktails, such as the Cointreau Rickey, but is also an essential ingredient in the most popular cocktails including the Margarita, the Cosmopolitan, and the Sidecar.

Rose's Lime Juice.description: Rose's lime juice, often known simply as Rose's, is a concentrated fruit juice patented in 1867. This makes it the world's first concentrated bottled fruit juice drink.

Lunazul Blanco Tequila.description:
Sometimes you can have it all. Lunazul Blanco small-batch, 100% Agave Tequila, is what great Tequila should be—straightforward, authentic and smooth. Exceptionally smooth and balanced with bright color and silver highlights.

Aroma: Refreshing fruity nose exhibiting tropical and apple notes with a healthy dose of salt and citrus, similar to that of fresh agave.
Taste: The palate is semi-viscous and peppery with ripe fruit tones giving way to crisp citrus notes and a hint of vanilla.
Finish: Wonderfully balanced finish with long lasting citrusy, peppery, and herbaceous notes

Looza Mango Juice.description: Contains 35% juice  This juice is USDA organic

Manhattan.description: The original classic cocktail, perfect for any occasion.
Manhattan.name: Manhattan
Manhattan.recipeInstructions: Fill a mixing glass with all the ingredients and add ice. Stir gently for 10-15 seconds. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry

Woodford Reserve Kentucky Straight Bourb.description: Woodford Reserve is built around flavor. The art of making fine bourbon first took place on the site of the Woodford Reserve Distillery, a National Historic Landmark, in 1812. The perfectly balanced taste of our Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey is composed of more than 200 detectable flavor notes, from bold grain and wood, to sweet aromatics, spice, and fruit & floral notes.

Maple Bourbon Old Fashioned.description: We substituted maple syrup for sugar in this seasonal take on an old fashioned. It will give the drink a more smooth and earthy flavor.
Maple Bourbon Old Fashioned.name: Maple Bourbon Old Fashioned
Maple Bourbon Old Fashioned.recipeInstructions: In a rocks glass combine 3 dashes of bitters and maple syrup. Add whiskey and a large ice cube and stir. Garnish with a twisted orange rind and serve

Angostura Bitters.description:
You can’t—or at least you shouldn’t—make an Old Fashioned without them! Angostura Bitters are the most famous and prevalent type of bitters.  But what are bitters exactly? They are an alcoholic, highly concentrated, botanical concoction used to give your cocktail a bitter, sour, or bittersweet flavor. Because of the strong flavor bitters are added to drinks in dashes. (Two or three should do the trick.) 
This specific brand is named after Angostura, the Venezuelan town where they were first produced. The recipe is a closely guarded secret, with just five people knowing the exact formula. Angostura bitters were first used to soothe soldiers’ upset stomachs and are believed to have other healing benefits but we’re pretty sure your bottle will spend more time on your bar cart than in your medicine cabinet.

Maple Negroni.description: This cocktail is a twist on the classic negroni. The only difference in the two is the maple syrup that has been added and of course the bacon garnish. This is a great cocktail to make for Campari beginners because it balances the bitterness.
recipeIngredient:
1.5 gin
1 ounce of Camapri
1 ounce of Vermouth
1 teaspoon of Pure Maple Syrup
1/2 cup of Ice
Maple Negroni.name: Maple Negroni
Maple Negroni.recipeInstructions: In a shaker add gin, Campari, vermouth, maple syrup, and ice. Shake mixture for 20 seconds. Strain mixture into serving glass. Garnish with Bacon and Orange Peel

Campari.description:
For over 150 years, Campari has been a favorite liqueur for drinkers with different tastes. The liquid is a dark red color and is often mixed with other alcohols and non-alcoholic drinks for cocktails. The drink was created in 1860.
 
Depending on where the Campari is sold, the alcohol content ranges from 20.5 percent to 28 percent. When you smell Campari, you'll be reminded of pomegranate, strawberry, spicy herbs, bitter orange and cherry. The flavor starts off sweet and is followed by an herbal, spicy taste. After that, the bitterness of the drink starts to build. This is a wholly unique drink.

The recipe and creation process of Campari is still a secret to this day. Depending on your source, even the number of ingredients changes (ranging from 20 to 80). However, there are a few ingredients that are known. Campari includes fruits in water and alcohol as well as an infusion of herbs.

The most common ways to drink Campari are in cocktails, with prosecco or with soda water. While you can drink it neat, many have trouble with the bitter taste. Because of this, many of the mixed drinks that use Campari are strong flavored as well.

The most well-known drink using Campari is a Negroni. A Negroni can be served either straight up or on the rocks. All you need for this classic mixed drink is one ounce of dry gin, one ounce of Campari and one ounce of sweet vermouth. Mix these three together either in a mixing glass with ice or mix them right in the glass with some ice.

Another great Campari-based mixed drink is the Jasmine. In a cocktail shaker, combine one-and-a-half ounces of gin, three-quarters of an ounce of fresh-squeezed lemon juice, a quarter ounce of Campari and a quarter ounce of Cointreau. Fill the shaker with ice and shake for about 10 seconds. Strain your drink into a cocktail glass. Don't forget to add a lemon twist garnish for the perfect bold drink.

Buy Campari online through Drizly and have it delivered directly to your door or pick it up in store.

Cinzano Rosso Sweet Vermouth.description: A blend of high quality red wine and essences of herbs and spices, creating a delicate and balanced refreshing drink, a slight sweetness balances with herbal bitterness. Serve on its own or mixed.

Bulldog London Dry Gin.description: Less juniper heavy and more dominantly citrus, BULLDOG is a refreshing gin that is smooth enough to drink on the rocks, bold enough to perfect the gin & tonic, and versatile enough to shake up any cocktail.

Martinique.description: A variation on the French Martini, this recipe replaces pineapple for the more exotic, Carribbean flavor of mango. Chambord is one of our favorite cocktail additions -- when we restock our bar, we always make sure a bottle of this is on the list.
Martinique.name: Martinique
Martinique.recipeInstructions: In a cocktail shaker with ice, combine all ingredients and shake until frosty and cold. Strain into a martini glass

ReaLemon Lemon Juice.description: ReaLemon is 100% real lemon juice made from concentrate, and it's a great alternative to the hassle of fresh lemons. ReaLemon is a space-saving kitchen sidekick, ideal for adding a delicious twist of lemon to your favorite seafood and poultry recipes, plus it's great in marinades and it brightens up both hot and cold beverages. Since 1934, ReaLemon has been a trusted brand to deliver quality lemon juice.

Chambord Black Raspberry Liqueur.description: Chambord® is a premium liqueur produced in the Loire Valley of France. An infusion of raspberries, blackberries and the exotic flavors of black raspberries, black currant, Madagascar vanilla and XO cognac, Chambord creates a more extraordinary cocktail.

Looza Mango Juice.description: Contains 35% juice  This juice is USDA organic

Melon Madness.description: Made with juicy honeydew and 100% agave, this Melon Madness makes it easy to score cool points with your friends. Are you game?
recipeIngredient: 2 parts Sauza® Signature Blue Silver Tequila
Melon Madness.name: Melon Madness
Melon Madness.recipeInstructions:
Add ingredients to blender with ice and blend
till smooth. Pour into glass and serve. Garnish with honeydew melon

Sauza Signature Blue Silver Tequila.description:
According to legend, when the Spanish conquistadors ran out of the brandy they brought from Europe, they began to distill a local agave drink, which became North America’s first indigenous distilled spirit. In 1873, this golden beverage was dubbed “tequila” by Don Cenobio Sauza, who founded La Perseverancia Distillery in Tequila, Mexico. He became the first to export tequila to the rest of the world, and today, Sauza offers a full line of tequila. Sauza® Signature Blue Silver Tequila is a 100% agave tequila complemented by an added herbal dimension for a consistently smooth flavor. Bright silver with crystal hints, the aroma of this tequila offers a balance of agave and herbal notes with hints of spice while agave and citrus flavors can be tasted on the palate. The short finish also has a warm, balanced body. Ideal for margaritas.

Winner of Gold Medal at the 2017 SIP Awards

Mercy.description: Inspired by the conclusion of All Out War in Robert Kirkman's The Walking Dead, this cocktail is aptly named Mercy. It's a smooth, fruity, and refreshing tasting cocktail.
Mercy.name: Mercy
Mercy.recipeInstructions: In a cocktail shaker, combine Ketel One Vodka, dry vermouth, juice of half of a Meyer lemon, organic agave nectar, and orange bitters with ice. Shake vigorously until the sound of the ice disappears. Pour into a martini glass using a cocktail strainer. Zest and rim the glass with the peel of the Meyer lemon. Garnish with a lemon peel and mint sprig

Ketel One Vodka.description:
Ketel One, the world's bestselling premium vodka, is an exceptionally smooth, family-made concoction that is loved the world over. Made at the historic Nolet Distillery in the Netherlands, Ketel One Vodka is crafted from 100 percent wheat in copper-pot stills. The mixture is filtered over loose charcoals and rested in tile-lined tanks, resulting in an 80-proof (40 percent ABV) spirit. The vodka takes its name from the original coal-fired copper still used in its production, the Distilleerketel #1.

Born under the watchful eye of its Master Distiller, Ketel One is one of the smoothest vodkas on the planet. The first thing you'll notice when opening a bottle is the distinct freshness with hints of honey and citrus fragrances. Take a sip and allow the silky vodka to coat your tongue, savoring its crisp, lively tingle. Ketel One's subtle flavors and long finish ensure its premium quality. There's simply nothing quite like it.

As a premium vodka, Ketel One is best enjoyed neat for the full flavor profile. Even so, you can't beat the array of cocktails born of this expertly-crafted liquid, including the quintessential Ketel One Mule. Fill a copper mug or highball glass with Ketel One, ginger beer and fresh lime juice garnished with lime for an elegant drink that stands out at parties.

Prefer a martini? Try Ketel One vodka with vermouth and a twist of lemon. For something even more refreshing, go with a Ketel Soda, which is simply Ketel One vodka and club soda with fresh cucumber and mint.

Buy Ketel One online at a great price through Drizly and enjoy a glass of this great tasting vodka.

Dolin Dry Vermouth.description: Dolin Vermouths are notably lighter, drier and less pungent than their larger commercial counterparts. The particular mixture of plants found near Chambéry give a fresh, restrained and elegant nose, with a subtle, complex bittersweet palate. Even the Blanc and Rouge retain great balance, with the sugar never cloying, and just enough bitterness to whet the appetite. Each can be enjoyed as aperitif on ice, with a twist of citrus, or in a broad array of traditional cocktails.

Fee Brothers Orange Bitters.description: The best bartenders and master-Mixologists know the secret to a happy customer is the magic that goes into every creation. The fine flavor of this product is obtained principally from the skins of oranges grown in the West Indies.

Mexican Mule.description: You've heard of The Moscow Mule—well, this mule's got way more kick. Swap that vodka for Espolon Blanco, and mix with ginger beer and lime juice. Garnish and go. You've just brought “the party" to your next dinner party.
Mexican Mule.name: Mexican Mule
Mexican Mule.recipeInstructions:
Add ingredients to mixing glass, then add ice. 
Shake and strain into a mule mug or rocks glass. 
Top with ginger beer. 
Garnish with lime wheel or wedge

Espol\u00f2n Blanco.description: Espolòn Blanco, our signature tequila, is the purest expression of our passion for Mexico’s legendary spirit. Made only with 100% Blue Weber agave it carries delicate  floral and tropical fruit notes and a clean finish. Espolòn Blanco can be enjoyed neat or as the perfect accompaniment to a classic tequila cocktail. Our label, featuring the brand’s iconic rooster Ramón, is inspired by the famous Mexican artist José Guadalupe Posada and references the charge in the fight for Mexico’s independence.

Rose's Lime Juice.description: Rose's lime juice, often known simply as Rose's, is a concentrated fruit juice patented in 1867. This makes it the world's first concentrated bottled fruit juice drink.

Mezcal Antiguo Fashioned.description: We've taken the classic Old Fashioned south of the boarder with this 'nuevo' twist. The Mezcal Antiquo Fashioned swaps the bourbon or rye found in a typical Old Fashioned for smokey mezcal and resposado tequila. Garnish this drink with a charred jalapeno and you've got a refined fiesta in a glass.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 oz Fresh Squeezed Blood Orange Juice
Mezcal Antiguo Fashioned.name: Mezcal Antiguo Fashioned
Mezcal Antiguo Fashioned.recipeInstructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.. Pour in tequila, mezcal, agave, blood orange juice and your dash of bitters.. Stir ingredients with a bar spoon to combine.. Strain into a rocks glass over large ice sphere or cube.. Garnish with charred jalapeno and slice of blood orange.

Angostura Bitters.description:
You can’t—or at least you shouldn’t—make an Old Fashioned without them! Angostura Bitters are the most famous and prevalent type of bitters.  But what are bitters exactly? They are an alcoholic, highly concentrated, botanical concoction used to give your cocktail a bitter, sour, or bittersweet flavor. Because of the strong flavor bitters are added to drinks in dashes. (Two or three should do the trick.) 
This specific brand is named after Angostura, the Venezuelan town where they were first produced. The recipe is a closely guarded secret, with just five people knowing the exact formula. Angostura bitters were first used to soothe soldiers’ upset stomachs and are believed to have other healing benefits but we’re pretty sure your bottle will spend more time on your bar cart than in your medicine cabinet.

Tres Agaves Agave Nectar.description: Our organic cocktail-ready agave nectar, made with organic agaves, is the original and only organic agave sweetener on the market created specifically for Margaritas and other mixed drinks.  We've balanced it with just enough purified water so it measures, pours, and dissolves easily, with a consistent sweetness level, making it the finest simple syrup available.  Just add TRES AGAVES 100% Agave Tequila and unsweetened lime juice for the ultimate fresh Margarita!

Mezcal Michelada.description: Looking for a way to take your brunch game to the next level? Give the Mezcal Michelada a try. This spicy, smokey and tangy beer cocktail is the perfect compliment to any breakfast. Beer, lime, hot sauce and mezcal, what more is there to say?
Mezcal Michelada.name: Mezcal Michelada
Mezcal Michelada.recipeInstructions: Fill glass with ice.. Pour the lime juice, mezcal and hot sauce.. Fill to top with beer.. Stir gently with bar spoon to combine.. Garnish with a pinch of salt and a lime wheel.. Enjoy.

Corona Extra.description:
A staple at everything from summer beach parties to everyday occasions, Corona Extra is a pilsner-type Mexican beer with a slightly sweet taste and a dash of citrus. Hints of lemon and ginger round out the flavor for a crisp and firm taste. Corona Extra was first introduced in the U.S. in 1981, and became the fastest growing imported beer in U.S. history. Corona Extra has been brewed and bottled in Mexico since 1925, and is the #1 selling imported beer in the U.S. 
For serving, try adding a fresh wedge of lime to bring out the citrus flavors. We recommend enjoying this simple brew from the bottle (or can), and if possible on a beach somewhere.

Morton Kosher Salt.description: Morton Coarse Kosher Salt is a versatile salt loved by chefs for its texture, ease of use and its ability to bring out the natural flavors of food. The coarse flake crystals of Morton Coarse Kosher Salt are much bigger than regular table salt crystals, making it easy to pinch for measuring and sprinkling. Also, the larger flakes adhere well to food and dissolve slowly, providing a well-rounded flavor. While Morton Coarse Kosher Salt can be used in many ways, it's ideal for brining and rimming margarita glasses as well as roasting, marinades and rubs.

Michelada.description: A mexican-style beer cocktail with a little kick and a dash of lime. A perfect sipping drink for street tacos or Sunday brunch.
recipeIngredient: 1 bottle of cold Mexican Lager Beer (Corona, Tecate, Modelo Especial, etc)
2 dashes of Tabasco Sauce or other hot sauce
Michelada.name: Michelada
Michelada.recipeInstructions: Rim an empty pint glass with equal parts black pepper, cayenne pepper, and celery salt. In the same chilled pint glass, combine all ingredients except the beer including hot sauce to your liking. Add beer slowly and stir. Garnish with fresh lime wedge

Midnight Rum Runner.description: This take on the classic Rum Runner gets an upgrade with the use of Luxardo Cherry syrup in place of grenadine. Mixing the liquors together ahead of time makes this tropical tasting cocktail easy to transport to your next party.
recipeIngredient: 1 ¼ oz Luxardo Cherry Syrup (from the jar)
Midnight Rum Runner.name: Midnight Rum Runner
Midnight Rum Runner.recipeInstructions:
Combine the above ingredients in a glass bottle or jar and set aside.. Once mixed store in a cool dark place of the fridge for up to 1 month. . 
When ready to serve combine 1 part above mixture, ½ part orange juice, ½ part pineapple juice over ice. Stir and enjoy.

Luxardo Maraschino Cherries.description: These little gourmet cherries will make a big difference in every cocktail they touch. Each jar contains ridiculously delicious, all-natural whole pitted cherries, candied with Marasca syrup. Luxardo is a premium name in mixology, known for their excellence in creating infused liqueurs. They've perfected the cocktail cherry, transforming it from a garnish to an essential ingredient. It's amazing how one little piece of fruit can kick ordinary drinks into overdrive. An exclusive Italian import, they've been used by top pastry chefs around the globe for years. If you really care about your cocktails, you've gotta try these incredible cherries.

Bols Banana Liqueur.description: Rich full bodied banana flavor is perfect in tropical drinks and for any backing recipies that call for a banana flavoring.

Leopold Bros Rocky Mountain Blackberry L.description: Using blackberries from the northwestern region of the Rocky Mountains, Leopold Bros. creates a rich and complex liqueur that can be used in cocktails, as a digestive, and even in cooking. The deep purple color is derived from the juice of the blackberries themselves rather than food coloring or artifical additives. To preserve the integrity of the spirit, Leopold Bros. bottles the liqueur by hand.

Midori Sour.description: A fruity and refreshing take on the whiskey sour. The Midori Sour is the perfect combination of sweet and sour. Lower on alcohol volume than other cocktails this is an easy sipper that's still big on flavor.
Midori Sour.name: Midori Sour
Midori Sour.recipeInstructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously for 5-10 seconds. Strain into a highball glass and garnish with cherry

Rose's Lime Juice.description: Rose's lime juice, often known simply as Rose's, is a concentrated fruit juice patented in 1867. This makes it the world's first concentrated bottled fruit juice drink.

Canada Dry Lemon-Lime Seltzer.description: Canada Dry Lemon Lime Sparkling Seltzer Water is a crisp, bubbly sparkling water beverage that provides all of the hydration benefits of regular water, but with a bright sparkle and a refreshing citrus twist of all-natural lemon lime flavor. With no calories and zero sweeteners, Canada Dry Sparkling Seltzer Water is water made interesting.

Midori Melon Liqueur.description: Midori is a vibrant green, honeydew melon flavored liqueur launched in the US in 1978. It's high versatility and refreshing melon taste has made it an essential bar ingredient, used in world famous cocktails such as the Midori Margarita and Melonball. Produced in Mexico by Suntory, Midori Melon Liqueur is today available in more than 30 countries worldwide.

Mr & Mrs T Sweet & Sour Mix.description: Serve up some fun at your next party or gathering with the premium, quality ingredients in Mr & Mrs T cocktail mixers. Available in an assortment of flavors from sweet to savory, Mr & Mrs T mixers are a guaranteed crowd pleaser. The Sweet & Sour Mix is perfected with juicy, ripe orange flavor paired with a tart hint of lime. All mixers are ready to be mixed with your favorite spirits or enjoyed as a virgin cocktail, and this 1 L bottle is the perfect size for entertaining. Mix cocktails like a pro with the made-from-scratch taste of Mr & Mrs T.

Midsummer Mimosa.description: Make the mimost of your next brunch with this elevated twist on a classic, bubbly orange cocktail.
Midsummer Mimosa.name: Midsummer Mimosa
Midsummer Mimosa.recipeInstructions: Combine Hendrick's Midsummer Solstice and orange juice in a flute glass. Top with sparkling wine. Garnish with orange slice

La Marca Prosecco.description: Our delicate La Marca Prosecco has a pale, golden straw color and sparkles with lively effervescence. Opening with aromas of fresh-picked citrus and honeysuckle blossoms, the crisp, clean palate brings fruity notes of green apple, juicy peach and ripe lemon, framed by hints of minerality. The finish is light and fruit-forward with a refreshing style.

Oranges.description: Juicy and sweet and renowned for its concentration of vitamin C, oranges make the perfect snack and add a special tang to many recipes; it is no wonder that they are one of the most popular fruits in the world. Oranges are generally available from winter through summer with seasonal variations depending on the variety.

Midsummer Spritz.description: Watch your cocktail blossom as Hendrick's Midsummer Solstice captures the essence of summer in every bubble. Mix up a batch and enjoy with friends.
Midsummer Spritz.name: Midsummer Spritz
Midsummer Spritz.recipeInstructions: Combine Hendrick's Midsummer Solstice, elderflower liqueur, and lemon juice in a cocktail glass over ice. Gently stir. Top with soda water. Garnish with orange and cucumber slice

Canada Dry Club Soda.description: Since 1904, Canada Dry has been known for producing quality beverages and mixers. Canada Dry Club Soda offers a clean, sparkling taste, and it's the perfect addition to your favorite cocktail. It can also be enjoyed on its own for a unique, refreshing carbonated beverage alternative that contains zero calories and is caffeine free. Enjoy a refreshing taste of bubbly effervescence with Canada Dry Club Soda.

St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur.description:
Creating spirits is a labor of love, but few other liqueurs have such a laborious process. To gather the elderflowers needed to distill St. Germain Elderflower Liqueur, a team of 40 to 50 workers head to the French countryside and pick the blossoms of the beautiful flower. The window for picking the flowers is short, lasting only a few weeks in the spring. The rush to pick the blossoms resembles a last-minute rush by boyfriends or husbands to grab a fresh bouquet on Valentine's Day, but St. Germain Elderflower Liqueur boasts more satisfied recipients. Once picked, a race starts to begin the distillation process as the delicate flavors begin to dissipate only a short time after harvest.
The elderflowers undergo a maceration process that accentuates and perpetuates their delicate flavor and aroma. The process has taken over 100 years to perfect, which makes mastery of video games look far less impressive. Workers mix the elderflower blossoms with a small amount of citrus fruits and cane sugar to heighten the subtle flavor, but the result is nothing short of spectacular. It is a delicate, balanced liqueur that delivers hints of pear, apricot, lychee and grapefruit zest. Despite the fruit presence, it has a bit of tartness to balance it out. It's not exactly like a liquid Sweet Tart, and only an actual taste gives you the sense of its true flavor. Mix it with champagne or other cocktails for some added sweetness, or enjoy it on its own for a mind-blowing after dinner cocktail.

ReaLemon Lemon Juice.description: ReaLemon is 100% real lemon juice made from concentrate, and it's a great alternative to the hassle of fresh lemons. ReaLemon is a space-saving kitchen sidekick, ideal for adding a delicious twist of lemon to your favorite seafood and poultry recipes, plus it's great in marinades and it brightens up both hot and cold beverages. Since 1934, ReaLemon has been a trusted brand to deliver quality lemon juice.

Oranges.description: Juicy and sweet and renowned for its concentration of vitamin C, oranges make the perfect snack and add a special tang to many recipes; it is no wonder that they are one of the most popular fruits in the world. Oranges are generally available from winter through summer with seasonal variations depending on the variety.

Mimosa.description: Mimosas have certainly gained their fame as your favorite brunch cocktail but we can assure you that they are good for any occasion.  The ratio of orange juice to Champagne is always subject to opinion but make sure both ingredients are chilled for the most refreshing outcome.  Feel free to add a teaspoon of Grand Marnier if you want to make your Mimosa a little more complex.  Last but not least, make sure you're never left brunching without one.  Enjoy.
Mimosa.name: Mimosa
Mimosa.recipeInstructions: Chill your Champagne and orange juice.. In a Champagne flute pour 2 oz of Champagne.. Top off with 1 oz of orange juice.. Add a teaspoon of Grand Marnier for an extra touch. (optional). Gently stir and garnish with a fresh orange slice.. Enjoy.

Mint Julep.description: While Mint Juleps will always have a strong association with Derby Day, it's perfectly acceptable to enjoy them throughout the year. Mint was first added to alcohol in London around 1800; the idea eventually found its way to the American south where it was added to bourbon, the rest was history. This simple cocktail with fresh mint over crushed ice creates a drink guaranteed to refresh.
recipeIngredient:
2 oz Bourbon
3/2 oz Simple Syrup
7 Large Mint Leaves
Mint Julep.name: Mint Julep
Mint Julep.recipeInstructions: Muddle 6 mint leaves and simple syrup in base of shaker. Add bourbon and ice then shake. Strain cocktail over old fashioned glass with with crushed ice. Top with additional crushed ice then add remaining mint leaf  to garnish and serve

Stirrings Simple Syrup.description: Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is a starting point for many great cocktails. Set the foundation of your delicious drink with this kosher syrup, 12 oz, and take the guesswork out of making a tasty cocktail. This simple tonic, pack of 6, contains pure cane sugar and purified water in just the right proportion. This Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is the original inspiration for Stirrings "simple mixers" and is the critical first step for a yummy cocktail.

Minty Fresh.description: This bubbly cocktail features fresh mint and lime juice for a drink that's reminescent of a mojito but classy enough to sip on New Year's Eve.
Minty Fresh.name: Minty Fresh
Minty Fresh.recipeInstructions: In the base of a cocktail shaker, combine fresh mint, sugar and lime juice. Muddle together, then add ice and cachaca, and shake until frosty and cold. Strain into a champagne flute, then fill the glass with cava

Rose's Lime Juice.description: Rose's lime juice, often known simply as Rose's, is a concentrated fruit juice patented in 1867. This makes it the world's first concentrated bottled fruit juice drink.

Portell Cava Brut.description: While the majority of Cava is dry, it ranges in style from driest to sweetness as follows: brut nature, brut, brut reserve, sec, semisec, and finally dolsec.    This high quality bubbly offers outstanding bang for the buck, and is an excellent substitute for those seeking high quality sparkling wines without spending a fortune.

Minty Mind Eraser.description: This Mind Eraser with Dry Lavender Soda and mint is the perfect cocktail for a romantic night in.
Minty Mind Eraser.name: Minty Mind Eraser
Minty Mind Eraser.recipeInstructions: Fill a rocks glass with ice. Pour in Kahlua. Pour in vodka and top with Dry Soda. Garnish with mint and enjoy!

Absolut Vodka.description: Absolut Vodka was first launched in New York in 1979. It soon became the talk of the town, in the US and eventually of the world. But the recipe behind the clean and natural taste of Absolut is actually older than 30 years. So is the 18th century medicine bottle found in an antique store in Stockholm, Sweden that gave inspiration to the iconic Absolut Vodka bottle.

Kahlua.description:
Kahlua coffee-flavored liqueur is made with the finest 100% Arabica coffee beans from Veracruz, Mexico. The climate in this region of the country produce well-rounded, light-bodied coffee. These quality beans  are then mixed with sugar cane rum, vanilla bean, and notes of caramel.  They combine perfectly to make an easy-sipping liqueur enjoyed by millions. Known for its deep brown color and smooth finish, Kahlua is the number one selling coffee liqueur in the world.

Kahlua is also the primary ingredient in a number of famous (or perhaps infamous) cocktails. The Espresso Martini, The Mind Eraser, and personal favorite of  “The Dude” The White Russian.

Minty Spritz.description: This minty spritz is twist on the insanely popular Aperol Spritz. A low-alcohol cocktail means you can enjoy more than one and not overindulge. We love this classic aperitif for the holidays because of the bright, bold colors and distinctive flavor.
Minty Spritz.name: Minty Spritz
Minty Spritz.recipeInstructions: Pour Prosecco in wine glass filled with ice. Add Aperol then top with club soda. Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint

Aperol.description:
Aperol is a classic Italian aperitif and key ingredient in Italy’s most popular cocktail, the Aperol Spritz. Its low alcohol content makes it perfect for daytime. Bright orange in color, its unique bittersweet taste is derived from sweet and bitter oranges, herbs and roots. It is a secret recipe that has remained unchanged, since its creation in 1919.
An Aperol Spritz is unforgettably delicious and the perfect way to enjoy a weekend brunch or after work drink with friends.

Mist and Cola.description: A simple combination of Canadian Mist and cola results in a classic drink.
Mist and Cola.name: Mist and Cola
Mist and Cola.recipeInstructions: Fill a lowball glass with ice. Pour in Mist and cola . Garnish with a maraschino cherry

Coca-Cola.description: Bring home the refreshing taste of Coca-Cola. Serve ice cold for maximum refreshment.

Canadian Mist Canadian Whisky.description: A premium blended whisky made with fresh water from the Georgian Bay, Canadian Mist® is aged in the finest white oak barrels that have been charred to exact specifications, imparting a smooth, classic whisky flavor.

Mist and Ginger.description: For a little bite with your Canadian Mist, add ginger ale and enjoy.
Mist and Ginger.name: Mist and Ginger
Mist and Ginger.recipeInstructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour in ingredients. Garnish with a maraschino cherry or a lemon peel, if desired

Canada Dry Ginger Ale.description: Any time is a great time for the crisp goodness of Canada Dry Ginger Ale. Never skimping on quality, Canada Dry Ginger Ale offers refreshingly real ginger taste that's made from real ginger and is caffeine free. Enhance your favorite cocktails with a sparkling splash of Canada Dry or enjoy by itself for crisp, clean refreshment. Creating quality beverages and mixers since 1904, enjoy the best in refreshment with Canada Dry.

Canadian Mist Canadian Whisky.description: A premium blended whisky made with fresh water from the Georgian Bay, Canadian Mist® is aged in the finest white oak barrels that have been charred to exact specifications, imparting a smooth, classic whisky flavor.

Mist and Orange.description: Add orange soda as a fruity compliment to your Canadian Mist.
Mist and Orange.name: Mist and Orange
Mist and Orange.recipeInstructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour in ingredients. Garnish with a maraschino cherry or a lemon peel

Canadian Mist Canadian Whisky.description: A premium blended whisky made with fresh water from the Georgian Bay, Canadian Mist® is aged in the finest white oak barrels that have been charred to exact specifications, imparting a smooth, classic whisky flavor.

MoTito.description: Refreshing and bright, the MoTito is a drink that has a name that's easy to remember and fun to say. Not to mention easy to make and drink.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 oz Simple Syrup or 2 tsp of Sugar
MoTito.name: MoTito
MoTito.recipeInstructions: Gently crush mint leaves between your fingers and add to a cocktail shaker. Fill the shaker with ice, Tito's Handmade Vodka, simple syrup (or sugar), and lime juice. Shake well. Pour everything, including the ice, into a rocks glass. Top with soda water

Tito's Handmade Vodka.description: Tito's Handmade Vodka is designed to be savored by spirit connoisseurs.  It is micro-distilled in an old-fashioned pot still, just like fine single malt scotches and high-end French cognacs.  This time-honored method of distillation requires more skill and effort than modern column stills, but it's well worth it. Our handcrafted technique offers more  control over the distillation process, resulting in a spectacularly clean product of incomparable excellence.  Only the heart of the run, "the nectar" is taken, leaving behind residual higher and lower alcohols.  The vodka is cleansed of phenols, esters, congenersand organic acids by filtering it through the finest activated carbon available.  Critics call Tito's "a homegrown symphonic spirit to applaud!" and say "it can go head to head with any of the worlds' greats and not break a sweat.

Canada Dry Club Soda.description: Since 1904, Canada Dry has been known for producing quality beverages and mixers. Canada Dry Club Soda offers a clean, sparkling taste, and it's the perfect addition to your favorite cocktail. It can also be enjoyed on its own for a unique, refreshing carbonated beverage alternative that contains zero calories and is caffeine free. Enjoy a refreshing taste of bubbly effervescence with Canada Dry Club Soda.

Stirrings Simple Syrup.description: Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is a starting point for many great cocktails. Set the foundation of your delicious drink with this kosher syrup, 12 oz, and take the guesswork out of making a tasty cocktail. This simple tonic, pack of 6, contains pure cane sugar and purified water in just the right proportion. This Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is the original inspiration for Stirrings "simple mixers" and is the critical first step for a yummy cocktail.

Mojito.description: The perfect drink to cool you down, this traditional Cuban highball drink has easily become one of the most popular cocktails around. Fresh muddled mint and lime make up the classic version but there seem to be more variations of Mojitos out there nowadays than we can count. Some prefer to strain this cocktail before serving but tradition says leave the mint leaves right where they are.
