Old Forester 1870 Original Batch Bourbon.description: 1870 Original Batch is a small batch of barrels from three warehouses to replicate George Garvin Brown’s batching process in 1870.

Vanilla Bean Mind Eraser.description: For the girls' night pregame? Kahlua, Absolut Vodka, Vanilla Bean Soda. As easy as 1, 2, 3, this new IT glam drink for girl's night can be made before your curling iron even has time to heat up!
recipeIngredient:
1 part Kahlua
1 part Vodka
1 part DRY Vanilla Bean Soda
Vanilla Bean Mind Eraser.name: Vanilla Bean Mind Eraser
Vanilla Bean Mind Eraser.recipeInstructions: Fill a rocks glass with ice to the brim. Add Kahlúa® and Absolut Vodka to the glass. Top with vanilla bean soda. Enjoy

Absolut Vodka.description: Absolut Vodka was first launched in New York in 1979. It soon became the talk of the town, in the US and eventually of the world. But the recipe behind the clean and natural taste of Absolut is actually older than 30 years. So is the 18th century medicine bottle found in an antique store in Stockholm, Sweden that gave inspiration to the iconic Absolut Vodka bottle.

Kahlua.description:
Kahlua coffee-flavored liqueur is made with the finest 100% Arabica coffee beans from Veracruz, Mexico. The climate in this region of the country produce well-rounded, light-bodied coffee. These quality beans  are then mixed with sugar cane rum, vanilla bean, and notes of caramel.  They combine perfectly to make an easy-sipping liqueur enjoyed by millions. Known for its deep brown color and smooth finish, Kahlua is the number one selling coffee liqueur in the world.

Kahlua is also the primary ingredient in a number of famous (or perhaps infamous) cocktails. The Espresso Martini, The Mind Eraser, and personal favorite of  “The Dude” The White Russian.

Vanilla Lime Mule.description: This simple, seasonal mule cocktail recipe is perfect for any cold weekend.
Vanilla Lime Mule.name: Vanilla Lime Mule
Vanilla Lime Mule.recipeInstructions: Combine Crown Royal Vanilla and lime juice in a shaker with ice. Shake well and drain into a mule mug over fresh ice. Top with ginger beer and garnish with a lime wheel. Top with aromatic bitters

Goslings Ginger Beer.description: We didn’t steer you wrong on the whole shorts thing. Trust us on this one, too. We spent over a year to achieve the ideal balance of sweetness and spiciness and matching it to the flavour profile of our award-winning Black Seal Rum.    Only our Black Seal Rum makes a Dark ‘n Stormy genuine. Only our Ginger Beer makes it perfect.

ReaLime Lime Juice.description: ReaLime Lime Juice From Concentrate is 100 percent natural-strength juice made from fresh, quality limes. ReaLime adds a perfect citrusy zing to beverages, marinades, meats, seafood and salads.

Crown Royal Vanilla.description: Carefully selected whiskies are infused with the rich flavor of Madagascar Bourbon Vanilla to create Crown Royal Vanilla. The blend finishes with a vicious, warming Crème Brulee aftertaste.

Scrappy's Aromatic Bitters.description: Scrappy’s answer to the classic aromatic bitters. These bitters were created to be used in classic cocktail recipes. They add balance – and a bit of spice – to your favorite spirits. They make a killer Bar Ginger, too!

Vanilla Spiced Cocktail.description: The ingredients to a good night? Vanilla, spice, and a little bit of ice.
recipeIngredient:
1 1/2 oz Baileys Original Irish Cream
1/4 oz Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum
1/4 oz Espresso
Vanilla Spiced Cocktail.name: Vanilla Spiced Cocktail
Vanilla Spiced Cocktail.recipeInstructions: Add ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a rocks glass

Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum.description: Captain Morgan is the original party spirit, a spiced rum that was born and blended to have a good time. So grab a bottle of Captain Morgan Spiced Rum, raise a leg, and toast to the adventure to be had. Captain’s orders!

Baileys Irish Cream Original.description:
What kind of cows make your liquor? This is an important question for the makers of Bailey's Irish Cream. Nearly 40,000 top-bred Irish dairy cows contribute cream to make the world's most popular liqueur. It's blended with pure Irish whiskey and a proprietary cocoa extract to make one of the best-selling alcoholic beverages on the planet. 

What can you mix it with? Nothing and practically anything. All by itself, perhaps on the rocks, it makes a smooth sipper. It's very friendly with coffee, hot cocoa and other liqueurs. Amaretto, peppermint schnapps, cinnamon liqueur or whiskey all get along nicely with Bailey's in a hot drink.

Because of its weight and viscosity, Bailey's performs well with layered drinks. Building a multilayer shot takes some practice and touch, but it's an old-school skill that will wow your guests. Consider the classic B-52 coffee with Kahlua and Grand Marnier. While nice on the rocks or with coffee, the B-52 was originally intended to be a layered shot.

To craft one, you must add ingredients in the proper order. It's Kahlua, Bailey's then Grand Marnier. You need a tool to gently add the ingredients without stirring things up. Some use the back of a spoon or a classic twisted swizzle stick. Bailey's is an infinitely usable bar pantry ingredient you should always have around. Don’t wait, buy Bailey’s Original Irish Cream through Drizly at a great price and have it delivered directly to your door or pick it up in store.

Vesper.description: What's cooler than a cocktail created by James Bond himself? (Answer: nothing.) Making its debut in Casino Royale, this drink melds a clean, refreshing taste with a subtle, sweet kick. A word to the wise, this is a large drink, so you may want to share this mission with a friend.
recipeIngredient:
3 oz Gin
1 oz Vodka
1/2 oz Lillet Blanc
Vesper.name: Vesper
Vesper.recipeInstructions: Combine all ingredients in an ice filled glass and stir for 15-20 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist

Lillet Servir Tres Frais Blanc.description:
Blended from 85 percent Semillon grapes from Bordeaux and 15 percent orange peels from Spain and Haiti, Lillet Blanc is an aromatic wine that's the perfect apéritif for any occasion. First produced in 1872, this golden-colored French wine was the harmonious blend of an idea from the Lillet brothers and some of the finest fruits from across the globe. The result is a flowery and fruity aroma that lends itself to a diverse mix of flavors. If only most brothers could put their minds to such good use instead of fighting!

Full and fleshy on the tongue, Lillet Blanc offers a mishmash of tastes including candied oranges, honey and pine resin. At 17 percent ABV, it's a bit stronger than most wines, but without being classified as a fortified wine.

Lillet Blanc is the classy drink that many people don't know exists. It's an excellent choice for a pre-dinner beverage, making a toast or paired with brunch. Drinking it on the rocks can bring out all the exotic fruits that go into its production, while an orange garnish adds a splash of color to the mix.

While Lillet Blanc is terrific on the rocks, the Vesper is a real show stopper. Made with gin, vodka and Lillet Blanc, it's the preferred beverage of James Bond in both books and film. It's not guaranteed to turn you into a suave secret agent, but at least you can try your hand at the accent.

Buy Lillet Blanc online at a great price through Drizly to enjoy a glass of this great tasting aperitif.

Vodka Gimlet.description: The classic Gimlet is typically served with gin although more and more people are ordering a Vodka Gimlet as the flavor is a bit more smooth. If you're a fan of making vodka drinks like this at home we suggest storing your vodka in the freezer to keep it primed for mixing.
Vodka Gimlet.name: Vodka Gimlet
Vodka Gimlet.recipeInstructions: In a shaker filled with ice combine vodka, lime juice and simple syrup; shake until cold. Pour into a martini glass or rocks glass over fresh ice. Garnish with a fresh wheel of lime

Rose's Lime Juice.description: Rose's lime juice, often known simply as Rose's, is a concentrated fruit juice patented in 1867. This makes it the world's first concentrated bottled fruit juice drink.

Stirrings Simple Syrup.description: Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is a starting point for many great cocktails. Set the foundation of your delicious drink with this kosher syrup, 12 oz, and take the guesswork out of making a tasty cocktail. This simple tonic, pack of 6, contains pure cane sugar and purified water in just the right proportion. This Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is the original inspiration for Stirrings "simple mixers" and is the critical first step for a yummy cocktail.

Vodka Soda.description: A classic, simple cocktail to please the masses!
Vodka Soda.name: Vodka Soda
Vodka Soda.recipeInstructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Mix in Ketel One Vodka and club soda. Garnish with a slice of lime

Ketel One Vodka.description:
Ketel One, the world's bestselling premium vodka, is an exceptionally smooth, family-made concoction that is loved the world over. Made at the historic Nolet Distillery in the Netherlands, Ketel One Vodka is crafted from 100 percent wheat in copper-pot stills. The mixture is filtered over loose charcoals and rested in tile-lined tanks, resulting in an 80-proof (40 percent ABV) spirit. The vodka takes its name from the original coal-fired copper still used in its production, the Distilleerketel #1.

Born under the watchful eye of its Master Distiller, Ketel One is one of the smoothest vodkas on the planet. The first thing you'll notice when opening a bottle is the distinct freshness with hints of honey and citrus fragrances. Take a sip and allow the silky vodka to coat your tongue, savoring its crisp, lively tingle. Ketel One's subtle flavors and long finish ensure its premium quality. There's simply nothing quite like it.

As a premium vodka, Ketel One is best enjoyed neat for the full flavor profile. Even so, you can't beat the array of cocktails born of this expertly-crafted liquid, including the quintessential Ketel One Mule. Fill a copper mug or highball glass with Ketel One, ginger beer and fresh lime juice garnished with lime for an elegant drink that stands out at parties.

Prefer a martini? Try Ketel One vodka with vermouth and a twist of lemon. For something even more refreshing, go with a Ketel Soda, which is simply Ketel One vodka and club soda with fresh cucumber and mint.

Buy Ketel One online at a great price through Drizly and enjoy a glass of this great tasting vodka.

Canada Dry Club Soda.description: Since 1904, Canada Dry has been known for producing quality beverages and mixers. Canada Dry Club Soda offers a clean, sparkling taste, and it's the perfect addition to your favorite cocktail. It can also be enjoyed on its own for a unique, refreshing carbonated beverage alternative that contains zero calories and is caffeine free. Enjoy a refreshing taste of bubbly effervescence with Canada Dry Club Soda.

Vodka Soda Jello Shots.description: If a Vodka & Soda is your go-to drink, you have to give these a shot (see what we did there?). Using spiked seltzer in place of plain club soda kicks these up a few notches, and opens up tons of opportunity to play around with different flavor combinations. If you are making for a party we recommend mixing up a few different batches and dropping in a coordinating fruit piece to the top so your guests know what to expect! Some of our favorites are Lime Spiked Seltzer with Raspberry vodka, and Orange Spiked Seltzer with Orange flavored vodka. Happy mixing!
recipeIngredient: 1 cup Flavored Vodka (We chose Smirnoff Raspberry)
Vodka Soda Jello Shots.name: Vodka Soda Jello Shots
Vodka Soda Jello Shots.recipeInstructions: Combine unflavored gelatin mix and granulated sugar in a bowl and pour in boiling water.. Stir together until gelatin & sugar granules are completely dissolved.. Pour in remaining ingredients and mix well until completely combined.. Line a rectangular glass pyrex dish with plastic wrap and pour in mixture to set.. About halfway through the setting process place fresh fruit pieces evenly throughout the dish, then return to the fridge to set the rest of the way. . When ready to serve, slice into squares around each of the fruit pieces.

BON & VIV Spiked Seltzer Variety Pack.description:
Introducing BON & VIV™ Spiked Seltzer, a unique combination of bright and refreshing taste and great nutritional claims - 0 grams of sugar and 90 calories per 12 oz can and 0 grams of sugar and 120 calories per 16 oz can. 

We make BON & VIV™ Spiked Seltzer using select ingredients including purified water and natural fruit flavors to create the 4.5% alcohol and a clean, crisp taste. With no barley or wheat, BON & VIV™ Spiked Seltzer is gluten free.

This product was previously known as SpikedSeltzer Variety Pack.

 - 6 pack variety pack features Black Cherry Rosemary, Lemon Lime, and Prickly Pear
 - 12 pack variety pack features Pear Elderflower, Clementine Hibiscus, Grapefruit and Cranberry
 - 24 pack variety pack features Pear Elderflower, Clementine Hibiscus, Black Cherry Rosemary, Grapefruit, Lemon Lime, and Cranberry

Smirnoff Raspberry.description: Smirnoff® Raspberry is rich and robust. It complements everything well, including food, other mixers and most importantly, the conversation.

Vodka Sonic.name: Vodka Sonic
Vodka Sonic.recipeInstructions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add vodka. Add equal parts Schweppes Club Soda and Schweppes Tonic Water to top. Garnish with a lime wedge. Enjoy!

Tito's Handmade Vodka.description: Tito's Handmade Vodka is designed to be savored by spirit connoisseurs.  It is micro-distilled in an old-fashioned pot still, just like fine single malt scotches and high-end French cognacs.  This time-honored method of distillation requires more skill and effort than modern column stills, but it's well worth it. Our handcrafted technique offers more  control over the distillation process, resulting in a spectacularly clean product of incomparable excellence.  Only the heart of the run, "the nectar" is taken, leaving behind residual higher and lower alcohols.  The vodka is cleansed of phenols, esters, congenersand organic acids by filtering it through the finest activated carbon available.  Critics call Tito's "a homegrown symphonic spirit to applaud!" and say "it can go head to head with any of the worlds' greats and not break a sweat.

Schweppes Club Soda.description: Schweppe's original club soda makes an outstanding mixer! Universally recognized by refreshment seekers around the world, Schweppe's a must-have in any bar or party!

Schweppes Tonic Water.description: For over 200 years, Schweppes has produced classic carbonated beverages. Schweppes Tonic Water combines carbonated water with bittersweet quinine and is caffeine free. Make Schweppes Tonic Water your go to mixer for cocktails or enjoy as a soft drink alternative. Live excellently with the classic taste of Schweppes Tonic Water.

Washington Apple Shot.description: This crisp, clean shot tastes just like a granny smith apple. Enjoy the Washington Apple Shot as a shooter or make a double serving and drink over ice. It can pack a punch though so enjoy responsibly!
recipeIngredient:
1/2 oz Crown Royal
1/2 oz Sour Apple Schnapps
1/2 oz Cranberry Juice
Washington Apple Shot.name: Washington Apple Shot
Washington Apple Shot.recipeInstructions: In a shaker filled with ice combine ingredients and shake until cold. Strain into a shot glass and enjoy

Ocean Spray Cranberry Juice Cocktail.description: Enjoy the crisp, clean taste of real cranberries straight from the bog. It’s a delicious way to get your daily dose of vitamin C and unique cranberry health benefits.

Crown Royal Deluxe.description:
The most famous Canadian whiskey of all time, Crown Royal is a smooth blend of 50 Canadian whiskies. This is no new kid on the block, either. Crown Royal has been a liquor cabinet staple since 1939, and this blended whiskey wins new fans all the time.

It has a rich, bold nose with notes of vanilla and fruit. It's an extraordinarily smooth, creamy whiskey, and you'll notice hints of oak before savoring the long, satisfying finish.

Whether you're old school or you prefer making your own custom cocktails, Crown Royal is perfect for mixing. Try it in a classic Old Fashioned with simple syrup or in a Whiskey Sour with lemon juice, simple syrup and egg white. Or spice up your next party with a Crown Royal Flush, which boasts peach schnapps and cranberry juice.

Buy Crown Royal Whiskey online at a great price on Drizly and have it delivered directly to your door or pick it up in store.

Hiram Walker Sour Apple Schnapps.description:
Mouth-puckeringly tart; clean and intensely green apple-like taste.

The nose is assertive, perfumed and similar to sweet/sour apple-flavored hard candy and freshly picked, tart green apples. The palate entry is mouth-puckeringly tart, clean, and intensely green apple-like; midpalate is strikingly like green apples; refreshing.

Watermelon Basil Julep.description: A thirst-quenching, fruit forward cocktail you're bound to enjoy!
Watermelon Basil Julep.name: Watermelon Basil Julep
Watermelon Basil Julep.recipeInstructions:
Muddle mint and basil with watermelon cubes. Stir
in Maker’s Mark® Bourbon Whisky and lime juice. Pour
over crushed ice and sprinkle with sea salt

Maker's Mark Bourbon Whisky.description:
Maker's Mark started with bread, of course. Bill Samuels bought the Burks' Distillery in Loretto, Kentucky, in 1953 and did the predictable – just not in a predictable way.

He wanted to select the right mashbill for his new Bourbon. He took inspiration from the Old Fitzgerald and W. L. Weller recipes made by Pappy Van Winkle. He did not want to take the time to distill, age and taste each candidate, so he made a loaf of bread from each mix of grain. One had no rye in it.

No rye? Samuels liked the loaf without the rye best so he ran with it. The winner contained the customary corn with malted barley and a large dose of red winter wheat. The product is in stark contrast to rye-heavy spirits like Bulleit or Knob Creek.

The result is less spicy than the rye-influenced whiskeys. Bring a glass to your nose. You'll smell spiced honey, cut fruit and citrus peel. Have a sip. Barley malt, butterscotch and vanilla bean will gradually bloom on your tongue. Wait a moment. The finish is of medium length with gentle caramel and dry oak spice.

This collection of flavors makes Maker's Mark very friendly with sweet vermouth. It makes a fine Manhattan with a cherry. Go light with the bitters. It's also a great choice with an Old Fashioned, particularly if you have dark purple Bing cherries to muddle.

If you're feeling funky, ask yourself two questions. Does bourbon like peaches? Both are as southern as sassafras. Does peach like orange? Of course, or we'd have no Fuzzy Navel. Bring all three together. Add 1 1/2 ounces of Maker's with 3/4 of an ounce peach schnapps to an ounce of OJ. Shake that well and then serve it up or on the rocks. There's a navel with some extra fuzz.

For your home bar (depending on your budget and the height of your top shelf) Maker's Mark makes a fine everyday house bourbon or a special occasion sipper to put next to your best bottles from Scotland, Ireland and Japan. Buy Maker’s Mark Whisky online at a great price on Drizly and have it delivered directly to your door or pick it up in store.

Watermelon Citrus Slush.description: A refreshing mix of watermelon and lemon, this vibrant slush is perfect for a hot summer day. Any gin will work, but Plymouth Gin, with its citrus undertones, is a perfect fit. This drink will separate as it sits, so enjoy immediately or have a spoon or straw handy for stirring.
Watermelon Citrus Slush.name: Watermelon Citrus Slush
Watermelon Citrus Slush.recipeInstructions: Fill Freeze watermelon cubes for at least 2 hours.  . Blend frozen watermelon with gin, limoncello, lemon juice and sugar.  . Divide between 2 glasses and garnish with mint sprigs.  . Enjoy immediately!

Plymouth Gin.description:
Plymouth Gin Original Strength is a unique, protected style of gin originating from the city of Plymouth, South West England. Since 1793 it has been distilled from a unique blend of 7 botanicals, soft Dartmoor water and pure grain alcohol at the historic Black Friars Distillery - the oldest working distillery in England.    
TASTING NOTES:    
Colour - Crystal Clear.  Nose - Rich, fresh aroma of juniper followed by notes of coriander and cardamom.
  Palate - Extremely smooth, creamy and full bodies with a slight sweetness.  
Finish - Elegant, long, fresh and aromatic

Caravella Limoncello.description: Ultimate Wine Challenge - Italy- Has aromas of lemon candy, menthol with a hint of white pepper that provides a fruity, sweet and tart, lemon drop flavor with a cane sugar finish.

Watermelon Fizz Beach Bag.description:
Cool cucumber vodka and watermelon puree come together with spiked seltzer make a fizzy drink that definitely packs a punch.

Check out the rest of our 'Beach Bag' cocktails!
recipeIngredient: Watermelon Cubes & Cucumber Wheels For Garnish
Watermelon Fizz Beach Bag.name: Watermelon Fizz Beach Bag
Watermelon Fizz Beach Bag.recipeInstructions: Combine all ingredients except seltzer into a small 8 oz zip-top plastic bag.. Shake gently to mix. . Lay flat in freezer for 6-8 hours until frozen. . When ready to serve gently crush bag contents until a slush.. Open bag and pour in the spiked seltzer. . Drop in watermelon and cucumber garnish and serve with a straw.

BON & VIV Spiked Seltzer Lemon Lime.description:
Introducing BON & VIV™ Spiked Seltzer, a unique combination of bright and refreshing taste and great nutritional claims - 0 grams of sugar and 90 calories per 12 oz can and 0 grams of sugar and 120 calories per 16 oz can. 

We make BON & VIV™ Spiked Seltzer using select ingredients including purified water and natural fruit flavors to create the 4.5% alcohol and a clean, crisp taste. With no barley or wheat, BON & VIV™ Spiked Seltzer is gluten free.

Crop Cucumber Vodka.description: Crop Organic Artisanal Vodka has a refreshingly crisp, clean, pure taste. Our Crop Organic Cucumber Vodka captures the essence of freshly sliced cucumbers while our Organic Tomato Vodka perfectly conveys the flavor of a vine-ripened tomato. Our Crop Organic Meyer Lemon Vodka strikes a delicate balance between the sweet and tart flavors of this unique fruit. Talented Bar Chefs are using our unique Crop Vodka to create exciting, innovative new recipes.

Watermelon Jello Shots.description: These jiggly summer shots are just as fun to look at as they are to eat. Watermelon jello shots can be made in a baking sheet or even inside of lime rinds to look like miniature watermelons. This recipe is easy to mix up with your favorite vodka or tequila, which make them the perfect crowd pleasing treat for your next party.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups of vodka or silver tequila
Watermelon Jello Shots.name: Watermelon Jello Shots
Watermelon Jello Shots.recipeInstructions: Combine all your gelatin in a large bowl and stir together. . Slowly mix in 2 cups of boiling water and stir until dissolved. . After all the powder mixture is dissolved pour in your liquor of choice while you continue to stir.. Use a ladle to evenly distribute mixture into hollowed out lime halves.. Carefully place into your fridge and allow to cool until they are set up (usually between 2-4 hours). Once set slice into wedges keeping the rind on and serve.. For shots containing vodka garnish with coarse sugar or sesame seeds. For tequila shots use coarse sea salt on top.

Watermelon Margs.description: Watermelon and lime come together for these crazy-easy-to-make margs. The Ritas love to come together for a good time. #HAVEARITA
Watermelon Margs.name: Watermelon Margs
Watermelon Margs.recipeInstructions: Mix ingredients in a margarita glass. Garnish with watermelon wedge. Enjoy!

RITAS Lime-A-Rita.description: Line up for Lime-A-Rita™! Take a classic margarita, add some fun, and you’ll end up with Lime-A-Rita™. The recipe is open the can. Or if you’re feeling fancy, pour it over ice in a margarita glass. #HAVEARITA

RITAS Water-Melon-Rita.description: Say what’s up to Water-Melon-Rita®! If you prefer a watermelon margarita that has all of the juiciness and none of the seeds—this Rita is for you. #HAVEARITA

Watermelon Smash.description: A fresh, delicious concoction that is best served in the sun!
Watermelon Smash.name: Watermelon Smash
Watermelon Smash.recipeInstructions: Add vodka, watermelon juice, lemon juice, simple syrup, and mint leaves into a pitcher. Add ice. Mix well. Pour into glasses and garnish

American Anthem Vodka.description: American Anthem is an exceptional vodka that is proudly made in America, 5x distilled from corn grown in the heartland, and filtered for a smooth taste. American Anthem celebrates the strength of the American spirit, and honors its true military heroes, those who serve and protect our freedoms at home and abroad.  $1 per bottle donated by American Anthem to military-oriented charities.

Whiskey Patch.description: One of my all-time favorite types of candy is Sour Patch Kids, so working them into a festive drink for Halloween was a no-brainer. Enjoy my take on a whiskey sour, with an added emphasis on the sour. Of course — First it’s sour, then it’s sweet!
recipeIngredient: 1 small bag of Sour Patch Kids
Whiskey Patch.name: Whiskey Patch
Whiskey Patch.recipeInstructions: Empty Sour Patch Kids from bag and rim tumbler with a lemon.. Dip tumbler in the sugar at the bottom of the Sour Patch Kids bag.. Fill tumbler with ice and set aside.. In a shaker, combine lemonade, whiskey and simple syrup.. Shake well.. Pour mixture into tumbler.. Add in splash of cherry juice.. Garnish with a cherry and speared Sour Patch Kids.. Enjoy!

Bulleit Bourbon.description:
Bulleit Bourbon Whiskey allows you to savor the complex flavor and warm finish inspired by the whiskey pioneered by Augustus Bulleit 150 years ago. With its amber color and oaky aroma, our aged whiskey makes a good first impression before it's even opened. The flavor profile of our bourbon whiskey combines hints of maple, oak and nutmeg for a dry, well-balanced finish that lingers long after the final sip. Simply combine our bourbon whiskey with cloves, lemon juice, brown sugar and hot water for a comforting Hot Toddy.

Bulleit Bourbon is still distilled and aged in the Bulleit family tradition. High rye content gives it a bold, spicy character with a distinctively smooth, clean finish. Kentucky limestone-filtered water provides a foundation for the bourbon's character, while charred American oak barrels lend a smoky backbone. Please drink responsibly.

Whiskey Sour.description: If you're looking for a classic, whiskey-based cocktail to wind down with at the end of a long day - the Whiskey Sour is the drink for you. This popular cocktail dates back to the late 1800's, and has seen many iterations over the years. Classic ingredients include bourbon or whiskey, sugar and lemon, with the option of adding a dash of egg white if you're feeling ambitious.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces Whiskey (or Bourbon, Scotch, Canadian Whiskey, or Irish Whiskey)
Whiskey Sour.name: Whiskey Sour
Whiskey Sour.recipeInstructions: Combine the whiskey and sour mix in a large old-fashioned glass with ice.. Stir, garnish with cherry, and serve.

Bulleit Bourbon.description:
Bulleit Bourbon Whiskey allows you to savor the complex flavor and warm finish inspired by the whiskey pioneered by Augustus Bulleit 150 years ago. With its amber color and oaky aroma, our aged whiskey makes a good first impression before it's even opened. The flavor profile of our bourbon whiskey combines hints of maple, oak and nutmeg for a dry, well-balanced finish that lingers long after the final sip. Simply combine our bourbon whiskey with cloves, lemon juice, brown sugar and hot water for a comforting Hot Toddy.

Bulleit Bourbon is still distilled and aged in the Bulleit family tradition. High rye content gives it a bold, spicy character with a distinctively smooth, clean finish. Kentucky limestone-filtered water provides a foundation for the bourbon's character, while charred American oak barrels lend a smoky backbone. Please drink responsibly.

White Lady.description: While the White Lady's history can be disputed, it was favored with Cointreau by the likes of Laurel and Hardy at the Savoy Hotel in London in the 1930s. With today's regained popularity of gin, this cocktail is poised to reclaim its deserved place in the hall of classics.
White Lady.name: White Lady
White Lady.recipeInstructions:
Combine
  all ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Shake and strain into a chilled
  cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist

Cointreau.description:
Cointreau, the crystal clear Orange Liqueur, founded in Angers, France, remains one of the world's most distinguished spirits with over 160 years of history. 


Renowned for its perfect balance of sweet and bitter orange peels and made with only the finest all-natural ingredients, Cointreau has a uniquely refreshing and complex taste. A versatile, 80 proof spirit, Cointreau can be enjoyed as the base spirit in many cocktails, such as the Cointreau Rickey, but is also an essential ingredient in the most popular cocktails including the Margarita, the Cosmopolitan, and the Sidecar.

White Lily.description: A floral cocktail combining the botanicals of gin and the sparkle of La Marca.
White Lily.name: White Lily
White Lily.recipeInstructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker except La Marca. Shake and strain into sparkling coupe while simultaneously pouring in the La Marca. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel

La Marca Prosecco.description: Our delicate La Marca Prosecco has a pale, golden straw color and sparkles with lively effervescence. Opening with aromas of fresh-picked citrus and honeysuckle blossoms, the crisp, clean palate brings fruity notes of green apple, juicy peach and ripe lemon, framed by hints of minerality. The finish is light and fruit-forward with a refreshing style.

New Amsterdam Gin.description:
• New Amsterdam Gin is a modern take on the 400-year tradition. At New Amsterdam, we have crafted a gin that is uniquely distilled and infused with traditional notes of juniper and botanicals, creating a delicately balanced gin with citrus undertones and a long, silky finish. 
• The smooth finish lets you drink this flavorful gin straight or as the centerpiece of a perfect gin and tonic.
• 95 Points, The Tasting Panel Magazine 2017

Rose's Lime Juice.description: Rose's lime juice, often known simply as Rose's, is a concentrated fruit juice patented in 1867. This makes it the world's first concentrated bottled fruit juice drink.

Stirrings Simple Syrup.description: Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is a starting point for many great cocktails. Set the foundation of your delicious drink with this kosher syrup, 12 oz, and take the guesswork out of making a tasty cocktail. This simple tonic, pack of 6, contains pure cane sugar and purified water in just the right proportion. This Stirrings Cocktail Simple Syrup is the original inspiration for Stirrings "simple mixers" and is the critical first step for a yummy cocktail.

Vita Coco Coconut Water.description: Not so long ago, you had to use a machete if you wanted a sip of pure coconut water. We’ve taken the machete out of the equation, which is good, because those things are dangerous. Now all that’s left is Mother Nature’s most hydrating, refreshing, vitamin- and mineral-rich nectar. Vita Coco is never made from concentrate. That means we pick, crack, and pack fresh young coconuts directly at the source. After the coconuts are cleaned, the delicate water inside is flash pasteurized (and occasionally mixed with all-natural fruit puree) then poured into a shelf-stable Tetra Pak. The entire process from tree to Pak doesn't exceed 72 hours. We hear the end result is a lot like sticking a straw in a coconut.

White Russian.description: Somewhere between a jacked up iced coffee, and a boozy dessert sits the White Russian. If you're a Big Lebowski fan, you know this as the "Dude's" favorite cocktail. Ever wondered what people are always buying that one bottle of Kahlua for? This is it. The rich sweet, coffee flavors of Kahlua are off set by vodka and cold milk, resulting in a decadent drink that is easy to sip anytime of day. Not a dairy fan? Swap in the whole milk for coconut milk for a nutty twist on this classic.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 oz Whole Milk or Heavy Cream
White Russian.name: White Russian
White Russian.recipeInstructions: In a rocks glass combine vodka and coffee liqueur over ice. Add milk or cream and stir. Optional Step 3. Put on your best plain white tee, and channel your inner 'Dude'.

Kahlua.description:
Kahlua coffee-flavored liqueur is made with the finest 100% Arabica coffee beans from Veracruz, Mexico. The climate in this region of the country produce well-rounded, light-bodied coffee. These quality beans  are then mixed with sugar cane rum, vanilla bean, and notes of caramel.  They combine perfectly to make an easy-sipping liqueur enjoyed by millions. Known for its deep brown color and smooth finish, Kahlua is the number one selling coffee liqueur in the world.

Kahlua is also the primary ingredient in a number of famous (or perhaps infamous) cocktails. The Espresso Martini, The Mind Eraser, and personal favorite of  “The Dude” The White Russian.

White Russian on Spring Vacation.description: Since Darling be Daring is known for our Girl On-The-Go recipes and our viewers come to us for healthy twists on recipes, we've substituted the cream in the White Russian recipe to Coco Lopez Cream of Coconut and added bittermens Elemakule Tiki bitters for a fun, tropical twist!
recipeIngredient: 1 part Coco Lopez Cream of Coconut
1 tsp Sugar or Agave to sweeten
White Russian on Spring Vacation.name: White Russian on Spring Vacation
White Russian on Spring Vacation.recipeInstructions: Fill a rocks glass with ice. Pour in Absolut Vodka, followed by Kahlua. Add in optional sugar or agave, as well as Tiki Bitters. Stir to combine and top with Cream of Coconut

Absolut Vodka.description: Absolut Vodka was first launched in New York in 1979. It soon became the talk of the town, in the US and eventually of the world. But the recipe behind the clean and natural taste of Absolut is actually older than 30 years. So is the 18th century medicine bottle found in an antique store in Stockholm, Sweden that gave inspiration to the iconic Absolut Vodka bottle.

Kahlua.description:
Kahlua coffee-flavored liqueur is made with the finest 100% Arabica coffee beans from Veracruz, Mexico. The climate in this region of the country produce well-rounded, light-bodied coffee. These quality beans  are then mixed with sugar cane rum, vanilla bean, and notes of caramel.  They combine perfectly to make an easy-sipping liqueur enjoyed by millions. Known for its deep brown color and smooth finish, Kahlua is the number one selling coffee liqueur in the world.

Kahlua is also the primary ingredient in a number of famous (or perhaps infamous) cocktails. The Espresso Martini, The Mind Eraser, and personal favorite of  “The Dude” The White Russian.

Coco Lopez Cream Of Coconut.description: Is the original and reigning champ of Cream of Coconut, a delicious cream made from the tender meat of sun ripened Caribbean coconuts and blended with the exact portion of natural cane sugar. This product is ideal for tropical drinks and desserts!

Bittermens Elemakule Tiki.description: A taste of the islands. We recommend adding a dash to libations served in shrunken heads, volcanoes and miniature ceramic Moai.These bitters were inspired by one of the new garde of Tiki legends: Brian Miller. He asked if we ever considered making Falernum, a cordial filled with the spices of the West Indies. Since we weren’t cordial makers at the time, we decided to see if it was possible to create a bitter designed with tiki cocktails in mind.    Our formulation takes into account the contributions from both the Eastern (Polynesia) and Western (Caribbean) schools of tropical cocktails.

recipeIngredient: A bottle of chilled, Dry White Wine
A variety of Fresh Sliced Fruits, such as Peaches, Oranges, Blueberries
A few sprigs of Mint Leaves
White Sangria.name: White Sangria
White Sangria.recipeInstructions: Grab a pitcher and add your raspberries and mint to muddle at the bottom . Add 3-4 handfuls of ice . Add your slices of peaches, oranges, and blueberries . Pour 2 cups of apple juice into the fruit and ice . Pour the full bottle of wine into the pitcher . Top with 1-2 cans of 7UP to add a little sweetness and fizziness to your drink!

Starborough Sauvignon Blanc.description: Starborough Sauvignon Blanc has refreshing flavors of citrus and tropical fruits with notes of fresh-cut grass, passion fruit, guava and kiwi that creates a crisp, approachable palate. This refreshing wine comes from Marlborough, New Zealand.

7UP.description: The light, crisp, lemon and lime flavor of 7UP makes it a refreshing drink on its own, and the perfect addition to recipes for every occasion. From cocktails to mocktails and even baked goods, mix it up a little at your next get-together with 7UP.

Oranges.description: Juicy and sweet and renowned for its concentration of vitamin C, oranges make the perfect snack and add a special tang to many recipes; it is no wonder that they are one of the most popular fruits in the world. Oranges are generally available from winter through summer with seasonal variations depending on the variety.

White Wine Spritzer.description: Spruce up your white wine spritzer with a punch of citrus with 7UP
White Wine Spritzer.name: White Wine Spritzer
White Wine Spritzer.recipeInstructions: In a wine glass over ice, combine the wine and Diet 7UP. Garnish with a lemon wedge

Diet 7UP.description: The light, crisp, lemon and lime flavor of Diet 7UP makes it a refreshing, calorie-free drink on its own, and the perfect addition to recipes for every occasion. From cocktails to mocktails and even baked goods, mix it up a little at your next get-together with Diet 7UP.

Wicked Ale.description: Try this beer cocktail that is both wicked good and wicked easy to make.
Wicked Ale.name: Wicked Ale
Wicked Ale.recipeInstructions: Combine ingredients in a pint glass and gently stir to combine. Garnish with lemon wedge

Hoegaarden White.description: The original Belgian wheat beer. Pairs well with light salads or seafoods.

Owl's Brew Wicked Green Tea.description: A tea-based craft cocktail mixer made from fresh-brewed green tea, habanero pepper and lime. Bright and clean with a lot of heat, try it mixed with tequila, vodka, gin, Mezcal and IPAs. Simply mix two parts Wicked Green with 1 part of your spirit of choice (we recommend 1:1 with beer). After years in the tea biz, Jennie and Maria knew all about blending and brewing tea and botanicals. They also knew they couldn't find any beers on the market that had the flavor they were looking for. So they started mixing their Owl's Brew teas with craft beer, and fell in love with the great ingredients and easy, breezy, delicious flavor. Before they knew it they were in deep explorative mode, chatting about hops and IBUs, as they developed their craft beer and went from steeping tea to brewing beer. Owl's Brew commits 1% of their net revenue to clean water initiatives and is brewed with whole, real ingredients, never flavors, concentrates or essences. 0

Wild Turkey Manhattan.description: This consummate classic cocktail gets its particularly bold bite from Wild Turkey Rye. We like it served in a proper coupe glass with a Maraschino cherry tossed in for good measure.
Wild Turkey Manhattan.name: Wild Turkey Manhattan
Wild Turkey Manhattan.recipeInstructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into coupe glass. Garnish with a cherry

Angostura Bitters.description:
You can’t—or at least you shouldn’t—make an Old Fashioned without them! Angostura Bitters are the most famous and prevalent type of bitters.  But what are bitters exactly? They are an alcoholic, highly concentrated, botanical concoction used to give your cocktail a bitter, sour, or bittersweet flavor. Because of the strong flavor bitters are added to drinks in dashes. (Two or three should do the trick.) 
This specific brand is named after Angostura, the Venezuelan town where they were first produced. The recipe is a closely guarded secret, with just five people knowing the exact formula. Angostura bitters were first used to soothe soldiers’ upset stomachs and are believed to have other healing benefits but we’re pretty sure your bottle will spend more time on your bar cart than in your medicine cabinet.

Wild Turkey Rye.description: Wild Turkey Straight Rye Whiskey is an 81 proof (40.5% alcohol) ode to America’s first distilled spirit: rye whiskey. When making Wild Turkey Rye, we use a deeper, “alligator” char for extra flavor. Big, broad vanilla and spice notes burst through without changing the bold rye taste. Wild Turkey Rye stands up to any mixer and shines through in cocktails.

Winking Witches Brew.description: This quick and easy recipe is perfect for a Halloween get together with friends!  We added a Twizzlers garnish around the edge and a Twizzlers straw to give it a fun Halloween look that goes perfectly with the spooky purple color. Enjoy!
Winking Witches Brew.name: Winking Witches Brew
Winking Witches Brew.recipeInstructions: In a saucepan, combine 12 oz. of fresh or frozen blueberries with 1/2 cup water. . Heat until boiling and then let simmer for 10 minutes. . Once fully cooked through, mash blackberries and strain so only the juice remains. . In tumblers, mix together 6 oz of blackberry juice, 1 oz. simple syrup and 2 oz. of Titos vodka and stir with a swizzle stick. . Top with ice and garnish with a cut Twizzlers for a candy swizzle stick.

Tito's Handmade Vodka.description: Tito's Handmade Vodka is designed to be savored by spirit connoisseurs.  It is micro-distilled in an old-fashioned pot still, just like fine single malt scotches and high-end French cognacs.  This time-honored method of distillation requires more skill and effort than modern column stills, but it's well worth it. Our handcrafted technique offers more  control over the distillation process, resulting in a spectacularly clean product of incomparable excellence.  Only the heart of the run, "the nectar" is taken, leaving behind residual higher and lower alcohols.  The vodka is cleansed of phenols, esters, congenersand organic acids by filtering it through the finest activated carbon available.  Critics call Tito's "a homegrown symphonic spirit to applaud!" and say "it can go head to head with any of the worlds' greats and not break a sweat.

Winter Citrus Swizzle.description: We love this low-cal drink for more than just the refreshing flavor. If you use a grapefruit vodka with color the ombre effect in the drink between the pink vodka and sparkling water is drink perfection.
Winter Citrus Swizzle.name: Winter Citrus Swizzle
Winter Citrus Swizzle.recipeInstructions: In a collins glass with ice, pour vodka first then rosemary simply syrup and finally top with Perrier L'Orange sparkling water. Slide a tall sprig of rosemary down the side of the glass. Stir gently with rosemary before enjoying

Deep Eddy Ruby Red Vodka.description:
Texas is all about football, barbecue and beers, so it's a bit of a surprise that Deep Eddy Ruby Red Vodka comes straight from Austin. Distilled from the finest corn and infused with a proprietary blend of farmer-grown ruby red grapefruit juice, this concoction is refreshing and smooth without the artificial aftertaste. Each batch is expertly handcrafted, distilled 10 times and run through a charcoal filter six more times.

The result is a clean, crisp and gluten-free vodka that's unlike anything you've ever had. Even drinkers that don't like the tartness of grapefruit will find this vodka much to their liking. 

When you sample Deep Eddy Ruby Red Vodka for the first time, you might want to try just a little sip or a shot. That way, you can know just how delicious this stuff is. There are many options after that. If you want to take your regular mimosa up a notch, try it with Deep Eddy instead of orange juice. The bubbles and grapefruit flavors mix eloquently, but with a kicker that can surely spice up a brunch or wedding shower.

If you want a fresh take on a traditional cocktail, put Deep Eddy Ruby Red on the rocks with a bit of club soda. It's so good that no one will ever judge you for drinking a pink cocktail, or any other grapefruit cocktail for that matter. 

Buy Deep Eddy Ruby Red online at a great price through Drizly and start enjoying a glass of this great tasting vodka.

Absolut Ruby Red.description: Absolut Ruby Red is made exclusively from natural ingredients, and unlike some other flavored vodkas, it doesn’t contain any added sugar. Absolut Ruby Red is smooth and fruity with a crisp and refreshing character of zesty grapefruit.

Shady Fruit Ruby Red Grapefruit.description: At a time when most drinks seem to be made from artificial ingredients, it's hard to find something that's real, with a natural and refreshing taste. The idea is simple. Freshly-squeezed real whole fruit, combined with clean, crisp, column-distilled vodka. Naturally gluten-free with the refreshing taste of real fruit. Shady Fruit Vodka is great for sunny (or shady) days with friends. Serve chilled, on the rocks, or with a splash of soda.

Winter Fruit Sangria.description: A wintery take on a summertime favorite. This sangria combines typical winter citrus fruit into a deliciously-drinkable cocktail.
recipeIngredient: 2 bottles of Chilled Yellow Tail Cabernet Sauvignon
Winter Fruit Sangria.name: Winter Fruit Sangria
Winter Fruit Sangria.recipeInstructions: In a large pitcher combine sugar, brandy, and cut fruit. Stir well and refrigerate for 1-2 hours. Add wine and stir. Add club soda immediately before serving. Serve over ice

Schweppes Club Soda.description: Schweppe's original club soda makes an outstanding mixer! Universally recognized by refreshment seekers around the world, Schweppe's a must-have in any bar or party!

Yellow Tail Cabernet Sauvignon.description: This Cabernet offers easy drinking early but will cellar with confidence. Expect cassis, violets, crushed herbs and a long, soft finish with enough concentration and texture to make the wine feel more serious.

Woodford Reserve Neat.description: Sometimes the best "cocktail" is poured straight from the bottle.
Woodford Reserve Neat.name: Woodford Reserve Neat
Woodford Reserve Neat.recipeInstructions: Pour Woodford Reserve into a cocktail glass. Enjoy!

Woodford Reserve Kentucky Straight Bourb.description: Woodford Reserve is built around flavor. The art of making fine bourbon first took place on the site of the Woodford Reserve Distillery, a National Historic Landmark, in 1812. The perfectly balanced taste of our Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey is composed of more than 200 detectable flavor notes, from bold grain and wood, to sweet aromatics, spice, and fruit & floral notes.

Woodford Reserve Old Fashioned.description: A classic American cocktail with a great history.
Woodford Reserve Old Fashioned.name: Woodford Reserve Old Fashioned
Woodford Reserve Old Fashioned.recipeInstructions: Add ingredients to the mixing glass. Add ice and stir for 30-40 seconds. Strain into an old fashioned glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lightly expressed orange peel

Woodford Reserve Kentucky Straight Bourb.description: Woodford Reserve is built around flavor. The art of making fine bourbon first took place on the site of the Woodford Reserve Distillery, a National Historic Landmark, in 1812. The perfectly balanced taste of our Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey is composed of more than 200 detectable flavor notes, from bold grain and wood, to sweet aromatics, spice, and fruit & floral notes.

1-2 Punch.description: Detox. Retox. Repeat. This green power juice goes rogue with the help from a little rum. The addition of fresh ginger root gives this healthy-ish take on a Rum Punch an extra kick.
1-2 Punch.name: 1-2 Punch
1-2 Punch.recipeInstructions: In a cocktail shaker or protein shaker combine green juice, light rum and ice. . Shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds. . Pour entire contents into a glass. . Garnish with fresh pineapple and other citrus of your choosing.

Canada Dry Ginger Ale.description: Any time is a great time for the crisp goodness of Canada Dry Ginger Ale. Never skimping on quality, Canada Dry Ginger Ale offers refreshingly real ginger taste that's made from real ginger and is caffeine free. Enhance your favorite cocktails with a sparkling splash of Canada Dry or enjoy by itself for crisp, clean refreshment. Creating quality beverages and mixers since 1904, enjoy the best in refreshment with Canada Dry.

7UP.description: The light, crisp, lemon and lime flavor of 7UP makes it a refreshing drink on its own, and the perfect addition to recipes for every occasion. From cocktails to mocktails and even baked goods, mix it up a little at your next get-together with 7UP.

1920 Highball.description: Enjoy a blast from the past with this 1920 Highball from Old Forester.
1920 Highball.name: 1920 Highball
1920 Highball.recipeInstructions: Combine all ingredients in highball glass. Add ice. Stir to combine. Garnish with lemon twist

Old Forester 1920 Prohibition Style Bour.description: Old Forester 1920 Prohibition Style is a small batch of barrels presented at 115 proof representing the typical barrel proof of Bourbon at that time.

19\u00b0 North.description: Sriracha meets Herradura Reposado in a complex and fiery drink.
19\u00b0 North.name: 19° North
19\u00b0 North.recipeInstructions: Combine all the ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake hard so that some of the ice melts. Strain over fresh ice into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge

Herradura Reposado Tequila.description: We set the standard. Then surpassed it. Herradura Reposado is aged for eleven months, nine months longer than the industry standard. Its deep copper color and rounded taste sets our Reposado apart, along with its signature aroma of spices. The tastes of vanilla, butter and agave work in unison to create a smooth and sweet experience. Herradura introduced the first Reposado to the world in 1974, creating an entirely new tequila category. Cheers to that.

7UP Orange Spice Punch.description: This isn't your grandmother's sherbet punch. It's a fresh take on a seasonal favorite with tangy fruit juice, smooth sherbet, bright bubbles, and just the right amount of holiday spice. Whether you serve it in a retro crystal bowl or a sleek new one, it's a fun and festive centerpiece on any table or buffet.
recipeIngredient: 8 oz Canadian Whiskey (or whiskey of your choice)
Slices of Lemon, Lime, and Orange
7UP Orange Spice Punch.name: 7UP Orange Spice Punch
7UP Orange Spice Punch.recipeInstructions: Add everything except for sherbet into a one-gallon punch bowl. Float scoops of sherbet on top. Let sherbet soften in the punch for a few minutes before serving. Garnish with lemon, lime and orange slices, cinnamon sticks, and a touch of pumpkin spice

7UP Pom Spritzer.description: Mix up the typical spritzer with a fresh taste of citrus
7UP Pom Spritzer.name: 7UP Pom Spritzer
7UP Pom Spritzer.recipeInstructions: Combine all ingredients and stir. Garnish with a lemon or lime, fresh mint, and pomegranate seeds. Best served in a highball glass

7UP Side Down Cocktail.description: Start with sprinkles. Add cake-flavored vodka, pineapple juice, and 7UP, and you've got a party in a glass.
7UP Side Down Cocktail.name: 7UP Side Down Cocktail
7UP Side Down Cocktail.recipeInstructions: Build first three ingredients in a rocks glass over ice and fill to the top with 7UP®. Garnish with sprinkles, a cherry, and an orange twist

Ice.description: Premium Packaged Ice. Ideal for large gatherings, events or for the business that needs large quantities of quality, sanitary ice.

Dole Pineapple Juice.description: Dole Pineapple Juice - Beat the summer heat    Dole Pineapple Juice contains essential vitamins that help boost your metabolism and keep you nutrition even in the scorching heat. Available in pack of 8, these are the ideal potion for enjoying summers to the fullest.        Flavor: Pineapple      Servings: 8 fl Oz      Ingredients: Pineapple Juice, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Vitamin E, and Vitamin A

Pinnacle Cake Vodka.description: Offering the aroma of warm frosting, this bakery-fresh vanilla cake vodka has notes of baked vanilla and buttercream for a sweet confection in your glass. Stir it into club soda or an ice cream shake for a top-notch treat. For an indulgent cocktail, mix up a Pinnacle® Red Velvet Cake-tini by combining one part Pinnacle® Cake Vodka, one part JDK & Sons™ Crave Chocolate Chili Liqueur, and a splash of grenadine. Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a martini glass with its rim dipped in shaved chocolate, and garnish with fresh strawberries. Or try a simple Pinnacle Limon Cake Fizz by mixing one part Pinnacle Cake Vodka with two parts lemon-lime soda in a glass with ice and a lime wedge garnish.

7UP Winter Mint Punch.description: A perfect festive punch that is sure to be a crowd pleaser with a lemon-lime twist
7UP Winter Mint Punch.name: 7UP Winter Mint Punch
7UP Winter Mint Punch.recipeInstructions: Add everything except for sherbet into a one-gallon punch bowl. Float scoops of sherbet on top. Let sherbet soften in the punch for a few minutes before serving. Garnish with mint leaves and slices of lemon and lime

7UP Pineapple Rum Float.description: A float is always a great idea. But turning it into an adult beverage is even better. This cocktail would be great for summer pool parties and other celebrations.
7UP Pineapple Rum Float.name: 7UP Pineapple Rum Float
7UP Pineapple Rum Float.recipeInstructions: Add spiced rum, 7Up and pineapple juice to a glass. Stir well. Add 1-2 scoops of pineapple sherbet. Enjoy!

Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum.description: Captain Morgan is the original party spirit, a spiced rum that was born and blended to have a good time. So grab a bottle of Captain Morgan Spiced Rum, raise a leg, and toast to the adventure to be had. Captain’s orders!
